K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:1b-1: bi na ya kshu dra ka bstu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:1b-3: 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi; bam po dang po /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:1b-5: phran tshegs kyi gzhi'i sdom ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:1b-6: so phag chan pa chos gos dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:1b-7: shing tshad dang ni gnas brtan lus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:1b-9: phran tshegs gzhir ni yang dag bshad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:1b-11: so phag sen mo bcos pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:2a-1: bzed yan lag me long skyes //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:2b-10: skyed mos tshal gyi dga' ba ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17a-11: song la dge sbyong go'u ta mas ci lung bstan pa blta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17a-13: de der song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17a-15: dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'ongs par gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17a-19: bdag gis de la chung ma bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17a-20: ci zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhes bgyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17a-21: de bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17a-23: lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17a-24: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17a-26: gcer bu pa de rtsis mkhas pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17b-0: rdo @17b rgyus kha dog dkar po blangs nas brtsis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du lung bstan pa de thams cad de kho na bzhin du mthong nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17b-2: gal te rjes su bsngags na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17b-3: khyim bdag 'di dge sbyong go'u ta ma la dad par 'ong bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17b-12: khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17b-29: zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17b-31: rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17b-32: zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17b-36: sems can skal ba chung ngu de btsas ma thag kho nar khyim mes tshig par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17b-37: lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro; ;zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17b-40: khyod kyis mir gyur pa la lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar gyur pa 'ga' yod pa lta mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17b-41: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo; ;zhes zer ba de bden te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17b-42: gang gi tshe 'di bza' ba yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:17b-43: bgo ba yang med pa de'i tshe gdon mi za bar dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i thad du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-1: spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-4: re zhig dge sbyong go'u ta ma la yang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid med na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-5: de'i nyan thos la lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-6: khyim bdag shin tu bzang po mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-8: 'di la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-13: bslab pa blangs pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-16: shin tu bzang pos bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-18: snyam nas sman ma yin pa sbyin par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-19: sems can de srid pa tha ma pa zhig pas sman ma yin pa de yang de la sman du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-20: des de'i dku g-yon pa mnye bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-21: mngal na 'dug pa de dku g-yas par song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-22: shin tu bzang pos dku g-yas pa mnye bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-23: de dku g-yon par song ste srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du bar ma dor rgyun chad cing dus byed par 'gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-24: gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-25: khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma de dku mnyes pas ngu bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-26: khyim tshes dag gis thos nas rings pa rings par song ste dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-28: khyim bdag gi chung ma 'di ci ste ngu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-29: shin tu bzang pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18a-30: gdon mi za bar 'di bu btsa' ba'i dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-2: shin tu bzang pos bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-3: bdag gis 'di 'dir gsad mi nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-5: snyam nas des de dgon par khrid nas ci nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar brtsal nas des de sbas te khyim du khyer nas mdza' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-8: khyim tshes rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-11: de dag gis ngu bar brtsams nas de dag ngu zhing de gos sngon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-14: dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan nas bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-15: gcer bu pa dag gis thos nas de dag dga' mgu rangs nas gdugs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-17: ba dan dag bsgreng ste rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lam po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-20: sum mdo dag tu rgyu zhing smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-22: dge sbyong go'u ta mas khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-24: lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-25: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-26: zhes lung bstan pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-27: shi nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-28: re zhig shing gang la rtsa ba nyid kyang med pa de la yal ga dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-30: lo ma 'byung bar lta ga la 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:18b-31: skabs 'di lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi mkhyen pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-1: par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-7: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-8: bslab pa gsum la legs par bslab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-9: 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-10: chu bo bzhi las brgal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-11: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-12: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas goms par mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-13: mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi bsnyengs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-14: yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-15: 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-16: yan lag drug dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-17: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-18: drug la rtag tu gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-19: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-20: lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-21: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-23: grags pas phyogs bcur khyab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-24: stong la dbang bsgyur bas khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-25: chos nyid kyis nyin lan gsum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19a-26: mtshan lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-4: ngan song las drangs nas mtho ris dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-7: gang zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-8: gang zhig gis bskyed pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-11: grol bar bya zhes ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-13: chu srin gnas kyi rgya mtsho ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-15: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la; ;sangs rgyas dus las mi 'da'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-16: ji ltar ma ni sdug pa'i bu gcig la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-17: lta zhing de yi srog kyang srung ba ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa gdul ba'i skye bo la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-19: de bzhin gzigs shing de yi rgyud kyang srung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-20: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyud la gnas pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-21: thugs rje'i ba drus pa gshin be'u stor bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-22: srid pa bgrod dka' 'khyams par gyur pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-23: gdul ba'i sras rnams skyo mi mkhyen par tshol ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs shig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-27: chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-30: dkar po dag byung nas kha cig ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:19b-34: gang dag 'og tu 'gro ba de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20a-8: padma ltar gas pa chen por song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20a-9: tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20a-11: grang ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20a-13: des sems can de rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun bcad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20a-14: de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20a-17: 'on te gzhan du skyes zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20a-18: de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa gtong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20a-19: de dag gis sprul pa de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems shing shes ldan dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20a-20: bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20a-21: gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20a-22: 'on kyang sems can 'di sngon ma mthong ba zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20a-23: 'di'i mthus bdag cag sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun chad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20a-25: de dag sprul pa de la sems mngon par dang bas dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du sems can rnams snod du gyur pa lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba 'dzin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20a-26: gang dag steng du 'gro ba de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-16: 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi rtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-19: bdag med pa zhes bya ba yang sgrog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-20: tshigs bcad gnyis kyang sgrog ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-21: brtsam par bya zhing dbyung bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-22: sangs rgyas bstan la 'bad par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-23: 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-24: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-26: bag dang bcas par spyod byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-27: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-28: sdug bsngal gyi ni mthar byed 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-29: de nas 'od zer de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-30: de gal te bcom ldan 'das las 'das pa lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-32: ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-34: dmyal bar skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-35: zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-36: dud 'gror skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:20b-38: yi dvags su skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-2: mir skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-4: stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid du lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-5: phyag g-yon gyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-6: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-7: phyag g-yas kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-8: lhar skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-10: nyan thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-12: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-14: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-15: gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-16: de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du nub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-17: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-18: rnam pa sna tshogs tshon ni stong dag gis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-19: bkra ba'i tshogs dag zhal gyi nang nas byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-20: nyi ma shar bar gyur pa ji lta bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-21: de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-22: tshigs su bcad de yang gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-23: sangs rgyas rgol bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-24: rgyal ba dgra thul 'gro mchog rgyur gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-25: rgyu ma mchis par padma'i rtsa lag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21a-26: dung ltar dkar ba'i 'dzum ba ston mi mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-0: @21b da ltas nyid kyi bstan blos dus mkhyen nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-1: rgyal dbang nyan po nyan par 'tshal rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-2: the tshom skyes pa thub pa skyes mchog gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-3: gsung mchog bzang zhing bstan pas bsal du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-4: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab ltar brtan pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-5: zung thub rnams ni glo bur 'dzum mi ston //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-6: mgon po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-7: skye bo'i tshogs 'di nyan par yang dag 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-13: rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-14: kun dga' po; song la dge slong rnams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrod du rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-17: khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod du rgyu zhing 'gro bar spro ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-18: chos gos dag so so nas longs shig ces sgos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-19: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-21: de ltar 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas dge slong dag gang na ba der song ste phyin nas dge slong rnams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrod du rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-24: khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod du rgyu zhing 'gro bar spro ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-25: chos gos dag so so nas longs shig ces bsgos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:21b-26: dge slong thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor @22a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-4: dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-5: rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-6: dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-7: 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-9: khyu mchog pa glang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-10: glang po che glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-11: seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-12: ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-13: nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-14: bram ze bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-15: sman pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-16: dpa' bo dmag mi'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-17: sa mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-18: ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-19: tshong dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-20: khams kyi rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-21: 'khor los bsgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-22: zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-23: nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-24: yum 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-25: 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-26: mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-27: nor sbyin gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22a-28: thag bzang ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-0: brgya byin @22b sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-1: tshangs pa tshangs ris pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-2: rgya mtsho mi g-yo ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-3: sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-4: glang po che'i rgyal po drags pa med pa lta bu; dbang po shin tu dul bas spyod lam mi nyams par gshegs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-5: sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-6: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-8: 'od nyi ma stong bas lhag pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-9: rin po che'i ri 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-13: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-14: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-15: nyan thos chen po kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-24: gang po la sogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-25: dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po gzhan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-26: srog chags brgya stong phal mo ches bskor nas bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-27: sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bco brgyad yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:22b-34: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-3: mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-4: dus dus su gzugs bzang po dag mthong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-5: sgra snyan pa dag thos par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-7: kun shes pa lung ston pa dag thos par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-9: zang zing gi longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-11: gnod pa chung ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-12: lha dang mi brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring du phyi bzhin 'brang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-13: bsil tshal logs nas rlung dag kyang langs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-14: rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-15: bram ze'i khye'u byis pa gnyis shig rgyal po'i khab nas phyi rol tu byung ste rtse zhing 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-16: de gnyis las rgyal rigs kyi khye'u ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-17: dad pa dang ldan pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-20: bram ze'i khye'u des rgyal rigs kyi khye'u la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-24: lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-25: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-28: 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rdzun du ma gyur grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23a-30: rgyal rigs kyi khye'u des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-0: zla ba skar ma'i tshogs bcas sa la @23b ltung yang srid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-1: sa 'di ri dang nags bcas mkha' la 'gro yang srid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-2: rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni skam par 'gyur srid kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-3: drang srong chen po rdzun gsung 'gyur ba srid pa min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-5: grogs po; de lta na bsil tshal gyi dur khrod blta zhing 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-6: zhes smras nas de gnyis dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-7: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-8: rgyal rigs kyi khye'us bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho nas mthong nas yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-9: thub pa the tshom bram zhing rgod pa mi mnga' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-10: ri dvags rgyal po lta bu'i sgra skad mchog sgrog cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-11: the tshom med par pha rol smra bas mi brdzi ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-12: 'di ltar skye bo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing gshegs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-13: bsil tshal phyogs su kha ba'i tshogs lta bu'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-14: bsil ba'i ngad can rlung ni langs par gyur pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-15: sh'akya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul brtag pa'i don gyi phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-16: lha tshogs mang po gnas nas 'ongs pa nyid du nges //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-17: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma'i bu khye'u skye bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-19: lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:23b-22: 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du phyung zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bsil tshal gyi dur khrod @24a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-3: thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-5: don med par bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du mi gshegs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma la brten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-7: gdul ba'i don chen po zhig mdzad par 'gyur gor ma chag gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-9: snyam nas de btsun mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-13: ljongs kyi mis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-15: rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po thag ring po kho nas mthong nas yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-16: ma ga dha yi mnga' bdag rgyal po'i gtso bo 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-17: 'di ltar 'khor bcas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-18: skye bo'i tshogs kyis 'byor ba phun sum tshogs par ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-19: bdag gi snying la nges pa'i blo dag skyes par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-20: skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas gshegs shul phye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-21: bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad cing skye bo rnams kyi gung la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-22: bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pa gcer bu bdag gis mthong nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-24: dge sbyong go'u ta ma bzhin 'dzum pa byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-25: skye bo mang po'i gung la 'dug pa las na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-26: sems can 'di ma shi bar nges so snyam nas des khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la smras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24a-28: sems can skal ba chung ngu 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-2: skabs 'di la da ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-6: bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par blangs pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-7: khyod nyid shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-8: des bud shing gcer te chung ma'i ro de me'i phung po'i nang du bcug ste bsregs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-9: de'i lus thams cad tshig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-10: lto'i nye 'khor de bzhin du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-11: de nas lto'i nye 'khor de rdol nas padma byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-12: padma de'i snying po las gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-15: de srog chags brgya stong dag gis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar chen po skyes par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-16: gcer bu pa dag gis rgyags pa dang; nga rgyal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-21: des gcer bu pa'i gdon du bltas pa dang; des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-23: me phung rab tu 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-24: thams cad kyi thams cad du tshig par mi 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-25: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas ma yin skabs ma yin par bdag mi bsko yi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-33: snyam nas des the tshom med par me phung gi nang du zhugs te blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-34: rgyal ba'i bka' yis me yi phung por zhugs gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:24b-35: de yis gzhon nu me yi nang nas blangs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-1: me ni zhi ba nyid gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-2: kha ba'i tshogs ltar bsil ba'ang skad cig de la byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-5: khyod nyams pa'i gnod pa dag tu ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-8: bdag rgyal po'i pho brang du btsas shing rgyal po'i pho brang du skyes par gyur kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhugs kyi phung po tsandan sa mchog lta bur bsil bar gyur pa 'di lta bu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-9: sngon chad ma myong lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-10: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa; khyim bdag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-12: de log par lta ba la phyogs pas re zhig len par mi byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-13: gcer bu pa de nyid kyi gdong du lta bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-16: mang du smra ci dgos; mes ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-18: gzhon nu shin tu skal ba chung ba 'di ma tshig pa las na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-19: 'di khyod kyis khyim du khyer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-20: khyod kyi khyim yang tshig cing khyod kyi srog gi bar chad du yang 'gyur bar nges so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-21: des bdag las gces pa med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-22: snyam nas de ma blangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-23: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa rgyal po chen po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25a-25: des gus par sgrim pa dang bcas pas lag pa brkyang ste de blangs nas kun tu brtags te gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-0: @25b bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-3: 'di ltar me'i nang nas skyes pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-4: de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming me skyes zhes bya bar gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de dag gi bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-8: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas ci nas kyang sems can brgya phrag mang po de dag gis thos nas khyad par rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos bstan pa mdzad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-10: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-16: rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-18: dro bar gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-25: nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-27: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-29: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-32: bslab pa'i gzhi dag yang dag par blangs te 'khor de dag las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-34: dge 'dun la bab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-35: de rgyal po gzugs can snying pos khye'u me skyes ma ma brgyad po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:25b-36: pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-0: @26a *// nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-1: dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-2: rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-3: de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-8: gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-10: rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do; ;de'i zhang po zong thogs te yul gzhan du song ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-11: ji ltar bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-14: lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-16: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-17: zhes lung bstan pa thos nas des zong bsgyur te rin blangs nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-18: des 'di ltar bdag gi sring mo de 'chi ba'i dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-23: lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-24: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-25: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26a-28: rdzun du ma gyur tam snyam nas des khyim tshes dag la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26b-0: bdag gi @26b sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26b-3: lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26b-4: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26b-5: zhes lung bstan par thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26b-6: thos nas bdag kun tu dga' ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26b-7: de yang 'chi ba'i dus la bab po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26b-11: de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26b-12: zla ba skar ma'i tshogs bcas sa la ltung yang srid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26b-13: sa 'di ri dang nags bcas mkha' la 'gro yang srid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:26b-14: rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni skam par 'gyur srid kyi //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:30b-18: zhes de dag gis 'gron po dag yang phyir bkug ste btsal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:30b-19: sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:30b-21: yang dril sgra 'byin pa nyid du byed nas de dag gis 'gron po dag yang phyir bkug ste btsal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:30b-22: sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med par gyur nas 'gron po dag nged la khyed cag chom po byed par sems sam ci na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:30b-25: tshoms gang gi nang na bram ze de med pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-1: dril de de bzhin du sgra 'byin par byed nas de dag gis de dag kyang de bzhin du tshoms gnyis su byas shing byas shing bkye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-2: tha mar bram ze de gcig pu nyi tshe lus par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-3: de de dag gis bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-4: des bdag la cung zad kyang med kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-5: tshol cig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-6: de dag gis btsal nas ci yang med nas btang ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-7: yang dril de sgra 'byin pa nyid du byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-8: de dag gis bram ze de yang phyir bkug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-12: khyod bden par smros shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-13: kho bo cag khyod la sho gam mi len to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-18: des gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang nas ras zung de phyung ste bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-22: zhes ngo mtshar chen po skyes bar gyur nas de dag gis de'i ras ya gcig phye ste lha la bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-25: sho gam mi len to zhes zer na; thams cad 'phrog gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-28: nged cag len par mi byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-29: lha'i byin gyis rlabs de lta phu mdzad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-30: nged kyis lha la bstan par zad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31a-32: des de blangs nas yang gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang du bcug ste song nas khad kyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-0: des tshong 'dus su ras zung de bkram pa na der yang karsha pa na stong gis nyo ba su yang med @31b nas des rgyal po'i khab kyi tshong 'dus kyang tshong 'dus ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-2: de na gzhon nu me skyes glang po che la zhon te rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ste tshong 'dus kyi nang nas rang gi khyim du 'gro bas de thos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-4: bram ze de ci'i phyir tshong 'dus ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-5: zhes sgrog par byed pa dri bar bya'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-7: de dag gis de bos nas me skyes kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-9: khyod ci'i phyir tshong 'dus 'di tshong 'dus ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-12: khyim bdag ras zung 'di lta bu karsha pa na stong gis nyo ba su yang med pa'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-16: des de nye bar bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-25: ma spyad pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-26: karsha pa na lnga brgya ri /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-34: khyod kyis mngon sum du bstan gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-36: ces des ma spyad pa de steng gi nam mkha' la bor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-39: de ma thag tu phyir lhung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-40: bram ze ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-45: me skyes kyis yang ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-47: des ma spyad pa gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:31b-48: tsher ma'i steng du bor na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-2: ngo mtshar chen po des mngon par dad par gyur nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-7: khyod rin ji tsam gyis bzhed pa de tsam gyis snoms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-11: khyod nyid la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir karsha pa na stong nyid sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-12: zhes des de la karsha pa na stong byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-13: bram zes de blangs nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-14: me skyes kyis de dag las gang spyad pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-18: de nas dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-19: rgyal po gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzang gi thog na blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-20: me skyes kyis khrus ras khang pa'i steng du skam du bcug pa rlung gis nam mkha' la khyer nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i steng du lhung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-23: rgyal po la 'os pa'i gos 'di lta bu ga las 'ongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-26: rgyal po nga las nu byung ba'i tshe ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-27: dgung bdun du ring po che'i char bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-29: lha la yang na bza'i char bab pa las na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-30: ring po mi thogs par rin po che'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag me skyes lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32a-34: 'di yang lha'i gos nam mkha' las 'ongs pa zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-0: de dag de @32b skad smra ba'i tshe nyid na me skyes 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-3: khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-5: nga la yang lha'i gos nam mkha' las lhung ba 'di lta bu yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-7: des lag pa brkyang ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-11: ji tsam na bdag gis khrus ras yin par mthong nas cung zad bgad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-13: 'di bdag gi khrus ras bser mas 'tshal nas 'dir mchis pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-16: da khyod kyis lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-21: ci'i phyir nga spyan 'dren par mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-24: song la yo lang gi zhal ta dag shoms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-26: gang gis lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur pa la zhal ta bgyid ci 'tshal mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-27: 'on kyang bdag zhal ta bgyid du mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-28: rgyal po me skyes kyi khyim du song nas bud med kyi 'khor phyi pa dag mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-29: dbang po dag phyir glon par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-32: ci'i slad du dbang po dag slar glon par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-35: mna' ma yin pas de ltar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-39: bud med kyi 'khor phyi pa dag lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-40: de ngo mtshar chen po skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-41: yang bud med kyi 'khor bar ma dag mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-42: dbang po dag phyir ldon par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:32b-43: me skyes kyis de bzhin du dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-1: pos kyang de bzhin smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-6: 'di ltar bud med kyi 'khor par ma dag lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-7: de ngo mtshar chen po lhag par skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-8: rgyal pos de'i bar sgo'i phyogs rin po che'i rang bzhin las gyur pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-9: rdzing chus gang ba lta bu de na nya dag rgyu ba 'dra ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ba byas pa dag mthong ste nang du 'gro bar 'dod nas lha ma dag 'bud par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-12: ci'i slad du chags dag gsal bar mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-15: chu la 'bog par bya ba'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-19: chab lta bur gda' ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-20: rin po che'i sa gzhi lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-23: nya rgyu ba dag 'di ltar snang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-25: 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ba las de dag rgyu bar gda'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-26: rgyal po yid ma ches pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-27: des sor gdub rgya 'phangs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-28: sgra kra la la zer te rin po che'i sa gzhi'i steng du 'jol bar gyur nas de ngo mtshar skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-29: nang du song nas seng ge'i khri la 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-30: mna' ma dag rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du lhags pa de dag mchi ma byung nas rgyal pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-32: ci'i phyir mna' ma 'di dag du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-35: 'di dag du ba ma lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-37: lha'i na bza' la shing gi dud pa'i dri gda' bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33a-38: des 'di dag mchi ma byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-0: rgyal po lha dang mi'i @33b dpal de dag la nye bar spyod cing phyir mi ldog pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-2: rgyal po'i byed pa dag yongs su nyams par gyur nas gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-5: me skyes kyi khyim du gshegs nas bag ma mchis par gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-9: khyod 'dir gshegs te bzhugs par mdzad dam ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-10: blon po rnams kyi mchid nas rgyal po'i bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-11: byed pa dag yongs su nyams par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-16: khyod kyis zhag gcig tsam rgyal srid byed du 'jug kyang mi nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-20: lhas dgung bdun lags par 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-22: dgung gcig lags par mkhyen pa lta /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-23: rgyal pos me skyes kyi gdong du brtags te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-27: mad do; ;dgung bdun kho na lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-31: me tog dag kha 'bye zhing 'dzum pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-32: nor bu dag gi 'od 'bar ram mi 'bar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-33: bya dag skad 'byin tam mi 'byin pa'i tshul las gda'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-34: me tog gang dag dgung la kha 'bye zhing gdugs la zum par 'gyur ba yang mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-35: gang dag gdugs la kha 'bye zhing dgung la zum par 'gyur ba yang mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-36: nor bu gang dag dgung la 'bar zhing gdugs la mi 'bar ba yang mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:33b-37: gang dag gdugs la 'bar zhing dgung la mi 'bar ba yang mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-0: bya gang dag dgung la skad 'byin cing gdugs la mi 'byin @34a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-2: gang dag gdugs la skad 'byin cing dgung la skad mi 'byin pa yang mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-3: rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-5: bcom ldan 'das ni; phyin ci ma log par gsung ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod ji ltar lung bstan pa kho na las gzhan du ma gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-8: rgyal po de me skyes kyi khyim nas phyir byung ste song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-9: gzhon nu ma skyes dgras me skyes kyi nor bu gcig brkus te khye'u zhig gi lag tu gtad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-10: des gang nas blangs pa de nyid du phyir song ste 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-15: des chang ba phye ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-19: des de rdeg par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-22: 'di la ci'i phyir rdeg par byed; khyim bdag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-23: kho bo yang rkun ma yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-26: bdag gis khyod kyi nor bu brkus pa de yang 'dis brkus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-28: gzhon nu khyod kyis kyang ma brkus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-30: 'di ltar khyod kyis gang nas blangs pa de nyid du phyir song ste 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-32: gzhon nu khyod kyi khyim yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-33: nor bu je snyed dgos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-34: gzhan yang nor rdzas ci dgos pa de dag ci bder longs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34a-36: nam zhig na bdag gi pha 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas bdag rgyal po byed pa de'i tshe blang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-0: ji tsam na ma skyes dgra lha sbyin @34b gyis bslus nas pha chos kyi rgyal po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-1: chos dang ldan pa srog dang phral nas rang gis cod ba na bcings te rgyal por zhugs nas de'i tshe des me skyes bos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-3: khyod dang nga spun yin pas khyim dag bgo bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-6: pha chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa de lta bu bsad de bdag nyid kyi cod pa na bcings nas rgyal por zhugs pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-7: 'dis gal te na bdag kyang gsod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-8: 'di bdag gi khyim dbrog par sems yang thag gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-10: snyam du bsam nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-21: zhes de de'i khyim du 'phos shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-23: ma skyes dgra'i khyim du 'phos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-24: dpal dang ldan pa'i khyim de mi snang bar gyur cing me skyes ga la ba de nyid du byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-25: de ltar lan bdun gyi bar du mi snang bar gyur cing byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-27: 'di ltar me skyes kyis nor bu dag bdag gis 'phrog par ma nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-29: snyam nas nges chom rkun ma dag bskos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-30: dengs la me skyes kyi khyim nas nor bu dag rkus shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-34: kyo btang dag gis 'dzeg par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:34b-35: steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na chung ma'i 'khor 'khod pas de dag mthong nas de dag gis rkun po byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-0: @35a *// zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-1: me skyes kyis de thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-2: chom rkun pa dag 'dug par gyur cig ces yid la yang bsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-3: tshig tu yang brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-4: de dag gang nas ji ltar 'dzeg pa de nyid na de bzhin 'khod par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-5: ji tsam na mtshan mo 'das te nam nangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-6: skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-10: chos dang ldan pa srog dang phral nas de yang khyim 'joms par byed pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-11: ci'i phyir bdag cag gis dang du blang bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-12: ma skyes dgras me skyes kyi gan du pho nya btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-13: nga la skyon du 'gyur bas de dag thong zhig ces byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-14: me skyes kyis chom rkun pa 'di dag 'dong bar gyur cig ces yid la yang bsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-15: tshig tu yang brjod nas de dag dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-17: gang gis 'di ltar pha chos kyi rgyal po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-18: chos dang ldan pa srog dang phral ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-19: bdag gsod par 'gyur gor ma chag gi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-22: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-23: zhes lung bstan pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-24: rnam pa thams cad du der song la rab tu 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-25: snyam nas der nor gyi rnam pa thams cad phongs pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35a-28: nad pa dag la byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-0: nor med pa rnams nor dang ldan par @35b byas te bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-1: de nas khyim bdag me skyes mdza' bshes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-4: phu nu dag gi ngo bltas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-6: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag me skyes kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-7: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-9: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-11: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas dge slong tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-12: tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal ma thag kho nar skra byi zhing snam sbyar bgos nas lag pa lhung bzed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-13: bya ma bum dang ldan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-14: skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-15: dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-16: de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-17: skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-18: mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-19: sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bka' par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lung phog nas des rtsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-22: sgrim pa byas pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-24: mi g-yo ba 'di nyid rig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:35b-25: 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:36a-1: rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis bcom nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:36a-2: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:36a-3: dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:36a-4: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:36a-5: nam mkha' dang lag mthil ltar sems mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:36a-6: ste'u dang tsandan du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:36a-7: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:36a-10: so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41a-12: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te rgyal po gnyen ldan gyi gdan ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41a-13: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu'i steng du rgyal po gnyen ldan nyid dbang bskur ba'i bkra shis la gtogs pa'i glang po che'i gtso bo rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs 'dzin tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-0: dge slong rnams kyi steng du yang glang po @41b che gzhan dag gdugs gzhan dag 'dzin du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la rgyal po gnyen ldan gyi btsun mo dam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-2: bsil yab gser dang nor bu las byas pa'i yu ba can gyis g-yob tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-3: dge slong rnams la yang btsun mo'i tshogs gzhan dag bsil yab dag gis g-yob tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-4: khyim bdag nyes med kyis rtog chen gyi mi zhig bskos te kva'i nang rje /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-5: song la bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis gdugs tshod ji lta bu zhig gsol ba rtogs shig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-6: de song ste brtags na 'byor pa de lta bu dag mthong nas ngo mtshar chen po skyes te ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'i yid kyis de nyid du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-7: de bzhin du gnyis pa dang gsum pa dag btang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-8: de dag kyang song zhing de nyid du 'dug go ;de nas khyim bdag nyes med rang nyid der song ste brtags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-9: 'byor pa de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar chen po skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-12: bdag gis kyang 'byor bar nus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-13: glang po che dang btsun mo'i tshogs bdag gis ga la 'byor snyam du rig nas khyim du song ste mi sgo ba bos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-15: mi slong mo pa gang dag lhags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-16: de dag ci 'dod pa dag byin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-17: nang du ma gtang zhig ces bsgo nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-18: de mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs te rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:41b-19: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-3: 'jig rten na mchod gnas gang dag yin pa de dag gi nang na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs mchog yin la; sbyin bdag gang dag yin pa de dag gi nang na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-5: khyim bdag nyes med mchog yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-7: snyam nas bdag nyid ko'u shi ka'i rigs kyi bram ze zhig tu sprul nas khyim bdag nyes med kyi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas mi sgo ba bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-9: song la khyim bdag nyes med la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-10: ko'u shi ka'i rigs kyi bram ze zhig sgor 'ongs te khyod mthong bar 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-14: khyim bdag gis bdag la mi slong mo ba gang dag lhags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-15: de dag ci 'dod pa dag byin la nang du ma gtang zhig ces bsgo'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-16: khyim bdag gis khyod la ci bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-17: khyod ci dgos pa de dag khyer la song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-20: kho bo la dgos pa gzhan ci yang med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-22: khyim bdag nyid mthong bar 'dod kyi; song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-23: de khyim bdag nyes med kyi gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-25: ko'u shi ka'i rigs kyi bram ze zhig chab sgor mchis te jo bo mthong bar 'tshal zhes mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-28: ngas khyod la sngar mi slong mo pa gang dag lhags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-29: de dag ci 'dod pa byin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-30: nang du ma gtang zhig ces ma bsgos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42a-31: de nang du 'ongs pas ci zhig bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-0: ci 'dod pa dag byin la thong @42b zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-2: bdag gis de skad bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-3: de'i mchid nas kho bo la dgos pa gzhan ci yang med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-5: khyim bdag nyid mthong bar 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-9: song la de nang du thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-13: khyod ci'i phyir mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs te rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-14: khyim bdag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-15: gang gis mya ngan sel bar mi nus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-16: de la mya ngan brjod par mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-17: gang gis mya ngan sel bar byed nus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-18: de la mya ngan brjod par bya ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-21: khyod kyi mya ngan gang yin pa smros dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-22: kho bos khyod kyi mya ngan bsal bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-23: des rgya cher brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-24: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-25: ko'u shi ka'i rigs kyi bram ze'i gzugs mi snang bar byas te rang bzhin du 'dug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-27: kho bos lha'i bu las thams cad pa khyod kyi grogs byed du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-29: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song ste lha'i bu las thams cad pa bos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-30: lha'i bu las thams cad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-31: song la khyim bdag nyes med kyi grogs gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-35: zhes lha'i bu las thams cad bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:42b-36: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi tshig mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43a-0: des de bas ches mdzes shing khyad par du 'phags pa'i grong @43a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43a-1: khyer dag mngon par sprul cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43a-4: lha'i zhal zas dag kyang g-yos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu'i steng du ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43a-5: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi g-yul ngor spyad pa'i glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs 'dzin tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43a-6: dge slong rnams kyi steng du yang lha'i glang po che gzhan dag gdugs gzhan dag 'dzin tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43a-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi btsun mo dam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43a-8: lha mo bde sogs lha'i bsil yab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43a-9: gser dang nor bu las byas pa'i yu ba can gyis g-yob tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43a-10: dge slong rnams la yang lha'i btsun mo'i tshogs gzhan dag pa sil yab gzhan dag gis g-yob tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43a-11: rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis rtog chen gyi mi zhig bskos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43a-13: song la bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la khyim bdag nyes med kyis gdugs tshod ji lta bu zhig gsol ba rtogs shig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43a-15: 'byor pa de lta bu dag mthong nas ngo mtshar chen po skyes te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43a-18: de dag kyang song zhing de nyid du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43a-20: de yang song shing de nyid du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43b-0: de nas rgyal po gnyen ldan rang nyid der song ste @43b sgor bsdad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43b-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43b-3: khyod kyis rgyal po gnyen ldan bden pa mthong bar gyur pa la tshig brlang po smras pa de; sgo 'di na 'dug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43b-4: song la bzod pa gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43b-5: des de'i gan du song ste bzod pa gsol nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43b-7: nang du gshegs la nyid kyi phyag nas brim pa dag mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43b-8: de nang du song ste bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43b-9: lha'i 'byor ba dag mthong ba dang ngo mtshar chen po skyes nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43b-10: khyim bdag khyod gcig pus gdugs tshod gsol ba'i rigs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43b-11: kho bos ni ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43b-14: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43b-15: de lta bu'i 'byor pas zhal zas dag gis tshim par byas nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:43b-16: ji ltar bdag gis yon gnas 'di lta bu la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-2: da lta 'dir yang me'i phung por bsregs par gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-5: lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-6: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang shugs mnyam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-10: brtson 'grus mnyam pas kun tu mnyam par gyur pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-11: mi mnyes par ma byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-14: las gcig tu gnag par rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-15: gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-16: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang dkar ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-17: las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-20: las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-21: 'dren ma rnams spangs te las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-23: khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-24: de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44a-26: lhung bzed glan dang spyad rnams dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-0: @44b gri'u dang khab dang khab ral dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-1: gtan pa dang ni mang po dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-2: drang srong chen pos rjes su gnang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-5: mnyan yod na dge slong zhig gi lhung bzed rdol nas des mgar ba'i gan du khyer te song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-7: kho bo'i lhung bzed rdol ba 'di glon la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-10: khas las byed du 'jug pa yin gyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-14: 'di rang gi blos phyir len par 'gyur snyam nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-20: phyi dro spyon cig ces bsgyangs par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-21: dge slong de nyin gcig bzhin der 'gro ba na skyo ba skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-22: de'i mdza' bo zhig gis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-24: khyod nyin gcig bzhin der 'gro na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-25: ci; de khyod kyi nye du'i khyim mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-29: 'di kho bo'i nye du'i khyim yang ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-30: sbyin bdag gi khyim yang ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-31: 'di ltar kho bo'i lhung bzed rdol nas de glon du bcug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-36: khyod kyis lag bzo bden par smra ba dkon no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-37: zhes bya ba ma thos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-38: kho bo yang bzo shes mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:44b-41: dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa @45a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-2: dge slong bzo bo dag yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-3: des dben pa'i phyogs su lhung bzed glan par rjes su gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-4: de dge slong de'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-5: tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-8: tshe dang ldan pa 'di lag pa 'ba' zhig gis glan du mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-9: mgar spyad dag kyang dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-10: zhes zer ba'i skabs de; dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-12: dge 'dun gyi ched du mgar spyad nye bar gzhag par rjes su gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-13: gleng gzhi ni; mnyen yod na'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-15: de dag lag pa dag gis 'dral nas ma legs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-16: lag pas dral bar mi bya bar gri'us dra bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis gri'us dra bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-19: dge slong zhig gis chos gos dra dgos nas des khyim bdag las gri brnyas te dras nas des de khyim bdag de la slar byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-26: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45a-29: dge slong gis gri'u bcang bar rjes su gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45b-0: bcom ldan @45b 'das kyis gri'u bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45b-6: shel las byas pa'i gri yu ba bsrub pas sbyangs pa dag 'chang nas bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis gri rjes su gnang ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45b-14: 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir to zhes byas ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45b-15: de dag spobs pa med par gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45b-16: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45b-22: bkra ba bcang bar mi bya bar lcags kyi gri'u bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis lcags kyi gri'u bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45b-25: de dag gri ha cang chen po dag 'chang nas bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:45b-26: khyim bdag dag gis smras pa /
