K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61a-0: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu @61a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61a-1: sems can de gdul ba la ltos pas de'i khyim du song ste khyim bdag rang bzhin bzang po de skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61a-2: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag nas dus dus su de'i gan du 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61a-3: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong med par gcig pu song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61a-6: ci; khyod phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong ma mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61a-10: kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong rtsva ka sha'i khrod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61a-12: khyod lta bu las 'thob par 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong kho nar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61a-16: bdag gi mchis brang la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61a-18: de 'phags pa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61a-20: khyod nad med par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61a-23: ji tsam na khyim bdag gi chung ma de zla ba dgu tshang ste btsas pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61a-24: khye'u mdog ngan zhing lus chung la skad snyan pa zhig byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61a-25: de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61a-26: nye du dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-0: gang gi phyir khye'u @61b 'di mdog ngan zhing lus chung yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-1: khyim bdag bzang ldan gyi bu yin zhing skad snyan pa de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming snyan pa bzang ldan zhes bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-2: zhes de'i ming snyan pa bzang ldan zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-3: de bsrings shing bskyed nas chen por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-6: chos gos thogs te ko'u shambhir bsod snyoms la zhugs so; ;ko'u shambhi na bsod snyoms la rgyu ba'i tshe khyim bdag bzang ldan gyi khyim du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-9: zhes bya ba'i tshig kun tu spyod pas kun tu spyad nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-10: de'i chung mas kyang bca' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-11: bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-12: khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i gdong du rtogs nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus khyim bdag bzang ldan la brda byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-13: des khye'u de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-15: khyod ma btsas pa nyid nas ngas 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu'i zham 'bring du phul gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-16: khyod 'phags pa dang lhan cig song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-17: srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-18: de'i phyi na 'dug pa'i tshe des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te de la lung phog nas des brtsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-21: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g-yo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-22: mi g-yo ba 'di nyid rig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:61b-23: 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-2: rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyi zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-3: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-4: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-5: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-6: tsandan zhag lon par bzhag pa lta bu; rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-9: so so yang dag par rig par thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-12: bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-14: nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-16: gus par smra bar bya bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-17: gang gi tshe des skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smras pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-18: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad khyab par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-19: sems can mang po dag gi rgyud la yang thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag skyed par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-20: mdor na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can dag kyang sgra snyan pa de la rna blags te nyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-23: nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi nang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62a-25: dge slong snyan pa bzang ldan 'di mchog yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-0: de'i skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa yid du 'ong ba'i @62b sbyor bas dge slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba rnams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-1: rang gi bya ba btang nas nyin gcig bzhin de'i gan du 'gro bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-2: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-3: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal; glang po che'i gtso bo padma dkar po gcig pa la zhon nas kha lo bsgyur ba dpal 'phel dang nam gyi tho rangs ri brag cig tu song ba'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis nang par skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smra bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-4: glang po che'i gtso bo padma dkar po gcig pas thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-5: des tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyi skad kyi gtang rag thos nas kyang yang rna ba blags te mi g-yo bar sdod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-6: kha lo bsgyur ba dpal 'phel gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-7: phan tshun nas lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-8: rkang pa dag g-yabs te bskyod par brtsams kyang de bzhin mi g-yo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-10: dpal 'phel; glang po che thob cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-15: zhog cig dang lam gang du 'gro ba blta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-16: des ci bder bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-17: de rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su song nas khad kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na rna blags te sdod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-18: tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos dag smras pa'i mjug tu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-19: 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-20: sa 'am 'on te bar snang gnas pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:62b-21: sems can rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-0: nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang @63a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-2: ces yongs su bsngo ba byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-3: de nas glang po che'i gtso bo padma dkar po gcig pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-4: tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos dag smras pa'i mthar phyin par shes nas yid dang mthun par gang dang gang du bskyod pa de dang der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-7: rgyu gang gis 'di gang dang gang du bskyod pa de dang der 'gro /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-12: skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smras pa'i sgra gang lags pa de dag thos nas glang po che 'di'i yid 'phrog ste dbang ma mchis par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-15: glang po che phyir ldog cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-16: 'phags pa de btsal la na bza' zhig dbul zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-17: sang nang par ri brag tu 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-20: de phyir log ste khyim du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-21: btsun mo phreng ldan mas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-24: des ji ltar gyur pa brjod nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-26: nga la gos byin cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-27: song la 'phags pa de la dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-29: 'phags pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis skad kyis gtang rag gis chos smras par gyur pa lta zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-31: mdog ngan zhing lus chung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63a-33: rgya chen po la mos pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-0: gal te ma dad par 'gyur ba'i gnas yod par 'gyur srid @63b kyi; thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-5: 'phags pa de la na bza' dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-8: khyod kyis kyang gos gzhan phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-10: gos gnyis kyis ko sa la'i pho brang dbul por 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-11: de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-12: rgyal pos chen po la 'os pa'i gos khyer nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo; ;de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug nas rgyal po glang po che las babs nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-14: da nang skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smra ba'i 'phags pa de gang lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-18: 'phags pa de la na bza' dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-20: tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-23: mdog ngan zhing lus chung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-25: rgya chen po la mos pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-27: gal te ma dad par 'gyur ba'i gnas yod par 'gyur srid kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-28: thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-32: bdag gis de la dbul bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-34: bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi lag nas dbul ba bsngags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:63b-35: rang gi lag nyid nas dbul gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-0: tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan nyin mo spyod pa'i phyir shing @64a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-1: ljon pa zhig gi drung na nye bar brten cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-5: shing ljon pa zhig gi drung na nye bar brten cing mchis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-7: de de'i gan du song ste bltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-9: de shin tu mi sdug pa mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-10: de ma dad pa skyes nas mi dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-11: bzhin phyir phyogs nas gos 'phangs te phyir song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-12: tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-13: gang dag nga yi gzugs la rtog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-14: sgra la'ang rjes su 'brang byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-15: 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-16: skye bo de dag nga mi mthong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-17: gal te nang ni shes gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-18: phyi rol dag la mi lta ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-19: nang gi 'bras bu mthong ba gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-20: de gnyis sgra yis khrid par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-21: gal te nang ni mi shes shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-22: phyi rol rnam par mthong gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-23: phyi rol 'bras bu mthong ba gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-24: de yang sgra yis khrid par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-25: gal te nang yang mi shes shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-26: phyi rol dag kyang ma mthong ba; ;kun tu rmongs pa'i byis pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-27: de yang sgra yis khrid par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-28: gal te nang yang rab shes shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-29: phyi rol dag kyang mthong ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-30: brtan po shes rab phyogs pa de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-31: sgra yis khrid par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-32: de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64a-33: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-0: tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis @64b las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-1: las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-2: mdog ngan zhing lus chung la skad snyan par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-5: rigs kyi bu snyan pa bzang ldan nyid kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-8: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-9: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-10: snyan pa bzang ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-11: gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-13: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-14: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-17: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-19: las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-22: skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-23: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-24: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-25: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-28: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-29: ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-32: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:64b-33: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65a-3: des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65a-4: rgyal po mdzes ldan gyis de'i sku la mchod pa dag byas nas mchod rten 'khor yug tu dpag tshad re re yod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65a-5: gnam 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa zhig byed du gzhug par brtsams nas de'i lag gi gla mi dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65a-7: las byed pa la brtson pa zhig bskos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65a-8: de na yang gla mi gzhan zhig yod pa des mchod rten ha cang chen po rtsom pa de mthong nas lta zhing shes ldan dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65a-9: rgyal po 'dis 'di lta bu'i mchod rten chen po byed du gzhug par brtsams pa; nam tsam zin par 'gyur ma shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65a-11: de la lag gi glas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65a-16: de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65a-17: lag gi gla des de phyir dbyung bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65a-18: des de la bzod pa gsol nas yang las bya bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65a-19: mchod rten de ma zin nas des yang 'phya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65a-20: lag gi gla des de phyir phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65a-21: yang shin tu 'bad de bzod pa gsol nas las bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65b-0: ji tsam na mchod rten blta bas mi ngoms @65b pa; srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dag gi mig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65b-1: yid 'phrog par byed pa zhig zin par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65b-2: de nas gla mi des de mthong nas 'di ltar las byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65b-3: bdag gi 'di la dpyas pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65b-4: ma legs pa zhig byas so /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65b-5: zhes 'gyod pa skyes nas 'di la rnam pa thams cad du mchod pa bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65b-6: zhes des de'i gla rngan ci thob pa de las gser gyi dril bu byed du bcug nas sems mngon par dad pas mchod rten de la btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65b-8: de'i tshe de'i dus na gla mi gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:65b-9: dge slong snyan pa bzang ldan 'di nyid yin te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:73b-6: bdag gis chu dag 'thungs nas ni //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:73b-13: de nas gang gis chu 'thungs pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:73b-15: gang gis chu ma 'thungs pa des ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:73b-16: brtson 'grus brtsams te shing ljon pa zhig gis drung du 'dug nas des ji srid du lus kyi mthu yod pa de srid dge ba'i phyogs dag byas shing gang gi tshe lus kyi mthu dang bral ba de'i tshe 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:73b-24: bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas pas skyes par mthong ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74a-1: yongs su gnas pa bsten te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74a-3: bdag tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74a-5: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74a-12: man d'a ra ba dag gis thu ba bkang ste kha dog shin tu 'das pas; mtshan mo la bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74a-13: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74a-14: 'di ltar sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74a-17: khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas sngon dge slong lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-0: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa @74b bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-1: des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-3: bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-6: lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-7: sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-9: bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-12: rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-16: rus pa'i ri dag las ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-18: ngan song gi sgo dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-28: mi rnams kyi nang du ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-30: zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-36: shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-37: de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-40: 'gro ba lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-41: skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-42: srid pa stong du mthong ba rab dkon pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:74b-43: thub pa da ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:75a-2: zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:75a-3: dgra thul g-yas nas yongs su bskor byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:75a-4: lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:75a-6: zhing pa lo tog 'byor pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:75a-7: dpa' bo g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:75a-8: nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa lta bur gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:75a-9: cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:75a-10: dge slong gcig shos de yang khad kyis mnyan yod du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:75a-11: de nas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste rkang pa dag bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:75a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:84b-12: rtsva ku sha la bzung bas 'byung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:84b-13: khyod lta bu las rnyed pa gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:84b-14: kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul du 'gyur mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:84b-16: bdag gi mchis brang 'di la sems can zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:84b-18: de khyod kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:84b-23: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu ba lang gi sha tshugs lta bu zhig btsas pa dang de'i nye du rnams lhags te 'dus nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas ming 'dogs par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:84b-25: nye du rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:84b-26: gang gi phyir khye'u 'di sha tshugs ba lang dang 'dra ba de'i phyir khye'u'i ming ba lang bdag tu gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:84b-27: zhes ming ba lang bdag ces bya bar brtags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:84b-28: de bskyed bsrings nas chen por gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:84b-29: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu snga dro sham thabs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:84b-30: chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:84b-31: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-2: des bram ze de'i khyim du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-3: bram ze des byon pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-4: zhes bya ba'i smra ba kun tu spyad nas rkang pa la phyag byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-5: chung mas kyang de la bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-6: bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-7: khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i gdong du lta nas des bram ze la brda byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-8: des khye'u de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-10: khyod ngas ma btsas pa nas 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul du phul gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-11: 'phags pa dang lhan cig song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-12: sems can de srid pa tha ma pa zhig ste; de'i phyi bzhin song ba dang des de rab tu phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-13: bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te gdams ngag byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-18: mi g-yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rtogs nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad chos nyid kyis 'jig pa ltung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-20: rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can du bsgoms te nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-21: sems gser dang bong bar mtshungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-23: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-24: ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-27: so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85a-29: rnyed pa la chags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-0: @85b bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-2: nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-4: gus par smra bar bya ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-5: de la las las skyes pa'i mid pa gnyis yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-10: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas kyi bslab pa ma bcas pa de'i tshe ni skyug cing mid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-11: gang gi tshe bcas pa de'i tshe ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-12: skyug cing 'dor bas de lus rke /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-17: mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-20: ba lang bdag ci'i phyir lus rke /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-24: des ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-27: gang la las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i mid pa gnyis grub pa des skyug pa lan gnyis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-29: kha bkrus nas lhag ma mid par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-31: dge slong rnams zas zos nas skyugs te de dag 'gyod par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:85b-33: gal te dge slong gzhan zhig zan zos te skyugs na des kha bkru bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-0: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag @86a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-1: rab tu phyung ba de'i tshe bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-2: khyim bdag rnams 'phya smod kha zer zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-3: dge sbyong sh'akya'i bu rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-6: ba lang bdag la sogs pa 'jigs 'jigs lta rnams kyang rab tu 'byin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-8: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-10: nyan thos chen po ri rab dang 'dra ba la skye bo'i tshogs phal po che ma dad par byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-12: ba lang bdag yul dbus su gnas su mi gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-13: snyam nas tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-15: khyod deng phyin chad yul dbus na ma gnas par mtha' 'khob kyi gnas mal dag sten cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-18: zhes tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-19: shing shir sha ka'i gzhal med khang stong par 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-22: nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-24: dge slong ba lang bdag 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-25: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86a-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-0: tshe dang ldan @86b pa ba lang bdag gis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-1: las de'i rnam par smin pas sha tshugs pa lang lta bur gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-4: ba lang bdag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-7: chu bo bzhin nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-8: nges par myong bar 'gyur ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-9: ba lang bdag nyid kyis byas pa'i las rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-11: las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-12: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-15: rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-17: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-20: khams dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-21: bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-22: las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-23: tshogs shing dus la bab pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-24: lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-26: sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-27: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-28: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-29: skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-30: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-31: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:86b-32: de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-1: gis rab tu phyung ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-2: rgas 'khogs nyam chung ba zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-3: de de'i lhung bzed 'khru ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-4: dge slong gzhan zhig dang lhan cig kha ton zer ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-5: ring zhig thogs nas de'i mkhan po des rang dgar zan zos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-6: de kha ton la chags pas mkhan po de la 'phyas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-7: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na zan zos nas bdag nyid kyis lhung bzed bkrus te mkhan po'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-8: da dung zan za ba mthong nas de kun nas dkris pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-10: ci khyod glang rgan bzhin du ldad cing bzhugs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-12: 'di kun nas dkris pas gal te cung zad cig smras na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-13: je thu bar 'khrug pa bskyed par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-14: gang gi tshe kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-15: snyam nas des de kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba dang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-19: khyod glang rgan bzhin ldang ngam zhes de skad mchi mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-22: khyod kyis nga su yin shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-23: 'tshal te; khyod kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba lags la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-24: bdag kyang de kho na'i gsung rab la rab tu byung ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-26: de ni; de lta yin te bden na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-27: 'on kyang rab tu byung bas bya ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-28: byed pa gang yin pa de ngas byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87a-31: 'ching ba thams cad las grol ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-0: 'ching @87b ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-1: khyod kyis ngag gi las rtsub mo smras kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-2: khyod kyis las de ci nas kyang bsrabs pa nyid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-3: yongs su zad pa nyid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-4: yongs su gtugs par 'gyur bar nyes pa la nyes par shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-5: des nyes pa la nyes par bshags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-6: gang 'dis dge slong dgra bcom pa la glang rgan zhes bya ba'i smra ba kun tu spyod pa kun tu spyad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar ba lang gi skye gnas su skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-7: las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis da ltar sha tshugs ba ba lang lta bur skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-8: yang dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-10: tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-14: smon lam gyi dbang gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-15: gang du smon lam btab lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-16: 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung de kho na'i gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-17: der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-18: yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-19: gang gi thad du rab tu byung ba de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-20: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:87b-21: de na 'dis smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88a-1: ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung gi thad du tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88a-3: bdag bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88a-4: bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye rgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88a-6: zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'i gsung rab la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88a-7: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88a-8: ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88a-9: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sh'akya'i rgyal po chen po sh'akya thub pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88a-10: bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu ston par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88a-11: ces btab pa'i smon lam gyi dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88a-12: bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88a-15: las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88a-17: gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-4: las gcig tu nag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-6: las gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-7: dge slong dag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-10: 'di las byin cig ces 'dam zhing 'dam zhing zas za ba dang 'brim pa 'khrug par gyur nas skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-11: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-13: dge slong gis bdams shing zas bza' bar mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-17: dge slong rnams zas za ba na lhung bzed bzed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-18: de lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed du lhung nas de rnams 'gyod de mi za ba'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-19: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-22: lhung bzed bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-23: byin len byas pa zhes bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-24: lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:88b-25: byin len byas pa zhes bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:89a-1: bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:89a-2: lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i nang du lhung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:89a-3: byin len byas pa zhes bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:89a-4: 'on kyang byin len gyi sems ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:89a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:89a-7: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:89a-8: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo 'khar ba'i mgar pa'i drung du song nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:89a-10: 'khar ba'i lhung bzed cig bya na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:89a-14: 'di nyid bdag gi bzo lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:89a-18: khyod la 'khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po ci 'tshal /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-0: zhes zer du 'ong @109b gi; song la de nyid la gnas gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-1: de gzhan dag gi gan du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-2: thams cad kyis de bzhin spangs nas nam sros te rgan po de nyid kyi gan du song nas sgo la brdabs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-5: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-6: khyod nad med par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-8: gtsug lag khang 'di na nub gcig kyang mi gnas par mchis par mi bgyi ba'i khrims su mdzad pa mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-9: bdag gi gnas mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-11: dge 'dun gyis de lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba mdzad pa legs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-15: kho bo snod mang zhing yo byad mang ba yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-18: khyod ma gus pa byas kyang gnas ster ba gang yin pa de la gnas chos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-19: de spobs pa med par gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-20: de'i gnas bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-21: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-23: gnas med par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro bar mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-24: dge slong gis seng ge bzhin gtum por mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-25: dge 'dun gyis kyang dge slong rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba'i khrims bca' bar mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-26: dge slong gnas ma bcas par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-27: seng ge bzhin gtum por byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:109b-28: dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba de lta bu bcas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zham 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong dang yul ma ga dhar ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te grong khyer sa dkar can du gshegs nas dkar can na gnod sbyin ba ku la'i gnas na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo nam sros te mun gnag cing khad kyis cung zad char 'bab cing glog 'byung ba na; bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110a-4: chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zham 'bring ba dge slong rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110a-5: ji srid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nang du yang dag 'jog la mi bzhugs pa de srid du nang du yang dag 'jog la mi 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110a-6: brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110a-8: 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de grong khyer sa dkar can na sa dkar can gyi ri la gnod sbyin ba ku la'i gnas na bzhugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110a-10: de mtshan mo nam sros te mun gnag cing khad kyis cung zad cung zad char 'bab cing glog 'byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110a-11: bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110a-12: ma la bdag der nye bar 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110a-13: snyam du rig nas bee d'urya las byas pa'i dri gtsang khang mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa mdzad pa'i zham 'bring na 'chag cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110a-14: de'i tshe yul ma ga dha pa'i mi rnams khye'u dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-0: bu mo ngu ba @110b gang yin pa de dag la de rnams gnod sbyin ba ku la'i ming gis bsdigs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-1: de nas tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong gis 'di snyam du bsam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-2: kye ma bcom ldan 'das ha cang yun ring du bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag pa mdzad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-3: ma la bdag gis de la gnod sbyin ba ku las bsdigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-4: snyam du rig nas la ba ldog ste bgos nas 'chag pa'i slad du 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-9: gnod sbyin ba ku la yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;mi blun po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-11: khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnod sbyin ba ku las bsdigs par sems sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-14: bag tsha ba dang bral ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyengs pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-17: spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-18: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ma dad par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-20: chos 'dul ba 'di la 'di 'dra ba'i gang zag kyang mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-25: 'di yang phyis rnam par dag pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:110b-27: nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:111a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:112b-4: ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:112b-7: khyod kyi khab kyi zhal ta pa gum na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:112b-12: ji tsam na zhal ta pa gzhan zhig btang ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:112b-15: bla skyes rab tu mang por phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:112b-16: sh'akya ming chen gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:112b-20: khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs la gnod par ma byas grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:112b-23: bla skyes 'di rigs pas mchis pa lags te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:112b-25: des ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de la smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:112b-33: des de ri brag gi zhal ta par bcug go //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-4: yud tsam dang sbyar nas bag mar blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-5: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-7: dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-10: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-12: de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-15: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-17: de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas ming zla ba zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-18: de bskyed bsrings te chen mor gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-19: de mkhas shing spyod lam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-21: ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-22: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bram ze'i khye'u de na bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-27: 'bras bu'i sman gyis rim gro byas kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-28: nad de zhi bar ma gyur nas ri brag pa des dpya nar ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-29: bla skyes phul ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad spyad cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-30: skyin po gzhan dag blangs nas 'on kyang sos par ma gyur nas de de nyid du dus las 'das so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113a-37: de na dpya nar ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113b-0: bla skyes su phul ba yod @113b dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113b-2: te por mang du phul mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113b-3: des bro 'tshal ba'i yo byad du spyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113b-4: 'on kyang sos par ma gyur nas skyin po gzhan dag kyang bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113b-5: dengs la de na lhag ma cung zad ci yod pa des bu lon sobs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113b-7: de na cung zad kyang ma mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113b-12: de'i bu mo de mkhas shing spyod lam dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113b-21: bu pho de dag ci dgar btang nas bu mo de ming chen gyi gan du khrid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113b-22: sh'akya ming chen gyi chung ma rgan mo zhig kha zas g-yo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:113b-23: me tog 'thu ba'i las rnam gnyis byed pa des smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:114a-7: su la yang ma stsal pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:114a-16: de me tog gi phreng ba bzang po rgyud par byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:114a-17: de'i ming phreng ldan ma zhes bya bar grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:114a-18: dus gzhan de khyim nas rang gi zan blangs te kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:114a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyang bsod snyoms la gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:114a-20: des bcom ldan 'das sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas shin tu bde zhing rab tu dga' bas rtog par byed cing bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:114a-21: 'di lta bu'i yon gnas yang dag pa la bdag gis bya ba ma byas pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-3: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brag cig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-5: dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-8: dga' mgur spyod pas bu khye'u zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-11: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-13: de dag bsrings shing bskyed nas chen por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-14: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-15: bram ze de chung ma dang bcas te shi nas bram ze'i khye'u de pha ma dang bral bas dben pa la dga' bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-16: des sring mo de khrid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-17: dgon pa'i gnas su song nas 'khod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-18: der de dag rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-21: 'bras bu dag gis 'tsho bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-25: nyes dmigs rnam pa lnga yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-30: byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-32: de bzhin du bud med kha cig la yang nyes dmigs rnam pa lnga yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-37: byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119a-40: de la bud med kyi dug rno ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-1: phal cher 'dod chags lhag par che ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-2: de'i sring mo de nyon mongs pa dag gis gdungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-4: bdag dgon pa'i rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-7: 'bras bus 'tsho ba'i rngo mi thogs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-9: des de khrid de grong mthar song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-10: de bram ze zhig gi der slong mo la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-11: des sring mo dang lhan cig slong mo'i phyir gcig car sgra phyung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-12: bram ze des thos te phyir byung nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-13: drang srong dag kyang chung ma dang bcas te rgyu'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-15: 'di bdag gi chung ma ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-18: su la yang ma byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-20: kho bo la ci'i phyir mi sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-22: dam pa ma yin pa sdig pa'i chos de spangs pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-23: de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis gdungs pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-26: bdag dgon pa'i rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-30: 'bras bus 'tsho bar rngo mi thogs pa med snyam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-32: nyon mongs pa spang rngo ma thogs pa'i slad du khyod la de skad bgyis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-33: bdag bram ze 'di la stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-36: chos dang 'gal bas ngas khyod sbyin par mi bya'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-37: khyod nyid shes par zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-38: bram ze des de dang de'i bsam pa shes nas 'byor ba'i dpal chen pos de bag mar blangs te rang gi khyim du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:119b-39: de nas des ming po de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-0: khyod kyis kha ba dbub par mdzod cig dang @120a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-5: 'dod pa don du mi gnyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-10: gal te khyod skabs skabs su bdag gzigs shing byon na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-15: de des gnang nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-16: de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin pas des slob dpon med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-17: rang byang chub mngon sum du byas nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-18: bdag gis sring mo de la 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-20: de'i phyir de'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-21: snyam nas de de'i gan du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-25: glog 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-26: so so'i skye bo dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-27: rdzu 'phrul la myur du dad pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-28: de shing drungs nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-30: khyod kyis yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bu thob bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-34: bsod snyoms don du gnyer ba lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-35: bdag kyang bsod nams don du gnyer ba lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-36: de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120a-37: khyod la bdag gis bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-0: khyod ni gzhan la rag las pa yin @120b gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-1: khyim thab la je dris shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-4: des khyim thab la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-6: bdag gi ming po rab tu byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-8: bdag nyid chen por gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-9: gal te khyod kyis gnang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-10: bdag gis zla ba gsum du bsod snyoms la spyan drang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-13: gal te 'di rab tu byung bar ma gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-14: bdag cag gis mi 'dod bzhin gso dgos par 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-15: de rab tu byung ste brtul zhugs grub pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-16: bdag nyid chen por gyur na lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-18: des de zla ba gsum du bsod snyoms la spyan drangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-19: bram ze de'i chung ma gnyis pa gzhan zhig yod pa des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-20: bdag cag longs spyod thun mong las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-22: bsod nams 'di lta bu byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-23: bdag gis ci'i phyir mi bya snyam du rig nas de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-25: khyod kyi dral gang lags pa de bdag gi ming po yang de kho na lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-26: khyod kyis gdugs gcig bshos gsol la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-27: bdag gis kyang gdugs gcig bshos gsol bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-31: rang sangs rgyas kyi sring mo de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-32: de'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir zas bsod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-33: reg bya phun sum tshogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-34: zas dman pas g-yogs te de la bstan nas phu nu mo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-35: khyod rjes su yi rang byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:120b-36: bdag gi ming po la zhal zas 'di lta bu gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-2: de yang de'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir zas dman pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-3: bsod pa dag gis g-yogs te de la bstan nas phu nu mo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-4: khyod kyang rjes su yi rang ba gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-5: bdag kyang dral la zhal zas bsod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-6: kha dog phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-7: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi sring mo gang yin pa des rang sangs rgyas la reg bya phun sum tshogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-9: zas dman pas bkab ste 'bul ba gang yin pa de ni lha mo phreng ldan ma 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-11: gang rang sangs rgyas la reg bya phun sum tshogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-12: zas dman pas bkab ste phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-13: tshe rabs lnga brgya ra reg bya dang ldan par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-14: de'i bar du yang reg bya dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-15: gcig shos gang yin pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-16: rang sangs rgyas la zas dman pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-17: kha dog phun sum tshogs pas bkab ste phul ba gang yin pa de ni rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-18: de'i tshe de'i dus na gang 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-19: rang sangs rgyas la zas dman pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-20: kha dog phun sum tshogs pas bkab ste phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-21: tshe rabs lnga brgyar gzugs bzang bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121a-22: da lta'i bar du yang gzugs bzang ba rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-0: las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par @121b smin pa ste gcig tu nag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-2: zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-3: dus gzhan zhig na lha mo phreng ldan ma sems can zhugs bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-4: nyi ma gang la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la bram ze mdun na 'don gyi chung ma la yang sems can zhugs par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-5: nyi ma gang la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de nyid kyi nyi ma nas sdug bsngal gyi nyen to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-6: ji tsam na lha mo phreng ldan ma zla ba dgu lon nas khye'u gzugs bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-9: de'i btsas ba'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-11: song la 'di phyi mo la phul cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-13: blon po rnams kyis de khyer te de'i gan du dong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-15: lha'i zhal nas gzhon nu'i ming gdags su gsol zhes byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-18: ngas dang po nyid nas bu zan ma'i bu mo 'dis ko sa la'i rigs 'di rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-20: blon po dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-22: lha mos 'di ma bltams pa nyid nas 'phags skyes po zhes kun tu spyad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-23: de'i slad du gzhon nu'i mtshan 'phags skyes po zhes gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:121b-24: zhes de'i ming 'phags skyes po zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-0: gang gi nyin par gzhon nu 'phags @122a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-1: skyes po btsas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la mdun na 'don gyi bu btsas nas de'i nye du dag kyang 'ongs shing 'dus nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-2: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-3: 'di gang gi nyi ma la ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de'i nyin mo nyid nas ma sdug bsngal gyis nyen cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-4: skyes nas kyang sdug bsngal ba kho na yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-5: de'i phyir khye'u'i ming ma la gnod ces gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-6: zhes de'i ming ma la gnod ces bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-7: gzhon nu 'phags skyes po ma ma brgyad po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-8: nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-9: pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-10: dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-11: rtse grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-12: ma ma brgyad po de dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-18: gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par gtso bo gtso bo dag gis rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du bsrings shing bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-19: gang gi tshe de chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge bslab ste yi ge mthar phyin nas brtag pa brgyad po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-21: rin po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122a-25: glang po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122b-0: skyes pa brtag pa @122b la mkhas bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122b-4: rnam pa thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122b-5: de rgyal bu rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122b-6: yul gyi dbang phyug mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122b-7: sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po tshan du phab ste gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122b-8: las kyi gnas gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122b-9: glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122b-23: sgra grags par phog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122b-29: gcad pa'i gnas lnga po dag la mkhas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122b-30: khye'u ma la gnod kyang ma ma brgyad po dag la gtad de zhes bya ba nas rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122b-31: de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge bslab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:122b-42: nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-2: snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-3: srid srung gi rig byed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-4: drang srong gargas byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-5: ma tha ras byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-8: bram ze'i las kyi mtha' drug po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-10: mchod sbyin byed du 'jug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-14: len pa dag la mkhas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-15: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'phags skyes po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-16: ma la gnod lhan cig ri dvags bshor ba'i phyir dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-17: de rtas kha khyer te ser skya'i gnas su phyin nas de dang de dag na 'khyams zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-18: ser skya na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams kyi skyed mos tshal du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-19: skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis ser skya na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-21: 'phags skyes po rtas kha khyer te khyod kyi skyed mos tshal du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-22: de rnams mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-25: dus la bab pa 'di yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-29: zhes de rnams go bgos te dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-30: sh'akya rgan rabs rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-33: 'phags skyes po bdag cag gi skyed mos tshal du mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-35: sh'akya rgan rabs rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123a-37: de glo bur ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-0: de'i nyes @123b pa 'ga' bzod pa gyis la phyir log cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-1: de rnams phyir log pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-2: ji tsam na 'phags skyes po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pas gcig nas gcig tu thos nas tshol zhing skyed mos tshal du 'ongs nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-3: skyed mos tshal kun nas khyab par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-4: skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis ser skya na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-6: 'phags skyes po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnams skyed mos tshal du lhags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-8: rta'i mi gtsang ba dag gis skyed mos tshal thams cad ma rung bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-9: de rnams shin tu mi bzod pa skyes nas sh'akya rgan po'i tshig bcag ste 'phags skyes po gsad pa'i phyir dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-10: 'phags skyes pos 'di ltar ser skya na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams bdag gsod du 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-11: zhes thos nas des mi zhig bzhag ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-14: khyod kyis ser skya na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams ci zer ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-16: ser skya na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams skyed mos tshal du 'ongs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-17: 'phags skyes po mi snang nas de rnams kyis mi de la bran mo'i bu de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-18: gar song zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-21: de dag las kha cig gis smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:123b-25: gal te bros par ma gyur na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:124a-7: de dag gis gla mi rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:124a-8: skyed mos tshal phyag dar byos la bran mo'i bus phyogs gang du bcags pa'i phyogs de'i sa dag 'o ra la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:124a-23: de dag nyid la gyur cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:124a-28: des nang mi rnams la smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129a-4: bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129a-6: 'di na bdag gis nor gyi slad du mchis pa rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129a-8: 'dod pa'i ched kyi slad du ma ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129a-21: grogs dang rtsod pa dag mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129a-22: skye bo dang skye bor lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129a-23: de dag rtsod cing 'gyed par gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129a-37: grogs kyi mi snyan pa smra na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129a-38: skye bo skye bo'i lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129a-39: yang 'di na bdag gis mthong ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129a-40: dge slong gnyis shig dge slong dag dang lhan cig gzhi 'ga' zhig gi slad du rtsod nas bslab pa phul te babs bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129a-41: de dag rnam grangs gang gis kyang sangs rgyas la mi snyan pa brjod pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129a-43: dge 'dun la mi snyan pa brjod par mi bgyid kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129a-44: gzhan du na bdag nyid kho na la yongs su smod par bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-0: bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du tshangs par @129b spyod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-4: yongs su byang ba spyad par ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-7: 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so; ;zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-9: bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-11: 'di na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag dgu ma par bgyi ba ma lags pa rnams kyang 'gums /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-12: dgum par bgyi ba rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-14: bdag don gyi ched du mchis pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-15: rgyal rigs rgya chen po shing s'a la chen po lta bu dag dang; bram ze rgya chen po shing s'a la chen po lta bu dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-16: khyim bdag rgya chen po shing s'a la chen po lta bu dag gtam mjug tu phyin pa la mi sdod par bar skabs bar skabs su bka' mchid mchi zhing ma gus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-17: zhe sa ma mchis par smra bar bgyi bar sems lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-19: dus gcig cig na bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs shing chos ston par mdzad pa de na lud pa'i sgra yang mi gda'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-20: sbrid pa'i sgra yang mi gda'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-21: de nas mi zhig gis lud pa'i sgra phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-26: bcom ldan 'das sbrang ma'i rtsis tshim par mdzad pa lta bu'i chos snyan pa ston par mdzad pa ma mthong ngam zhes smras lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:129b-27: de skad ces bgyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-0: mi de cang mi mchi bar @130a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-2: de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-4: de tsam du mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-5: 'di na da ltar chad pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-6: mtshon cha med pa'i chos mnyan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-10: 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no; ;btsun pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-11: bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan 'di yang mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-13: 'di na bdag gis dge sbyong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-14: bram ze kha cig mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-15: nor med par bgyis te tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-16: des zla ba dgu'am zla ba brgyad 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-19: mtshan ma de dag bor te phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag 'byor cing ldan par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-22: dga' mgur spyod par bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-26: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-30: yongs su byang ba spyod cing zhes bya ba nas srog gi mtha'i bar zhes bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-32: 'di yang bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130a-33: zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-0: @130b bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan 'di yang mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-2: 'di na bdag drang srong sbyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-3: rnying pa de dag la yid rton cing de dag la longs spyod rnams kyang stsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-4: grags pa yang stsol ba nas de dag gi srog gi bar yang stsol na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-5: de dag bcom ldan 'das la ji lta ba de ltar bgyi ba bgyid par mi sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-7: dus gcig cig na bdag drang srong yid brtan pa sbyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-8: rnying pa dag brtag par 'tshal nas 'khor gyi nang nas byung ste phyogs dog pa zhig tu mchis nas 'di ltar 'di dag bcom ldan 'das dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-9: bdag gang logs su rkang pa ston blta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-11: de dag gis rnam grangs du mar sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-13: dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-15: bdag ga la ba de logs su ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-17: de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-19: de tsam du rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-20: 'di na da ltar bdag 'di dag la longs spyod rnams kyang sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-21: grags pa yang sbyin pa nas srog gi bar yang stsol na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-22: 'di dag bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba de ltar bdag la bya ba byed par mi sems pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-23: ngo mtshar to; ;snyam ste zhes bya ba nas btsun pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-24: 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:130b-25: zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131a-0: bdag la chos las byung ba'i dad @131a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131a-3: bdag kyang yul ko sa la pa lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyang ko sa la pa lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131a-5: bdag gi rigs kyang rgyal rigs lags bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs kyang rgyal rigs lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131a-9: na tshod lo brgyad cu lon pa lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131a-12: sku na tshod lo brgyad cu lon pa lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131a-14: bdag kyang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang skur ba lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyang bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131a-17: 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131a-25: snyam du sems lags so; ;de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos sna tshogs rgya cher bshad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131a-26: da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-0: khyod kyis chos sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi rnam @131b grangs zungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-5: chos sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-8: tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan pa ste; mngon par shes par byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-9: rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-10: mya ngan las 'das par byed pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-12: rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-13: chos sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs blangs te kun chub par byas nas de lta de ltar gzung bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-16: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa la ring zhig thogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-17: spyod pa'i bu ring po yang cung zhig bsdad nas shing rtar zhugs te mnyan yod du song nas des 'phags skyes po rgyal srid la bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-19: dbyar tshul mas spyod pa'i bu la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-22: grong rdal me tsu ru di na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-23: de dag rkang gis grong rdal me tsu ru dir chas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-24: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan nas gtsug lag khang nas byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-25: spyod pa'i bu ring po mi snang nas des dge slong rnams la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-27: spyod byed kyi bu ring po gar mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-29: de lha nang du gshegs ma thag tu shing rtar zhugs nas mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:131b-31: rgyal po rkang gis song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyang ches snga ba zhig tu @132a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-1: rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-2: ji tsam na rgyal pos lam gar phreng ldan ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-3: dbyar tshul ma mthong nas des de dag la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-7: spyod pa'i bu ring pos 'phags skyes po rgyal srid la bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-8: de nas bdag cag lha'i gan du mchis mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-12: khyod kyis khyo'i rgyal srid nyams su myong zin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-13: song la da bu'i rgyal srid nyams su myong bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-14: nga yang dbyar tshul ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro 'o; ;zhes byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-15: der phreng ldan ma snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don cing ngu bzhin phyir log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-16: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang dbyar tshul ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu chas te rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas phan tshun 'khyams 'khyams pa las ma skyes dgra'i skyed mos tshal du 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-17: des dbyar tshul ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-19: song la rgyal po ma skyes dgra la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal skyed mos tshal na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-21: des rgyal po ma skyes dgra la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-23: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod kyi skyed mos tshal na bzhugs te lha gzigs par bzhed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-24: des thos nas sdangs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132a-26: rgyal po de dmag mang po can yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-0: khyed sus kyang ma @132b tshor ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-3: de la dmag ga la mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-4: bus rgyal srid las phyung nas de g-yog dang gnyis su 'dir mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-6: de rgyal po byed pa legs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-8: gzhon nu'i gnas na gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-9: zhes smras nas blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-11: gang ngas rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-12: bkur sti med par spyan drang ba ni; nga la rigs pa ma yin par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-13: dengs la grong khyer mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-15: de dag gis grong khyer de rdo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-17: gyo mo med par byas zhes bya ba nas lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-18: dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-19: de nas lam mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-20: grong khyer mdzes pa so sor khyad par du 'phags par byas nas dril bsgrags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-21: shes ldan rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-23: yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-24: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal skyed mos tshal na 'dug gi ;de khyed lha dang lhan cig tu gdugs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-26: ba dan dag gis bsu bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-27: de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra shing rta stong phrag du ma phyi bzhin du khrid de dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-28: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bsur dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-29: de yang ma skyes dgra ring du thogs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:132b-30: bru bas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-0: skyed mos tshal dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig @133a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-1: na; la phug gi ra ba zhig yod pa der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-3: la phug sbar gang byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-4: de nas des la phug gi rdog ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-5: lo ma dag zos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-6: skom rab tu gyur nas rdzing drung du song ste chu ngoms par 'thungs nas langs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-7: lag pa rengs shing ma zhu bas thebs nas shing rta'i lam du 'gyel ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-8: de 'khor lo dril ba'i rdul gyis kha gang nas dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-9: rgyal po ma skyes dgra skyed mos tshal du song ste phan tshun btsal bar bsam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-11: des phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa bkye ste tshol cig ces byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-12: de na pho nya gcig la phug gi ra bar phyin nas des ldum pa de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-14: skyed mos tshal 'dir 'ongs pa 'ga' lta yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-17: la phug sbar gang khyer nas lam 'di nas rdzing bur song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-18: de de'i rjes bzhin du song na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-19: shing rta'i lam na dus las 'das par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-20: des rgyal po ma skyes dgra la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-22: shing rta'i lam ga ge mo zhig gi phyogs su dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-23: rgyal pos kye ma kye hud ces smras nas skye bo brgya stong du mas bskor te phyogs der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-24: ji tsam na shi ba'i ro shin tu mi sdug pa mthong nas yang blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-26: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-27: nga'i yul du dus la 'das pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133a-28: nga la snyan pa ma yin par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133b-0: khyed kyis 'di bkur @133b sti chen pos bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du skyol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133b-1: nga yang 'di'i khog pa la mchod pa lhag par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133b-2: de dag gis kyang de bkur sti chen pos bsil tshal gyi dur khrod chen por bskyal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133b-3: rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133b-5: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag gi yul du dus las 'das na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133b-6: de'i khog pa la bdag gis mchod pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133b-9: ci nus ci phod kyis lus la mchod pa rgya cher gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133b-10: de nas rgyal pos de'i khog pa la mchod pa chen po byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133b-12: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133b-13: las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133b-14: la phug gi rdog ma dang lo ma dag 'tshal nas sug pa rengs shing ma zhu bas thebs te dus las 'das lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:133b-16: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134a-19: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134a-23: la phug sbar gang zhig rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134a-24: des ma la 'di re zhig khrus byas te 'ong ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134a-27: sangs rgyas rnams ma byung ba'i tshe 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas ngan pa dang dman pa la thugs brtse ba can /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134a-30: ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-2: lhung bzed blangs te ri brag tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-4: bram ze mo des de lus mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-5: sems mdzes pa la sogs pa mthong ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-7: bdag nyid chen po de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-10: des dang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha'i dbyings la 'phags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-11: cho 'phrul sna tshogs dag bstan par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-13: rdzu 'phrul la myur du dad par byed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-14: des shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la gtugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-15: des de la snying brtse bar byas nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-16: ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u de 'ongs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-18: la phug sbar gang po de stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-21: rjes su yi rang ba gyis shig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-23: bsod snyoms don du gnyer ba byon nas de la phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-25: de bkres pas sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-26: yid mi bde ba skyes te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-27: rab tu byung ba des de zos nas ci ste lag pa rengs shing gsud de dus byas par ma gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-30: bram ze'i bu gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-31: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:134b-33: rang sangs rgyas la tshig rtsub mo smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135a-0: lo mang po lo brgya phrag @135a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135a-3: lo brgya stong phrag mang por dmyal ba rnams su skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135a-4: las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis lan drug tu lag pa rengs shing gsung pas dus las 'das te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135a-5: da lta'i dus kyi bar 'di dang lan bdun du lag pa rengs shing gsud pa kho nas dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135a-8: las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kho na la 'bad par bya ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135a-11: zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135a-12: de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra /
