K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135a-14: ji tsam na ma la gnod kyis 'phags skyes po la 'di skad ces smras so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135a-18: gang gi tshe nga rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe ngas sh'akya rnams kha bdag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135a-20: ngas dang por bya ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135a-21: zhes de lta bu'i khyu mchog gi tshig rlabs po che gsungs nas gcig tu chad par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135a-22: 'khor gyi nang du sengge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags pa gang lags pa de dgongs sam /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135a-28: ji snyed smras pa de thams cad bya'am /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135b-1: rgyal po'i bya ba dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135b-2: rgyal po'i byed pa dag yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135b-6: dam bcas pa la brtan pa lags pas ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin sgrub tu gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135b-9: de yang mi dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135b-13: thog mar dam bcas pa lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135b-15: deng kho na gdugs kyang bzang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135b-18: bsod nams kyi gdugs kyang bzang bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135b-20: de dag gis ngo lon ma bshams par deng nyid gshegs pa'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135b-21: de nas 'phags skyes po ma la gnod kyis bslus pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135b-22: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135b-28: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135b-30: rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135b-31: de ser skya na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams kyi las chud mi za bar mkhyen nas ches sngar mnyan yod nas ser skya'i gzhir gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:135b-32: de nas bcom ldan 'das lam kar shing sha ko ta ka shun par ri 'chus shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:136a-0: grib ma chung ngu zhig gi drung @136a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:136a-1: du skyil mo krung bcas te nyin mo'i gnas pas bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:136a-3: bcom ldan 'das thag ring po nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:136a-4: mthong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:136a-17: bcom ldan 'das la gnyen rnams la gzigs shing thugs brtse ba mnga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:136a-19: bcom ldan 'das ni gnyen rnams la thugs brtse ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:136a-20: snyam du rig nas de nyid nas slar log go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:136a-25: ser skya'i gzhir byon te ser skya'i gzhi'i n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:136b-1: sh'akya rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las 'dir byon te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:138b-12: bdag gi nye du yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:138b-14: de'i tshe de'i dus na sh'akya shambha ka zhes bya ba zhig ri brag cig na rang zhal ta byed cing las kyi mtha' byed pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:138b-15: sh'akya rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa ma thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:138b-16: de yang so so'i skye bo zhig yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:138b-17: des 'phags skyes po bdag cag gsad pa'i phyir ser skya'i gnas su 'ongs nas phyogs che ge mo zhig na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:138b-18: zhes ji lta bu yin pa thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:138b-19: thos nas kyang khro bas kun nas dkris pas bskyed pa'i yid mi bde bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:138b-20: mod la 'phags skyes po'i dpung gi thog tu drangs nas des der skye bo'i tshogs mang po zhig ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:138b-23: tha ma ma shi tsam du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:138b-24: de nas 'phags skyes po yid mi bde nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:138b-28: 'di dag bden pa mthong ba yin pas srog chags grog sbur yang srog dang 'bral bar mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-0: @139a *// re zhig 'di dag gcig gis kyang bdag cag gi skye bo mang po 'di lta bu bsad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-1: gal te thams cad lhags par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-2: bdag cag gi sems can 'ga' yang mi 'tsho bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-3: dus kyis bcus pas chog gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-7: sh'akya rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-8: bdag cag las gang gis kyang 'phags skyes po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-9: 'phags skyes po'i dpung la bsnun par mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-10: gang zhig snun pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-11: bdag cag gi nye du yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-16: 'di nang du yang mi chud pa'i gnas gang lags pa de mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-17: de ser skya'i gnas kyi sgor song ste 'dug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-22: khyod kyis kho bo cag gi khrims su bca' ba dral bas da phyin chad khyod kho bo cag gi gnyen yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-24: khyod nang du lta ga la gtang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-27: bdag gis khyod kyi khrims su bca' ba ma thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-28: 'on kyang mang du smra ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-29: gal te bdag gis khyed kyi khrims su bca' ba dral na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-30: bdag gi 'khor phyir phyung zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139a-32: de dag gis de'i 'khor phyir phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-0: des de dag khrid nas bcom @139b ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-2: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la sh'akya shambha kas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-4: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gang la bgyi ba bgyi ba'i mtshan ma cung zad cig bdag la stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rdzu 'phrul gyis dbu skra dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-7: tshems dag cig gnang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-8: des de dag khyer nas yul ba ku dar chas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-9: de rnams kyis sh'akya shambha ka zhes bya ba brtson pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-11: pha rol gnon pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa zhig bdag cag gi yul du rgyal srid 'dod du 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-13: thos nas kyang grogs bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-15: sh'akya shambha ka zhes bya ba brtson pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-17: pha rol gnon pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-18: bdag cag gi yul du 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-20: de'i phyir re zhig tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-23: de dang phrad cing 'dong ngam mi 'dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-24: de dag thams cad re zhig gi drung du 'dus te re zhig 'dug pa de'i bar du shambha kas 'khor rnams phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas bang chen gyi cha lugs su byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-25: de dag gi drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-26: de dag gis 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:139b-27: zhes bya ba'i smra ba kun tu spyad nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-0: @140a *// sh'akya shambha ka zhes bya ba brtson pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-2: pha rol gnon pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-7: stan yang med na gang du 'khod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-8: des ral gri shubs nas phyung nas pha bong dum bu dum bur gshegs te 'di la 'khod cig ces byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-9: de dag gis mthong nas ngo mtshar gyi mig gdangs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-11: de la khyod 'dra ba de lta bu'i mi ji tsam yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-16: kho bos lta ci zhig nus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-17: de la skyes bu dpa' bo gzhan mang du yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-18: de dag gis thos nas sdangs te phan tshun smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-20: gang gis bang chen 'di 'dra ba de'i mi gzhan ci 'dra ba zhig yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-22: de yong bdag cag gi rgyal por gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-23: zhes de dag gis spring yig bklags nas de la spring yig gi lan byin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-26: bdag cag bka' bzhin bgyid pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-27: des spring yig gi lan khyer nas 'khor dang bcas te 'byor pa mchog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-28: yul ba ku dar 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-29: de dag gis de bkur sti chen pos bsus nas rgyal srid la bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140a-30: yul ba ku da pa rnams kyis sh'akya shambha ka zhes bya ba rgyal srid la dbang bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-0: zhes @140b kun tu sgra grags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-2: rgyal po shambha ka zhes bya bar ming chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-3: des der bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-4: sen mo'i mchod rten byed du bcug ste shambha ka'i mchod rten /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-5: shambha ka'i mchod rten zhes bya bar ming chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-6: de'i chung ma dad pa med pa zhig ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-7: de yang de'i btsun mo dam pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-8: des de'i ngo cung zad kyang mi chod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-9: des blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-10: dgon pa srung ba gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-11: de dag gis dgon pa srung ba byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-12: da dung yang de na ri dvags dag mi gsod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-13: 'phags skyes pos ma la gnod la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-15: sh'akya rnams kyis sgo rnams bcad de ra ba rnams su sbrengs nas bag brkyang ste 'khod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-16: nges pa'i dus kyis 'chu bas ci zhig bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-21: grong khyer thams cad pha rol gnon pa gcig bus choms sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-22: bdag rgyal po'i pho brang na spyod pas thos pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-23: mkhas pa rnams ni bzhams pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-24: rab tu sbyin dang bslu ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-25: kun tu spyad pa lnga pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-26: dpung gis don rnams sgrub par byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-29: de dag la dbyen bgyi ba dgongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-30: 'phags skyes pos de dag la spring pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-33: khyed la rjes su chags pa yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-34: khong khro ba yang med kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-36: nga'o nir bya ba cung zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:140b-37: dengs byas shing thob nas myur ba myur bar 'gro'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-2: 'on te mi dbye ba dpyad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-3: zhes de dag thams cad 'dus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-4: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-5: dbye bar bya'o; ;gzhan dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-16: de'i phyir gal te khyod 'dod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-18: skye bo mang po'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-19: zhes de rnams kyi tshul shing brim par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-20: skabs der bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-21: bdag gis lan du ma zhig dge sbyong go'u ta ma la glags btsal zhing glan ka btsal te phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du 'brangs kyang glags ma rnyed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-22: ma la da bdag gis 'di'i nye du rnams kha btag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-23: snyam du rig nas bdag nyid sh'akya rgan po zhig tu mngon par sprul te rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas des thog mar tshul shing blangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-24: sh'akya rgan pos tshul shing blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-25: zhes thams cad kyis blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-26: de nas blo gcig pas 'phags skyes po la springs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-28: de dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang nang du zhugs te zhugs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-29: ngas sh'akya rnams kha gdag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-30: ngas sh'akya rnams yongs su spangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141a-31: zhes smras pa'i tshig rjes chad ma thag tu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-0: skyes bu @141b mtshon gzas pa rnams kyis sh'akya rnams kun nas gsad par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-2: sh'akya ming chen gyis sgra de thos nas nye du la byams pas bskyed pa'i yid mi bde bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-3: rings pa rings par 'phags skyes po'i dung du song ste des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-5: dam pa 'os pa bdag la dam pa stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-7: khyod dam pa ci slong smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-10: bdag gi nye du rnams la mi 'jigs pa stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-12: ngas khyod kyi nye du rnams la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-14: 'on kyang khyod 'khor dang bcas te phyir phyung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-17: ji srid bdag chu'i nang du nub ste 'dug pa de srid du gang dag phyir 'byung ba de dag la mi 'jigs pa stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-18: des blon po rnams kyi gdong du blta bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-22: khyod kyi yum mes kyang lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-23: yab kyi grogs po yang lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-25: dam pa de stsal ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-29: sh'akya ming chen nye du la chags pas bskyed pa'i yid mi bde ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-30: snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis chu'i rdzing du song ste de'i 'gram na shing s'a la zhig yod pa de'i yal ga rdzing gi chu'i nang du nub pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:141b-31: des gtsug phud btags nas nam srog dang bral ba de'i bar du nub ste 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-0: de na ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i sh'akya gang dag gis tshogs pa @142a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-1: can gyi las ma byas pa de dag las kha cig ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-2: ser skya'i gnas nas byung ste gyad rgyu bar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-9: pho brang de dang de dag tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-10: gang dag gis tshogs pa can gyi las byas pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-11: ser skya'i gzhi'i shar sgor byung nas lho nas 'jug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-12: lho nas byung nas nub nas 'jug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-13: nub nas byung nas byang nas 'jug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-14: byang nas byung nas shar nas 'jug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-15: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-21: 'di na da ltar shar sgo nas nang du zhugs nas lhor 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-22: lho nas zhugs nas nub tu 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-23: nub nas zhugs nas byang du 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-24: byang nas zhugs nas lhor 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-27: mes po de chur nub nas ring zhig lon gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-29: blon po rnams kyis rings par chu'i rdzing du song nas brtag par brtsams pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-30: de tsam na dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-35: de che thang du kun nas dkris pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-38: ji srid du lam po cher khrag gi 'od pa bab par ma byur pa de srid du phyogs 'di nas mi 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142a-39: skyes bu dpa' bo rnams bsad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-1: chos nyid yin pas blon po rnams phan tshun bgro bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-4: sdig pa'i las byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-5: dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-6: 'dir 'di snyed kyi khrag cig ga las 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-7: rgya skyegs dag cig len du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-8: zhes de rnams kyis rgya skyegs blangs nas rgya skyegs kyi chu bum pa brgya stong du ma lam po cher phab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-10: bdag gi dam bcas pa rdzogs pas 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-12: de nas skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos sh'akya bdun khri bdun stong bsad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-14: bden pa mthong ba sha stag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-15: des sems can de snyed bsad nas gzhon nu lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-16: bu mo lnga brgya khrid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-17: gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag mo'i gnas zhes bya ba ga la ba der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-18: ma la gnod kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-20: khyod kyis dgra yongs su bskyangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-21: dgra 'di dag ci ste yal bar gzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-23: 'phags skyes pos gshed ma'i mi rnams la gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-24: 'di rnams glang po che dag gis rdzir chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-26: de rnams kyis glang po dag gis rdzir gzhug par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-27: de dag gis glang po che de dag gan rkyal du mnan te lag pa nas lag par sbed par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-28: ma la gnod kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:142b-30: khyod kyis 'di dag gi pha rol gnon pa gzigs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-2: lha la gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-5: 'di dag ji ltar gsad par bya ba dri'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-9: dong du stsol la steng nas lcags kyi shal bas bshal du stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-10: de bzhin byed du chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-11: des de dag dong du bcug nas steng nas lcags kyi shal bas mnan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-12: de nas gnyis shig bros te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-13: song nas de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed kyis bkab pa dang de nyid du shi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu shin tu bsnyung par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-16: de nas skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos mi zhig la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar song ste 'dug la bcom ldan 'das ci gsung ba de khyod kyis nyon la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-22: mi de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-25: nga la chu lhung bzed gang byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-26: des bcom ldan 'das la chu lhung bzed gang phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis der chu'i thigs pa gnyis gsum tsam blugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-28: de dag chu'i nang de nas du bar thul zhing tsi ri ri zer la sgra yang 'byin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143a-29: dge slong rnams cho 'phrul de mthong nas yid dad cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-0: @143b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-3: 'phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-4: bcom ldan 'das dbu bsnyung bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-5: ser skya na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams kyis sug las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-6: des nongs pa yang ma mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-7: gnod pa bgyis pa yang ma mchis par skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos bkum pa lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-11: gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag mo'i gnas gang du skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos sh'akya rnams bsad pa ga la ba de kho nar de rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-12: bdag nyid kyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-15: zhes dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rab tu mang po dang thabs cig gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag mo'i gnas gal ba der gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-17: bre bo dang rus mthun pa'i bram ze zhig gis bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-18: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-20: gang gi slad du skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-21: ser skya na gnas pa'i sh'akya nongs pa yang ma mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:143b-22: gnod pa bgyis pa yang ma mchis pa rnams srog dang phral ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-0: bsod nams ma lags pa mang po @144a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-6: gang gi phyir skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-7: ser skya na gnas pa'i sh'akya nyes pa yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-8: gnod pa byas pa yang med pa rnams srog dang bral ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-9: bsod nams ma yin pa mang po zhig bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag mo'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-11: de na ser skya na gnas pa'i sh'akya lcags kyi shal bas bshal ba las srog gi lhag ma cung zad lus pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas skad ngan bton to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyogs gcig tu gshegs nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-13: bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-15: ser skya na gnas pa'i sh'akya 'di rnams kyis 'di dang lan gsum gyi bar du sgra chen po phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-16: sngon nya pa byed pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-17: nya 'dod pa'i phyir gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-18: chom rkun pa byed pa'i tshe grong 'joms pa'i phyir gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144a-19: da lta ser skya na gnas pa'i sh'akya byed pa'i tshe skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos srog gi lhag ma cung zad tsam lus par byas te 'chi ba la mngon du phyogs pa'i tshe gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144b-0: 'di dag @144b thams cad kyi brdol ba la ni khyad par ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144b-2: tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144b-9: 'tsho ba des glang po che la zhon te 'gro ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144b-12: dpung bu chung dang chas te 'gro ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144b-13: nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po grub nas gnas pa lta ci ga la mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144b-21: las de dang zhes bya ba nas nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs nas gnas pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144b-26: sdig pa'i bsam pas rtog par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144b-27: des na 'di glang po che la zhon te 'gro ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144b-30: dpung bu chung dang chas te 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144b-31: nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144b-34: khyod kyis bya gag gsod pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:144b-40: ba lang gsod pa dag las de dang zhes bya ba nas nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas pa de mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145a-1: ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145a-3: 'di ltar ba lang gsod pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145a-4: sdig pa'i bsam pas rtog par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145a-5: des na de glang po che la zhon te 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba nas nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145a-7: re zhig byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyis kyang sdig pa'i bsam pas brtags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145a-8: glang po che la zhon te 'gro ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145a-11: dpung bu chung dang chas te 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145a-12: nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas par yang mi 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145a-13: skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes so /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145a-14: slob pas longs zhes smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145a-15: tshul khrims kyi gzi brjid kyi nye bar bcom pa lta zhig glang po che la zhon te 'gro ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145a-18: dpung bu chung dang chas te 'gro ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145a-19: nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas pa lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145a-23: ko sa la'i rigs 'di nas zhag bdun na sbrul gyis bltas pa bzhin du rabs chad par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-0: skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes po yang ma la gnod dang bcas te zhag bdun na mes tshig nas cho nges 'don bzhin dmyal ba @145b chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-4: gang mgal dum la yang ngan sems mi bya na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-5: rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-7: khyed kyis de lta bur bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-8: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-11: sh'akya lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-12: las de'i rnam par smin pas nongs pa yang ma mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-13: gnod pa bgyis pa yang ma mchis par skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos srog dang phral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyang sh'akya rnams bkum pa'i tshe dbu snyun tshabs chen pos thebs par gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; dge slong dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-17: ngas las byas shing bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-20: dpa' rgal bzhin nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-21: gdon mi za bar 'byung ba dag yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-23: ngas las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-25: las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-26: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-29: rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:145b-31: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146a-3: skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146a-4: bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146a-5: las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te; ;tshogs shing dus la bab pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146a-6: lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146a-9: chu bo zhig gi 'gram na nya pa lnga brgya gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146a-10: de rnams kyis nya gnyis shig rgya mtsho chen po na phan tshun rgyu rgyu ba las chu bo der zhugs pa mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146a-11: de rnams rab tu dga' ba skyes nas de dag nya rgya chen pos bcus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146a-12: de rnams kyis de gnyis kyi lus mthong nas gros bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146a-14: 'di lta ji ltar bsgrub par bya /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146a-20: 'di la ci zhig sgrub tu yod /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146a-32: de dag gis de ltar bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146a-33: de dag de ltar gcod pa na rang gi skad du 'o dod 'bod par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146a-34: de dag mi bde ba de nya pa'i khye'u zhig gis thos nas rab tu dga' ba skyed par byed do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146b-4: gnod pa byas pa yang med par gsod par 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146b-7: nya gnyis po gang dag yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146b-9: ma la gnod 'di dag kho na yin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146b-12: gang 'di gnyis kyis nya de dag de ltar bsad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146b-14: ma la gnod dag gis sh'akyar gyur pa nyes pa yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146b-15: gnod pa byas pa yang med pa rnams lcags kyis shal bas mnan cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146b-17: nya pa'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146b-18: nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na de yin te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:146b-24: gzhan yang ser skya na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams kyis las gang byas pa de nyon cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147a-3: ri brag cig tu 'joms su song ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147a-6: yang thog tu 'dzeg ste 'dug pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147a-9: gang dag 'dir 'dzeg pa de dag bobs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147a-10: thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur ta re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147a-12: ji srid 'tsho ba de srid du mi 'bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147a-14: shing phal mo che bcer nas yang tog de me btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147a-15: de gnyis tsha bas sdug bsngal bskyed pas gdungs te 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147a-16: bdag cag nyes pa yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147a-17: gnod pa byas pa yang med par 'di rnams kyis bsad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147a-18: bdag cag kyang 'di rnams nyes pa yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147a-19: gnod pa byas pa yang med par gsod par gyur cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147a-24: ma la gnod 'di dag kho na yin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147b-1: gnod pa byas pa yang med par srog dang phral lo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147b-5: gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gcig tu dkar /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147b-11: dge slong rnams kyis de lta bur bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147b-12: 'phags skyes bos sh'akya rnams de ltar bsad nas mnyan yod du song ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147b-22: gzhon nu rgyal bu rgyal byed lags so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147b-33: lha'i dgra su dag cig lags /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:147b-36: mdza' bo ji lta bu dag ci lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148a-3: zhes de dag gis de bsad de dus las 'das nas lha gya nom pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nang du skyes nas de'i mi'i rol mo'i sgra ma zhi bar lha'i sgra byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148a-9: bsod nams byas pa 'dir mgu phyi mar mgu /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148a-21: ngas de las dgongs nas 'di skad du /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148a-24: 'gro ba bzang por song ba phyir zhing mgu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148a-25: zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-1: de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-2: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'phags skyes po btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du ngom zhing rnam par ngom ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-7: pha rol gnon pa can gang dag yin pa de dag ngas rmeg med par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-8: nga dang 'dra ba su zhig yod ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-9: de nas 'phags skyes pos sh'akya'i bu mo lnga brgya khrid pa de dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-10: khyod kyis gang dag rmed med byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-11: de dag rgyal sras sh'akya'i sras //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-12: bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-13: khyod kyis 'dir smras ci zhig rung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-14: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-15: khros nas blon po rnams la tshigs su bcad pas bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-16: klu rnams bsad na klu yi bu mo dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-17: dug gis gang ba sprin gyis khebs pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-18: 'di dag la gor rkang lag rnams chod la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-19: nye du de dag nyid rjes myur du thong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-20: blon po rnams kyis sh'akya'i bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dmar bu can gyi rdzing 'gram du lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-23: lag pa'i dong zhes bya bar ming chags nas gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du mdo sde'i mgo la bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-24: lag pa'i dong gi rdzing 'gram na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:148b-28: de rnams sdug bsngal mi bzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149a-1: ba nyams su myong ba na bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dgongs pa lta snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149a-10: rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bskul nas phyogs der gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149a-12: ji tsam na bud med de dag thams cad sgren mor 'dug pa gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149a-13: gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149a-14: chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149a-15: gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149a-17: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis mi shes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149a-18: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149a-21: lha'i bu mo bde sogs kyis gos dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149a-22: chu khyer te 'ongs kyang bla na snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyed ma thag tu lha'i bu mo bde sogs kyis ras zung lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-0: mtsho chen @149b po ma dros pa nas chu blangs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-2: ras yug lnga brgya 'di dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-5: song la sh'akya'i bu mo 'o ni rnams dbugs phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-6: dbugs phyung nas rkang pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-7: lag pa dag khrus la gos rnams skon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-10: zhes smras nas des de rnams kyi rkang pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-11: lag pa dag bkrus nas gos rnams bskon no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sh'akya'i bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams kyi sdug bsngal rgyun bcad do; ;rgyun bcad nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-15: khyed nyid kyis las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-18: dpa' rgal bzhin nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-19: gdon mi za bar 'byung ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-20: khyed kyis las byas shing bsags pa rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-22: las la gzhol bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-23: ces gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:149b-24: de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dang bar byas nas dus las 'das te rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150a-2: lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150a-6: de rnams kyis mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150a-7: rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150a-9: bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dang bar byas pas yin par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150a-10: de nas sngon sh'akya'i bu mo byed byed pa'i lha lnga brgya po de rnams 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150a-11: bdag cag zhag tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'dong ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150a-13: ma la bdag cag zhag ma lon pa nyid du bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150a-15: de nas sngon sh'akya'i bu mo byed byed pa'i lha rnams rna cha gdub kor dri ma med pa; g-yo ba thogs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150a-16: lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha rdzas kyi me tog autpa la dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150a-20: man d'a ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te bcom ldan 'das la me tog rnams kyis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-0: rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs @150b par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-1: de rnams kyis de thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-2: ye shes kyis rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-3: de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas ched du brjod pa lan gsum brjod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bdag cag la sman btags pa 'di lta bu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-5: bdag cag la mas ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-9: rang gi skye bo dang gnyen sdug pa'i tshogs kyis ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-10: sngon gyi mes po rnams kyis ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-12: bram ze rnams kyis ma lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-13: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-17: ngan song gi sgo rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-20: thar pa'i sgo rnams ni; phye /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-25: khyod kyi mthu yis ngan song lam dag ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-26: shin tu mi bzad nyes mang ldan pa bcad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-27: mtho ris sgo phye bdag gi bsod nams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-28: shin tu bzang dang mya ngan 'das lam thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-29: khyod brten de ring bdag gi skyon bral zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-30: shin tu rnam par dag mig dag pa thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-31: 'phags pa dgyes pa'i go 'phang zhi ba'ang thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-32: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol mchog tu brgal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-33: 'gro ba lha min lha dang mis mchod cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-34: skye rga 'chi ba'i skyon dang bral ba po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:150b-35: srid pa stong du mthong rab rnyed dka' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-0: thub pa khyod deng mthong ba 'bras bu @151a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-2: de nas se mo do 'phyang dga' skyes rnams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-3: zhabs gnyis la ni 'dud pa byas nas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-4: dgra thul pa la yongs su bskor byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-5: slar yang lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs dong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-6: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-9: sh'akya'i bu mo lnga brgya po dag gis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-13: des lha rnams kyi nang du skyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-15: des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-18: 'di dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-19: tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-20: lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-21: ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-23: sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-27: skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-28: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151a-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-0: de'i gsung rab la 'di rnams rab tu byung @151b bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-1: de na 'di rnams kyis slob pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-2: mi slob pa'i dge slong rnams la lag rdum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-3: rkang rdum zhes bya ba'i tshig kun tu spyod pa kun tu spyad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-4: las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-5: lo mang por dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-6: las de nyid kyi lhag mas 'di rnams tshe rabs lnga brgyar lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-8: da lta'i bar du yang lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-9: rkang pa dag bcad pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-10: gang nga la sems rab tu dang bar byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-11: lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-12: gang 'di rnams kyis de na lung ma nos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-14: kha ton byas pa des nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-17: las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste dge slong dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-18: khyed kyis de lta bu bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-19: zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-20: de nas mi de 'phags skyes po'i drung du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-28: ko sa la'i rigs sbrul gyis bltas pa bzhin du rabs chad par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:151b-29: 'phags skyes po yang ma la gnod dang bcas te mes tshig bzhin sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-0: 'phags skyes pos thos nas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems @152a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-2: ma la gnod kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-4: khyod ci'i phyir phyag 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing bzhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-9: 'phags skyes po ma la gnod dang bcas te mes tshig bzhin sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-11: nga ji ltar sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-14: gang zhig bram ze 'ongs pa la 'tshal ma mi stsol pa de yang phung po brgya stong du sems na; lhas dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i gnyen bshes de snyed cig bkum pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-15: de de skad gsungs kyang rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-17: 'on kyang lha skyed mos tshal du chab kyi nang du khang bzang ka ba gcig pa zhig bgyid du stsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-18: lha der gshegs nas dgung bdun du bzhugs la dgung bdun 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-19: slar mnyan yod du gshegs par mdzad cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-22: zhes de btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te der song nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-23: nyin zhag gcig thal pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-24: ma la gnod kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-26: dgung zhag bdun las gcig ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-28: lhag ma dgung zhag drug mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152a-29: dgung zhag drug 'das nas mnyan yod du gshegs par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-0: zhes bya ba nas nyin zhag @152b gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-3: deng kho na la mnyan yod du gshegs par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-4: zhes bya ba'i bar de bzhin du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-5: de na yul ngan zhig kyang byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-7: rgyan la dga' ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-8: btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-10: bdag cag deng mnyan yod du 'dong dgos pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-12: zhes de rnams kyis rgyan thogs par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-13: de na btsun mo'i 'khor zhig gis sngas nang tshangs can gyi steng du nor bu me shel bzhag nas rgyan thogs par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-14: ji tsam na yul ngan sangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-15: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis me shel gyi thog tu bab nas me byung ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-16: sngas nang tshangs can la mched do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-17: de las kyang khang bzang la mched nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-21: ma la gnod tshig bzhin 'bros par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-22: ji tsam na mi ma yin pa dag gis sgo rnams bcad nas 'phags skyes pos tshig bzhin du smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-27: zhes de dag de skad du 'o dod 'bod cing dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-29: sdig pa byas pas 'dir tshig phyi mar tshig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-30: gnyis kar tshig ste de ni bdag nyid kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:152b-31: las rnams smin mthong de tshig rab tu tshig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-0: 'gro ba ngan par song ba phyir zhing @153a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-2: sdig pa byas pa 'dir smre phyi mar smre //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-3: gnyis kar smre ste de ni bdag nyid kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-4: las rnams smin mthong de smre rab tu smre //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-5: 'gro ba ngan par song ba phyir zhing smre //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-7: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-9: tshigs su bcad pa 'di bdag gis ma 'tshal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-12: skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes po de ma la gnod dang bcas te mes tshig bzhin dmyal ba mnar med par song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-13: ngas de las dgongs nas; sdig pa byas pa 'dir tshig phyi mar tshig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-15: 'gro ba ngan par song ba phyir zhing smre //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-16: zhes bya ba'i bar gsungs pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-17: gang gi tshe 'phags skyes pos sh'akya rnams bsad pa de'i tshe sh'akya'i bu mo rnams kyis de rnams kyi rgyan dag mthong nas ngu bar brtsams te de rnams kyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-19: 'phags pa rnams la mngon par dad pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-22: zhes de rnams kyis rgyan de dag dge slong rnams la phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-23: drug sde rnams kyis rgyan de dag thogs nas ser skya'i gnas su zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-24: sh'akya'i bu mo rnams kyis de dag mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-25: de bzhin du ngu bar gyur cing smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153a-27: bdag cag gis de'i slad du 'di dag phul na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-0: nyes @153b dmigs de nyid byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-2: de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-4: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa; nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-6: dge slong rnams rgyan thogs pa las gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-8: dge slong gis rgyan spel ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-12: rgyan sna tshogs gzhan ci yang rung ba yang thogs par mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-16: blangs pa dang ni bslab pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-17: du ba'i ri lu sman gce'u bcas; ;lhung bzed snod dang zungs dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-20: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-21: ri brag cig tu khyim bdag cig gnas pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-22: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-24: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-25: dus gzhan zhig na de nye du rnams kyang zad par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-27: longs spyod dag kyang zad nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-29: bdag rgas pas nor bsgrub par bya yang mi nus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-30: bdag la longs spyod kyang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-31: bdag gi nye du rnams kyang dus las 'das pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:153b-33: snyam du rig nas des chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154a-2: nga la longs spyod dag kyang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154a-3: nga'i nye du rnams kyang dus las 'das pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154a-4: khyod la dris te song la rab tu 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154a-5: khyim bdag de drang po zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154a-7: g-yo kun tu spyod cing rtag tu skyes pa gzhan la lta ba zhig pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154a-11: 'on kyang dus dus su bltar spyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154a-13: zhes dam bcas nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste dge slong zhig gi drung du phyin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon lnga yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154a-22: rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya ba nyid du 'os te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154a-24: bdag gis rang gi don ma 'dres pa thob par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154a-25: bdag gang dag gi bran dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154a-29: dga' mgur 'gror med pa yin pa de dag gis mchod par bya bar 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154a-30: bstod par bya bar 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154a-31: mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-0: bde ba bla na med pa @154b thob par yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-1: bdag mya ngan las cangs pa grub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-2: bde ba bla na med pa ma thob pa las yongs su nyams kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-4: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos skyes bu dam pa yang dag par song ba mchog rnams kyis rnam grangs du mar rab tu 'byung ba bsngags par yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid do; ;zhes bka' stsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-5: khyod kyis sems bskyed pa dge'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-6: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-7: ces des de rab tu phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-8: bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-9: de nas zhag gnyis gsum zhig kun spyad pa'i chos bslab nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-11: ri dvags kyis ri dvags mi sos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-12: mnyan yod rgya chen por rang gi spyod yul du pha'i yul du bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing 'tsho bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-13: de phyi de nyin snga dro sham thabs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-15: lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-16: de bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na rang gi chung ma 'dra ba'i bud med cig mthong nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:154b-17: bdag gi sngon gyi chung ma de la rab tu byung nas bltar 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-0: de'i phyir bdag da gzod rab @155a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-1: tu byung ba yin pas dus cung zad cig bsdad la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-2: de mi dga' bar mi 'gyur bar de bltar 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-3: snyam nas bsod snyoms la rgyus te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-4: des dus cung zhig bsdad nas mkhan po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-6: bdag la sngon gyi mchis brang zhig mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-7: de la bdag gis rab tu byung nas bltar mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-9: de'i slad du gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-13: song la khyod kyis sems srungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-16: zhes smras nas chas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-17: rim gyis ri brag der phyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-18: des de rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-19: de dga' ba dang bcas shing myur ba myur bas bsu nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-23: ring mo zhig lon nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-24: zhes smras nas reg par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-27: chos gos dag blangs nas mnyel bsor gzhug mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-31: mkhan pos nga la khyod kyis sems srungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-35: khyod sems srung la rag mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-36: bdag gis bkag gam ci zhes des de'i chos gos dag blangs nas stan bting ste rkang pa bkrus nas bskus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-37: de nas khrus byas nas zan byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155a-38: de yang de nyid du zan bza' bar 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-3: khyod dang lhan cig zan zos nas ring mo zhig lon no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-5: mkhan pos nga la khyod kyis sems srungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-9: khyod sems srung la rag mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-11: bdag khyod dang lhan cig zan zos nas ring mo zhig lon pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-13: zhes des de dang lhan cig zan zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-14: de nas mal bshams nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-16: gzims mal 'dir shul gyis mnyel ba'i mnyel sos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-17: des rkang pa bkrus nas nyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-18: de yang de nyid du nyal bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-23: khyod dang lhan cig nyal nas ring mo zhig lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-26: mkhan pos nga la khyod kyis sems srungs shig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-29: khyod sems srung la rag mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-31: khyod dang bdag lhan cig nyal nas ring mo zhig lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-32: gdon mi za bar nyal bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-37: snyam nas des de'i mgul nas 'jus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-39: reg pa'i dug can yin pas reg pa tsam gyis log par spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:155b-40: dus ring zhig 'dug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-0: 'di dang bdag lhan cig gsang ba byas pa gang yin pa de @156a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-1: dge slong rnams kyis mi shes pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-2: skye bo mang pos shes par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-3: des na de dag gis bskrad pas slar 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-4: snyam du bsam nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-6: de bzhin du ji ltar bzhud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-7: lam rgyags kyi zong karsha pa na dag snoms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-10: dge slong rnams dbyig la mi reg na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-14: bdag gis ci nas kyang mi reg pa de ltar bgyi'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-16: ces des dbyig thum por bcug nas bcings te 'khar gsil gyi rtsa ba la btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-18: sred pas ldongs pa rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-19: mi byed pa cung zad kyang med pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-20: des de khyer te song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-21: rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-22: drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-23: drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stong pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-24: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-25: de thag ring po nas mthong nas skra spra ba'i me tog lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-26: smin ma rab tu 'phyang ba zhig nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156a-27: 'di dge slong gnas brtan zhig 'ong gi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-0: tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas @156b bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-4: mkhan po yang mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-6: snyam du bsam nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-11: bdag sngon gyi mchis brang zhig mchis pa bltar mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-16: byas pa gzo ba zhig go; byas pa gzo ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-17: mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-21: 'di ltar byas pa gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-22: byas pa tshor bar bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-23: byas pa chung ngu yang chud gzan par mi bya na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-24: chen po lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-25: sngon gyi chung ma mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-32: 'khar gsil gyi rtsa ba la 'phyang ba'o ni ci yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-34: des shul rgyags kyi zong du karsha pa na dag cig stsal ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-36: khyod lta bsod nams byas pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-37: sngon gyi chung ma yang mthong la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-40: khyod kyi bka' drin lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-43: re zhig 'di la dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-44: snyam nas des de la tshig 'jam po brjod pa'i tshul gyis thams cad dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:156b-45: rgan zhugs de drang po'i rang bzhin can zhig pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-4: de thams cad mkhan po la smros shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-5: khyod kyi mkhan po yid dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-6: de de ltar bslus pas ji ltar gyur pa mkhan po la bsnyad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-7: des kyang dge slong rnams la bsnyad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-8: dge slong rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; dge slong dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-10: skyes bu gti mug 'di sbyor ba nyams kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-16: rab tu byung ma thag tu phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi rgyas par shod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-19: mnyan yod na dge slong dga' ba can zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-20: rtag tu dgon pa nags mtha'i gnas mal dag na bsam gtan byed pa zhig pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-21: de'i ming bsam gtan pa dga' ba can zhes bya bar chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-22: de gang gi tshe skyil mo krung bcas nas bsam gtan byed pa'i tshe bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis gtses so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-23: de dus gzhan zhig na skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha mo zhig gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-24: de'i skyil mo krung gi steng du 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157a-26: reg pa'i dug can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-0: des de dang lhan cig log @157b par spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-1: log par spyad ma thag tu zug rngus zug pa bzhin du gnod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-3: bdag gi mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-7: bdag gis bcab pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-8: re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-9: gal te skal pa yod pa zhig tu gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-10: gnas so; ;'on te med na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-17: ngom zung gnag cing mchi ma dang bcas bzhin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-18: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor dge slong brgya stong du ma'i gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs te chos ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' ba can rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-21: gal te dga' ba can la ma smras na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-22: gang na khrag dron por skyugs nas dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-24: tshe dang ldan pa dga' ba can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-25: dga' ba can 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-26: khyod ci ste ngom zung gnag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:157b-32: mi dga' ba can lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-3: bdag gis bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-5: bcab pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcab lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-7: khyod ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa la slob par spro'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-12: dge slong dga' ba can gyis spyad par bya ba ma yin pa spyad kyang sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-13: 'di phas pham par ma gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-16: 'di lta bu gang yin pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa'i sdom pa byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-17: sbyin pa yang 'di ltar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-18: gnas mal bshams nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-19: dge slong dga' ba can gyis rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byas la; rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-20: thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-21: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-22: bdag dge slong dga' ba can zhes bgyi bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-23: bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158a-25: bcab pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158b-0: bdag dge slong dga' ba can dge @158b 'dun las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa gsol na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158b-1: dge 'dun thugs brtse ba can btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:158b-2: bdag dge slong dga' ba can la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsal du gsol /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173a-9: nyal ba dag ston par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173a-10: me'i khams la yang snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173a-11: me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173a-17: shel gyi mdog lta bu dag stan par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173a-18: cho 'phrul zung dag kyang ston par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173a-19: lus kyi smad nas me 'bar la lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173a-20: lus kyi stod nas me 'bar la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173a-21: lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'byung bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173a-22: shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173a-25: byang gi phyogs su yang de bzhin byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-0: 'di ltar @173b phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi po dag ston par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-1: bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-2: dge slong ma lnga brgya po de dag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-3: bsam gtan dang po las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-4: gnyis pa las gsum pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-5: gsum pa las bsam gtan bzhi pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-6: bzhi pa las nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-7: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-8: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las ci yang med pa'i skye mched la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-9: ci yang med pa'i skye mched las 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-10: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas yang ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-11: ci yang med pa'i skye mched las rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-12: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-13: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las bsam gtan bzhi pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-14: bzhi pa las gsum pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-15: gsum pa las gnyis pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-16: gnyis pa las bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-17: de nas bsam gtan dang po de nyid la brten nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:173b-18: dge slong ma lnga brgya po de dag kyang de bzhin du lugs dang mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174a-1: par zhugs nas bsam gtan dang po nyid la brten te yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174a-2: skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi mya ngan las 'das ma thag tu sa chen po g-yos par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174a-5: bar snang la lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174a-6: de nas dge slong gang ri rab kyi bang rim dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174a-11: dben pa'i gnas mal dag na bsam gtan byed pa de dag gis sa chen po g-yos par rig nas sa chen po 'di ci'i phyir g-yos zhes bsam pa la zhugs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174a-12: ji tsam na skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174a-13: sangs rgyas kyi sru yongs su mya ngan las 'das na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174a-14: de'i lus la mchod pa lhag par bya ba la brtson par bya'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174a-16: snyam nas de dag shing dri zhim po dag khyer nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi'i dbyar khang du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyang nyan thos chen po kun shes koondin+ya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174a-23: mo'u 'gal gyi bu la sogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-0: gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dag dang thabs cig tu skye rgu'i bdag mo chen @174b mo goo'u ta mi'i dbyar khang du gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-1: de bzhin du yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-5: yul gyi mi rnams kyi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-6: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-7: ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-8: bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-10: gzhan yang yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag kyang skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi'i dbyar khang du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-11: de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rin po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-12: gos sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i khyogs lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-20: rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-21: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-24: sgra gcan zin gyis skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi'i khyogs bteg go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phyag g-yas pas bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-26: dge slong lhag ma rnams kyis kyang dge slong ma lhag ma rnams kyi khyogs bteg go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-27: de nas mchod pa chen po byas te khyer nas sa phyogs bar skabs dben sar khyogs rnams bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:174b-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175a-0: dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gi lus las bla gos phud nas dge slong rnams @175a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175a-3: skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175a-4: dge slong ma lnga brgya po 'di dag lo brgya nyi shu lon yang lus la gnyer ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175a-5: skra dkar med cing bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu la ltos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175a-6: de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175a-10: yul mi dang bcas pas dri sna tshogs kyi shing gi phung po spungs nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya po'i sku gdung dag bsregs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mi rtag pa dang ldan pa'i chos dag bshad nas gtsug lag khang du gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175a-12: gshegs nas kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175a-13: bzhugs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175a-15: 'di ltar sbrid pa byung ba la sos zhes zer ba la nyes dmigs 'di lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175a-16: gzhan dag kyang yod pas de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175a-17: dge slong gis sbrid pa byung ba la sos zhes brjod par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175a-20: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175a-22: skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-0: des 'di dag skyes nas @175b dgung lo brgya nyi shu lags kyang lus la gnyer ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-2: bu mo dgung lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-5: skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-7: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-8: gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-9: skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-11: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-12: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-15: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-17: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-20: skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-21: bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-22: las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-23: tshogs shing dus la bab ba na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-24: las can rnams la 'bras bur smin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:175b-26: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-0: ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas de grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi gnas na brten cing @176a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-2: zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-3: gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-4: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe rgyal po kri kri zhes bya bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-5: de'i sku la sku'i mchod pa byas nas lam po che'i bzhi mdor rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-6: gnam 'phang du dpag tshad phyed yod pa byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-7: rgyal po kri kri'i btsun mo dam pa la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya po de dag rgas pa'i gnas skabs na lus la gnyer ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-8: skra dkar byung nas rgyal pos spangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-9: de dag phan tshun smra bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-11: lhas da bdag cag ci'i phyir spangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-12: de dag las kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-14: bdag cag da lus gnyer ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-15: skra dkar can du gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-16: de'i phyir bdag cag spangs mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-20: da bdag cag lha la ji zhig bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-22: na tshod dang ldan pa gzhan dag yod pa de dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176a-23: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi mchod rten gyi drung du dong nas mchod pa byas la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176b-0: de nas bdag @176b cag phyin chad 'khor bar lus la gnyer ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176b-1: skra dkar can du ma gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176b-2: ces smon lam gdab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176b-6: zhes de dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la dri dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176b-11: ba dan dag gis mchod pa byas nas me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dri zhim zhing ma rnying pa'i chun po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176b-12: phreng ba yid du 'ong ba dag btags nas bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176b-13: 'od srung la mchod pa dgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa 'dis bdag cag skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176b-15: skra dkar mchis par ma gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176b-19: rgyal po kri kri'i btsun mo dam pa la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176b-20: skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176b-21: 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la mchod pa byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176b-22: smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin bas da ltar skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon yang lus la gnyer ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:176b-24: bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa'i gzugs lta bur gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-1: tu nag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas de ltar brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-3: khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-4: zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-6: dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par bstod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi sbrid pa byung ba la sos zhes brjod par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-9: mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-10: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-12: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-15: dga' mgur spyod par byed kyang bu pho yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-17: rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nor zad cing longs spyod zad par gyur nas des chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-20: rgas shing bkren la bu pho yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-21: bu mo yang med pas rgyal byed kyi tshal du rab tu 'byung du 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-24: de bzhin rab tu 'byung bar mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-25: de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-26: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de'i chung ma blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-28: dge slong gang gis kyang sos zhes ma byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177a-29: de nas de'i sngon gyi chung mas lag pa g-yon pas sa blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-0: sas @177b mtshams gcad pa byas nas yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-2: dge slong dag gis de la brtags par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-3: des de'i lag nas bzung ste drangs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-5: khyod dgra bo rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-6: rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di gnod sbyin gos sngon po gyon pa lnga brgyas mi stong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-7: bdag 'ba' zhig gis khyod la sos zhes bgyis pa des na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-8: de rnams kyis khyod kyi mdangs ma khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-11: gshegs zhes des de'i lag pa nas bzung ste song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-12: de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-15: de 'gro ba nyid du byed cing mi 'dug nas dge slong dag gis de'i lag pa ya gcig bzung ste drangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-20: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-22: khyod kyi lag pa gang na zhes dri bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-23: gal te khyod kyis bzung ba gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-26: thams cad kyi thams cad du gtang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-27: gal te sngon gyi chung mas bzung ba gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-29: 'gro bar mi 'dod pas de gtang bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-30: 'on kyang dge slong rgan zhugs ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:177b-31: 'tsho bar 'dod pa'i bsam pa can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:178a-1: ba byung ba la sos zhes brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:178a-2: dge slong dag gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:178a-4: khyod kyi lag pa gang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:178a-6: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis bzung ba gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:178a-7: de dag gis de btang nas rang gi khyim du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:178a-8: de nyid de'i rab tu byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:178a-9: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:178a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
