K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:183b-10: dge slong zhig gi khri'i rkang pa chag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:183b-11: de la ste'u dgos nas des khyim bdag cig la ste'u brnyas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:183b-12: des dgos pa byas nas slar byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:183b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:183b-25: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:183b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:183b-29: dge slong gis ste'u bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:183b-30: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na shar gyi kun dga' ra ba na ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma'i khang bzang na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:183b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis rtsig pa'i grogs bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:183b-33: dge slong dag mchod rten dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:183b-34: gtsug lag khang rtsig pa'i grogs byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184a-0: ji tsam na ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma'i khang bzang mthon @184a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184a-2: de la 'dzeg dgos par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184a-3: dge slong dag gis ci las 'dzeg par bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis skas las 'dzeg par bya'o /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184a-7: dge slong dag skas du yod mi shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis gcung po dge slong dga' bo zhes bya ba de'i lus gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184a-16: skyes bu chen po mtshan sum cu can srid kyang bcom ldan 'das las sor bzhis thung ba zhig yod pa de'i chung ma mdzes ma zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184a-20: skyes pa'i yid du 'ong ba zhig yod pa de la de lhag par chags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184a-26: lhag par chags par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas snga dro sham thabs gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184a-28: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong kun dga' bo dang ser skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-0: ser skya'i gnas @184b na bsod snyoms mdzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-1: dga' bo'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas bcom ldan 'das de'i sgor bzhugs te 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu btang nas de dag gis khyim de gser zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-3: nges par bcom ldan 'das gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-4: des na bdag gi khyim gser zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-8: sgo na mi su yod ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-10: ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das mthong nas de rings pa rings par nang du song ste des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-12: bcom ldan 'das gshegs te chab sgo na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-13: de gus pa dang bcas pas 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-15: gal te 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-16: 'di nges par bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-17: snyam nas des gos kyi mtha' ma nas bzung ste rje'i sras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas slar 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-22: des de la mtshan ma btab nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-24: gal te khyod 'di bskams te gshegs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-25: bdag karsha pa na lnga brgya dbang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:184b-30: des de dam bcas nas btang ste song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das las lhung bzed blangs nas slar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-1: gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-2: bcom ldan 'das bzhes pa nyid du mi mdzad par gshegs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-3: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la yang ma len cig pa'i brda mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-5: bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bzhes zhes smra ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dbul bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-10: gang kho na las blangs pa de nyid la phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-11: de spobs pa med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed khyer nas chas te bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs te bzhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-12: dga' bos lhung bzed phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-15: lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zo zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma stsal nas des zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-19: zos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-21: khyod ci ste rab tu mi 'byung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185a-22: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gdung rabs de dang de dag tu yab yum dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185b-0: gzhan yang bla ma'i gnas lta bu dag gis chos dang ldan pa'i tshig 'ga' @185b yang ma bcag pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185b-6: song la dga' bo'i skra dang kha spu bregs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185b-8: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'breg mkhan gnyer te bregs par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185b-12: ring po mi thogs par stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185b-13: gal te khyod kyis nga'i skra dang kha spu bregs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185b-14: ngas khyod kyi lag pa mkhrig ma man chad gcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185b-18: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kho nas chu snod nas mgor chu blugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185b-29: re zhig bcom ldan 'das la gus par bya ba'i phyir rab tu byung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185b-31: snyam nas de nam sros nas song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:185b-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis g-yang sa zhig sprul to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-2: mdzes ma dang thag ring ba nyid du gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-3: bdag gzhan kho nar mchi bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-5: snyam nas de shin tu bzang mo la rnam par rtog cing sdug bsngal bas mtshan mo 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-8: khyod song la dga' bo la khyod khang skyong byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-10: des song nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod khang skyong byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-17: khang skyong zhes bya ba de ci lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-18: de ji lta bu dag bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-20: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-21: gtsug lag khang gi las bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-22: dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la dong nas dang por je gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-23: de nas ba lang gi lci ba gsar pas skyang nul bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-24: gtsug lag khang bsrung bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-25: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa gang yin pa de brjod par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-28: bdug spos la sogs pa ji yod pa de dag kyang dge 'dun la brim par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-29: nub mo sgo gcad par bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186a-32: gci ba'i gnas dag kyang sbyang bar bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186b-0: gzhan yang gtsug lag khang dang 'brel ba'i bya ba gang @186b yin pa de dag bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186b-4: ji tsam na dge slong rnams snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186b-5: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ser skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186b-8: snyam nas des phyag dar byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe khyams gcig phyag pa de'i tshe gnyis pa phyag dar gyis gang bar gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186b-13: des phyags ma bzhag ste phyag dar dbo bar brtsams pa dang zad par ma gyur nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186b-14: gnas khang rnams kyi sgo bcad la 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186b-15: snyam nas des gnas khang rnams kyi sgo bcad par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis des gang gi tshe gnas khang gcig gi sgo bcad pa de'i tshe gzhan bye bar gyur pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs pas de skyo nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186b-17: bdag rgyal por gyur nas 'di bas ches lhag pa'i gtsug lag khang bya'i 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186b-20: snyam nas des gseb lam du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas lam de nyid du gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:186b-21: des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas de dang ha cang mi ring ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187a-1: yal ga stug po thur du 'phyang ba zhig yod pa der myur ba myur ba nyid du song ste de'i 'og tu gab nas 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis shing de'i yal ga rnams ji ltar gyen du 'phags par gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187a-7: 'dod de spobs pa med par gyur cing ngo tsha ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187a-9: 'di shin tu bzang mo la lhag par chags pas 'di de dang 'bral bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187a-10: snyam du mkhyen nas de de dang dbral bar bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas su ji tsam bzhed pa bzhugs nas mnyan yod ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te khad kyis mnyan yod du gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187a-11: ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma sa gas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba de'i lus gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187a-13: bcom ldan 'das pas sor bzhis thung ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187a-14: bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'dir 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187a-15: zhes thos nas de dag gis nam mthong snyam mo ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187a-18: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dus gzhan zhig na snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-0: lhung @187b bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas de khad kyis ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga'i khyim du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-1: des de'i gzugs bzang zhing kha dog shin tu rgyas pa mthong nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-3: nges par bcom ldan 'das kyi mched dga' bo yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-4: snyam nas de dad pa skyes te de'i rkang pa la gtugs nas phyag byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-5: des de'i rkang pa la reg pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-6: bud med kyi reg pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-8: de 'dod chags bdo bas de'i khu ba gtor nas sa ga'i mgor lhung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-10: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis de tu ru ka'i 'bru mar du byin gyis brlabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-13: 'di na tu ru ka'i 'bru mar ga las 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-14: nges par 'phags pa dga' bos mi gtsang ba shor la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-15: bcom ldan 'das bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-16: 'di tu ru ka'i 'bru mar du byin gyis brlabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-17: snyam du rig nas yid rangs pas yi rang zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-21: kye ma'o chos legs par gsungs pa nyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-23: 'phags pa dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod chags shas che ba dag kyang tshangs par spyad pa spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:187b-24: zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188a-0: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung bar ma gyur @188a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188a-1: tam snyam nas 'gyod pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188a-3: dge slong rnams la brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188a-4: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188a-6: dge slong dga' bo 'dod chags lhag par che ba 'di la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188a-9: 'dod chags lhag par che bar gyur pa de lta bu gang dag yin pa de dag gis 'dzag snod bcang bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod chags lhag par che bas sge'u bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188a-13: dge slong rnams ci'i pags pa'i sge'u bcang ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188a-16: byi ba dang gsum gyi pags pa'i sge'u bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188a-17: de dag gis de bzhin bzhag pas dri mi zhim par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188a-21: de dag gis ji srid bkrus nas skem par byed pa de'i bar du de dag bud med mthong nas khu ba gtor bas sham thabs dbra dbrer gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188a-22: gnyis byas la gcig bskam par bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188a-24: kha cig khu ba lhag par mang du byung bas de gsher bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-0: dge @188b slong dag gis so phag gi bur ma dag blugs pas sdug bsngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-1: bye ma'am sa'i phru blug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-2: dge slong dag de btags bzhin du zas za bar byed cing mchod rten la phyag 'tshal bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-3: de phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag la khrus byas nas zas bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-4: mchod rten la phyag dag bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-5: de nas dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo phyogs gzhan zhig na rdo leb la 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-6: des shin tu bzang mo dran nas des de rdo leb de la ri lus bri bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-7: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yang der 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-8: des de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-9: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-21: khyod rang gi chung ma 'bri zhing 'dug gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-22: de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-24: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-26: nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:188b-27: dge slong dag ri mo 'bri ba las gyur par mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:189a-0: dge slong dag skyes bu gti mug dga' bos shin tu bzang mo la chags @189a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:189a-1: pa'i sems kyis ri mo bris so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:189a-3: dge slong gis ri mo bri bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:189a-4: dge slong ri mo 'bri bar byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:189a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ri mo bri bar mi bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-17: sdug dang grogs dang 'grogs pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-18: ldan zhing rim gro byed pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-19: rnyed dang bkur sti tshigs su bcad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-20: gang de dga' ba yongs spang gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-21: khyim gnas de bzhin khyim pa min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-23: sdug bsngal gyi ni mthar byed khyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-24: de lta na ni mthar phyin 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-25: dang po nur nur por 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-26: de nas mer mer por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-27: mer mer po las nar nar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-28: nar nar po las gor gor 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-29: gor gor po las yan lag ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-30: bzhi dang mgo yang skye 'gyur nyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-31: las kyi rgyu las byung ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-32: rus tshogs sna tshogs skye bar 'gyur mgo yi thod pa dgu dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-33: 'gram pa yi ni rus pa gnyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-34: so ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-35: so yi rtsa ba sum cu gnyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-36: mgrin pa dang ni sna ba'i drung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:235b-37: sna dang skan ni gong ma dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-1: rus pa dag ni nyi shur 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-2: mig gi rus pa bzhi dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-3: thal gong gi yang rus pa bzhi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-4: dpung pa g-yas dang g-yon dag gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-5: rus pa dag ni lnga bcu yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-6: brang gi rus pa brgyad yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-7: de la sgal tshigs sum cu gnyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-8: rgyab kyi rtsib ma'i rus pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-9: rus pa dag ni sum cu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-10: ngos gnyis rtsib logs g-yas pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-11: rtsib rus bcu gsum ldan pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-12: de bzhin rtsib logs g-yon pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-13: gzhan yang bcu dang gsum yod de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-14: de dag nyi shu rtsa drug ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-15: tshigs gsum pa ni gsum gsum dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-16: tshigs gnyis pa ni gnyis dang ldan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-17: lhag ma rnams ni tshigs med de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-18: brla ni g-yas dang g-yon dag la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-19: rus pa dag ni bco lnga yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-20: rus 'di dag la rus pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-21: brgya dang lnga dang gsum yod par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-22: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab mkhyen pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-23: bden pa'i mtshan gyis bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-24: 'og tu rkang pa'i mthil nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-25: gong du klad pa'i bar gyi lus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-26: gang dag gis ni nyer brten pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-27: 'dam bu'i khyim bzhin nyam chung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-28: gzer gyi gzungs kyis ma zin pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-29: sha dang khrag gis g-yogs pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-30: rgyu ma mkhan gyi srad bu yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-32: de bzhin du ni lus 'di yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-33: chu rgyus dag gi breng gis sbrel //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-34: pags pa rlon pas so sor g-yogs sgo dgu'i rma ni chen por ldan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-35: mi gtsang rul ba'i dri mnam pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-37: ji ltar 'bru ni sna tshogs kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236a-38: sbyang ni bkang bar gyur pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-0: de bzhin du ni lus 'di @236b yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-1: sna tshogs rul pa'i 'byung gnas yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-3: lus ni rul pa snying po med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-4: 'di la byis pa bag med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-5: chags su med par shes par gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-6: rdul dang mchil ma snabs dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-7: bad kan rnag dang khrag rnams dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-8: mchin pa mkhris pa zhag dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-9: zag pa klad pa klad rgyas dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-10: snying dang sul mang mkhal mdang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-11: mi gtsang glo ba ldang ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-12: tshil dang spu dang mtsher pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-13: rgyu ma dang ni gnye ma ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-14: 'di ni rul ba sna tshogs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-16: sdig lus 'jigs pa chen po ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-17: dgra dang 'dra bar shes par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-18: grong khyer rnying pa ji bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-19: rus pa'i lus ni nyam chung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-20: 'dus byas nyin dang mtshan du yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-22: grong khyer rus pa'i rtsig pa can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-23: sha dang khrag gis zhal zhal byugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-24: de la 'dod chags zhe sdang dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-25: gti mug dang ni 'chab pa skye //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-26: grong khyer rtsig pa'i rus pa can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-27: sha dang khrag gis byugs pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-28: phyi dang nang bcas rtag tu yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-29: mi mdza' ba yis mngon par gtses /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-31: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:236b-32: dge slong lnga brgya po de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo mngal du 'jug pa'i mdos gdams nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go @237a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-3: nga'i dge slong dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa rnams kyi mchog ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dgra bcom pa nyid thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-8: rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-9: bde ba myong bas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-10: bsro gang gi ni khrus dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-11: zas dang snum bsku byug pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-12: gdugs kyis dga' ba byas pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-13: bde ba mang po nyams su myong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-14: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-17: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-18: las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-19: 'di'i lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur grub cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-20: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cus ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-24: 'dod pa dag la lhag par chags pa las /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-26: bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-29: dga' bo nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-32: dpa' rgal bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237a-33: nges par gyur pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-0: dga' bo nyid kyis @237b las byas shing bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-1: gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-3: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-4: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-7: rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-9: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-12: skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-13: bskal ba brgya phrag rnams su yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-14: las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-15: tshogs shing dus la bab pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-16: lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-18: sngon byung ba skye rgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-19: ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-22: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-23: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba mi'i 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-24: de 'khor dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-25: rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du byon nas gnyen ldan na gnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-26: de'i g-yas khyim gyi gcung 'dod pa dag la shin tu chags par gyur pa las /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:237b-28: bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238a-2: rgyal po gnyen ldan zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238a-7: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238a-17: ma he phun sum tshogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238a-19: chos dang mthun pas chos bzhin du byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238a-20: de'i g-yas khyim gyi nu bo ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238a-21: 'dod pa rnams la shin tu chags par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238a-22: rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs 'khor dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang 'dir byon nas 'di nyid na gnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238a-24: thos nas kyang btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238a-27: grong khyer gyi mi dang bcas te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238a-28: de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gang zhig thos nas rgyal po gnyen ldan btsun po'i 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238a-31: grong khyer gyi mi dang bcas te khyad par chen po thob pa de lta bu'i chos bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238a-32: de'i g-yas khyim gyi nu bo ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238a-33: 'dod pa la lhag par chags pa dang ldan pas khyim nas ma byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238a-34: de la blon po'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-0: gzhan @238b yang chung po grogs rnams kyis dong ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-6: grong mi dang bcas te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs blta ba'i phyir gshegs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-7: khyod lta bu mi rnyed rnyed dka' zhing shin tu rnyed dka' ba thob nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-8: 'dod pa rnams la shin tu chags nas khyim nas ma byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-9: de de dag gis gdams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-10: snying la ngo tsha bar gyur nas de dag dang 'grogs te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-11: ji tsam na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi gcung gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-12: de rnams kyi gzhen btab nas khrid pa mthong ste des dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-13: ci'i phyir 'di de ltar gzhen btab nas khrid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-14: de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa de la rgyas par bsnyad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-17: nga yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi gcung yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-18: de kho na bzhin du 'dod pa rnams la lhag par chags par gyur pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-19: nga bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis nan gyis phral nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te shin tu mthar phyin pa'i grub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-20: bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-22: skyes bu gti mug can kha cig ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:238b-23: de ltar bya dgos pas khyed kyis 'di khrid de 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239a-1: kyi spyan sngar khrid cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239a-2: 'di gdon mi za bar bcom ldan 'das la dad pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239a-4: de dag gis de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi spyan sngar khrid pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239a-5: de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis de lta bu'i chos bshad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239a-6: des de thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la dad pa rnyed pa dang ldan te stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239a-7: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas te bdag gi sdum par khrus gang gi khrus mdzad par ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239a-8: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239a-9: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bshad pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ste rgyal po gnyen ldan ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239a-10: seng nas rgyal po gnyen ldan gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te rgyal po gnyen ldan la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-0: bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs @239b rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas te sdum par khrus gang gi khrus mdzad par spyan drangs pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-1: des cang mi gsung bas gnang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-3: bkur sti bgyi bar 'os pa lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-5: de'i slad du grong khyer du gshegs pa'i grong khyer mdzes par bgyi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-6: shul mdzes par bgyi ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-7: rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-8: gal te de ltar yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i grong khyer mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul dka' ba gang yin pa 'di yang btul blta snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-13: legs pa byas kyi khyod song la rdzas dag sta gon gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-18: rab tu dga' ba skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-19: rgyal po gnyen ldan gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas stan las langs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-20: rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-22: dengs la grong khyer du dril bsgrags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-23: sang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs grong du gshegs kyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-25: yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis grong khyer mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:239b-26: lam mdzes par gyis la rang gis 'byor pa dang mthun pa'i mdzes pas bsu zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-0: zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po gnyen ldan gyi ltar mnyan nas dril @240a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-2: shes ldan grong khyer na gnas pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-4: yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-6: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs grong khyer du gshegs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-7: de'i phyir khyed grong khyer na gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-8: yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-11: thams cad kyis rang gi 'byor ba dang mthun pa'i mdzes pas bsu zhig ces de skad bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-12: de dag gis grong khyer de yang rdo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-18: bdug pa dri zhim po can gyi phog phor ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-20: dar gyi lda ldi mang pos ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-22: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-28: der yang dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i chu dron dang 'bru mar yang sta gon byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-29: khrus khang yang byi dor bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-30: gdan yang bshams nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs grong khyer du gshegs pa bsu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240a-31: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs rgyal po gnyen ldan btsun mo'i 'khor ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240b-4: de nas rgyal po'i nu bo de dad pa skyes nas khrus khang gi nang du gshegs su gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240b-5: nang du gshegs nas khrus mdzad par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240b-6: ji tsam na rnam par gzigs kyi sku gser gyi mdog lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240b-7: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240b-8: mthong nas kyang yang dad pa skyes te khrus byas nas nas zhabs la gtugs te smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240b-9: gang bdag gis yon gnas yang dag pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240b-10: bdag kyang bdag nyid chen po 'di'i ji lta bar lus gser gyi mdog lta bu dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240b-13: gal te bdag de bzhin du 'dod pa rnams la lhag par chags par gyur na yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240b-14: bdag bcom ldan 'das des nan gyis phral te rab tu phyung nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240b-15: bsgral te shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:240b-16: bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog par gyur cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:241a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gcung du gyur cing /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:241a-14: 'di la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu mngon par grub lags /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:241a-24: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:242a-8: bsod nams don du gnyer ba lags na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:244a-2: de na 'dis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:244a-3: de na 'dis 'chi ba'i dus kyi che smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:244a-4: 'di ltar bdag gis yon gnas bla na med pa bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar tshe ji srid par changs par spyod pa spyad kyang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:244a-7: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye rgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:244a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:244a-9: zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'i gsung rab la rab tu byung nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:264b-22: mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog par 'gyur /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:265b-28: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:266b-4: de nas rgyal pos legs par gsungs pa'i don du gser srang 'bum bskur te grong dang grong rdal dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:266b-18: zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:266b-19: blon po rnams kyis smras pa; lha /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:266b-21: zhes de'i ming legs gsungs tshol zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:266b-24: pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:266b-25: nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:266b-26: dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:266b-27: rtse grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:266b-32: yo byad kyi khyad par gtso bo gzhan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267a-0: gzhan dag gis bskyed bsrings nas rdzing gi @267a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267a-1: padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267a-2: de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yang legs par gsungs pa btsal na ma rnyed do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267a-6: nga la legs par gsungs pa dgos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267a-7: legs par gsungs pa tshol cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267a-11: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu bskor kyang legs par gsungs pa ma rnyed do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267a-13: de nas rgyal po legs par gsungs pa mnyan pa'i phyir re bas yongs su gdungs par gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267a-17: ma la bdag gis rgyal po bgam par bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267a-23: nyes spyad de ni spyad mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267a-25: pha rol tu yang bde bar gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267a-26: de nas rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa de thos ma thag tu dga' ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267b-12: nyin zhag bdun du seng ldeng gi shing dag me dong du bus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267b-13: gal te der bdag nyid 'dor na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267b-14: de'i 'og tu bdag gis tshigs su bcad pa smra'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267b-18: gang dag ya mtshan lta bar 'dod pa de dag kyang shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267b-20: de nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma yang 'dus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267b-21: nam mkha'i ngos la yang lha brgya stong phrag du ma yang 'dus te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:267b-23: de nas gnod sbyin de nam mkha' la 'phags nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:268a-0: skye bo'i tshogs kyang dbugs phyung nas me dong gi drung du nye @268a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:268a-1: bar song ste tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:268a-2: me dong 'jigs pa che byed nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang 'dra ba 'dir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:268a-3: chos phyir srog la 'dzem med nges pa'i yid kyis rab tu mchong par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:268a-4: bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis me dong 'di yang padma 'khrigs pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:268a-5: mtsho chu tsandan lde khus bcin pa lta bur bsil ba bzang gyur cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:268a-8: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po'i ya mtshan lha dang mi dad par byed pa pa'i cho 'phrul de mthong nas gnod sbyin gyi gzugs mi snang bar byas nas rang gi gzugs kyis 'dug ste de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:272b-5: de rnams kyi mthus snang ba rgya chen po byung ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:272b-13: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:272b-14: 'jig rten pha rol mchis pa lta zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:272b-15: 'di dag mngon sum kho nar mi snang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:272b-16: 'di la the tshom zar ci yod ces byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:272b-17: de dag las gang gi lta ba 'jig rten pha rol med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:272b-20: snyam pa yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:272b-21: de dag dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:272b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:272b-25: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:272b-26: de thos nas bran bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-1: tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-2: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-3: de dag bden pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-5: bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-6: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la bran bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-9: khyed tshur tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas kun tu bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag tu de dag skra bregs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-13: bya ma bum thogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-14: skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-15: dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-16: de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-17: mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar bgos gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-18: mod la dbang po rab tu zhir gnas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-19: sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus kyi cha lugs bsgyur ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la gdams ngag gnang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-0: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs @273b nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-1: dgra bcom pa khams gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-2: sems bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-3: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-4: ste'u dang tsandan du mtshungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-5: ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-8: so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-9: srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-10: bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-12: nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-14: gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-15: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bran bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-16: skyong ba dag rab tu phyung ba de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bran bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-18: skyong ba dag rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-19: ma legs pa zhig mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-21: sdig pa'i lta ba kun tu spyod pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-22: zhes ma dad par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-24: nyan thos chen po ri rab dang 'dra ba dag la rgyal po gsal rgyal ma dad par gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-25: de'i phyir de dag gi yon tan brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-27: bcom ldan 'das de 'di snyam du dgongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-28: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:273b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274a-0: @274a *// yang dag par len du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274a-1: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274a-2: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274a-3: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274a-4: yang dag par len du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274a-6: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274a-7: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274a-8: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274a-10: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la mngon par dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274a-11: rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274a-15: skyong bdag gi drung du song la song nas 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274a-16: sang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gdugs tshod sbyar ba'i tshe khyed gnyis kyis chu rims shig ces gyis zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-1: zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas tshe dang ldan pa bran bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-3: skyong ba ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa bran bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-4: skyong ba la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-7: sang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gdugs tshod sbyar ba'i tshe khyed gnyis kyis chu rims shig ces de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-13: ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag bzhag ste bdag cag la sang khyed gnyis kyis chu rims shig ces bka' stsal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-14: gdon mi za bar bdag cag kho na'i yon tan brjod pa mdzad par bzhed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-16: ston pa'i dgongs pa rdzogs par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-18: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-19: de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-20: bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa yang dag par bsgrubs nas nang bar sngar langs te gdan bshams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-22: bcom ldan 'das la pho nya bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-24: gdugs tshod du sa su bshams lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-26: da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes dus bdas par gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:274b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro chos gos mnams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275a-0: lhung bzed bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis bskor nas dge slong gi @275a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275a-1: dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275a-2: gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275a-3: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi thog tu pho nya btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275a-5: bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275a-6: de'i slad du gshegs shing rjes su yi rang ba mdzad pa'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275a-10: blon pos bskor nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du gdugs tshod sbyar ba la rjes su yi rang bar bya ba'i phyir 'ongs te rgan rim bzhin phyag byas nas 'dug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275a-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa bran bus rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug nas ji ltar gzhon pa'i mthar phyin nas 'bo ba de ltar chu'i rgyun byin gyis brlabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275a-12: tshe dang ldan pa skyong bas kyang ji ltar rgan pa'i mthar phyin nas 'bo ba de ltar chu'i rgyun byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275a-13: rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275a-14: ston pa'i spyan sngar rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig yin snyam nas chu'i rgyun gyi rjes bzhin gzhon pa'i mthar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275a-15: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa skyong ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275a-16: de nas yang phyir chu'i rgyun gyi rjes bzhin rgan pa'i mthar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-0: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa bran @275b bu mthong nas de bzhin du ya mtshan skyes nas ro stod bstod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-1: lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-5: kye ma'o chos legs par gsungs pa nyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-6: da ltar 'di na bran bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-7: skyong ba la sogs pa sdig pa'i lta ba can dag kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-8: zhes ched du rjod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-9: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag bstar te bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-10: bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas kun tu tshim par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-11: kun tu stob par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-12: rnam grangs du mar rang gi lag bstar te bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-13: bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas kun tu tshim par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-14: kun tu bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol te phyag bcabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-15: lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' bzhig [*ba zhig] blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-17: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-18: yang dag par len du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-20: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-21: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:275b-25: skyong ba dag gis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-0: des na yul mtha' 'khob tu skyes shing @276a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-11: skyong ba dag gis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag tu las byas shing bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-12: tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-13: lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-14: zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-16: sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba nas drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-17: de'i bstan pa la 'di gnyis rab tu byung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-18: de na 'di gnyis mtha' 'khob tu dong nas gdams ngag med par yid la bya ba bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-19: de na 'di gnyis kyis ma rtogs par rtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-21: de nas 'di gnyis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa la log par lta ba thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-22: de gnyis log par lta bas nyams des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-23: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bslus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-24: re zhig bdag cag la yang nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid med na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276a-25: gzhan la lta yod par 'gyur re skan zhes smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276b-0: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas mtha' 'khob @276b tu gdams ngag med par yid la byed pa bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276b-2: skyong ba 'di dag nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276b-3: de na 'di dag gis mtha' 'khob tu song ste gdams ngag med par yid la byed pa bskyed nas lta ba log pa thob pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276b-4: ngan song rnams kyi nad du skyes nas lo mang por mtha' 'khob rnams su skyes shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276b-5: log par lta ba can du gyur te da lta'i bar du yang mtha' 'khob tu skyes nas log par lta ba can du gyur pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276b-6: gang dag 'di dag gis de na bklags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276b-8: phung po la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276b-10: skye mched la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276b-11: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276b-12: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276b-18: dge slong gis gdams ngag med par bsam gtan mi bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276b-25: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gcig tu dkar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:276b-26: 'dren ma rnams kyi yang 'dren ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-2: 'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-3: dge slong dag gis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-6: mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des dgon par spyil po byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-7: de na dge slong gcig 'dug pa de so ga tsha bas rmya nas skya bo seng seng por gyur cing lus sha bri ngan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-8: nyam chung ba shig shig por gyur nas de khyim bdag gi drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-15: cung zad cig brel bar ma gyur grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-19: cung zad kyang med mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-20: 'on kyang so ga'i dus la bab pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-21: spyil bu de na tsha ste skyo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-25: sa'i khang pa bgyid du stsal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-30: thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-32: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-37: bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i khang pa byed du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-39: khyim bdag des sa'i khang pa byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:277a-40: de dbyar gyi dus su rlan par gyur pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282a-8: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa gang gi ka spun po tshe rabs lnga brgyar sems can dmyal ba dag gi nang nas shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba dag gi nang du skyes shing /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282a-10: de byis pa'i gnas skabs nas khyim pa khyim la lhag par chags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282a-11: rtse ba'i dga' bas dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282a-12: cha ba la brtson pas dmyal ba la dmigs pa'i dran pa ma skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282a-13: de dus gzhan zhig na legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282a-15: chos mngon pa'i phyogs de dang de dag tu dmyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282a-20: des dmyal ba'i gtam thos nas sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba mngon sum du gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282a-21: ba spu'i khung ba thams cad nas khrag byung ste chos gos dag kyang khra bor gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282a-22: dri yang mi zhim par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282a-24: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282a-28: dge slong rnams kyis lus phyi ba bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-0: @282b bcom ldan 'das kyis lus phyi ba bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-2: de dag gis chos gos kyi phyi rol tu bgos pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-4: de dag gis de kho nas lus drud pas ril rma byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-5: de kho nas drud par mi bya'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-6: 'on kyang bkru ba'i chus spangs nas dal bus bags kyis bkru bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-7: lus phyi ba'i gos kyis rnag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-8: khrag kyang dus dus su bkru bar bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-9: de yang tshon gyis kha bsgyur bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka landa ka gnas pa na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-11: tshe dang ldan pa pi linda'i bu gang nas bzung ste rab tu byung tshun chad de rtag tu na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-12: de'i drung du tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams song ste dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-29: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:282b-32: gnang gi dge slong gis lcags kyi gzhong ring bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal @283a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-1: mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-2: dge slong dag mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-3: de dag gi rkang pa la 'dam rdzab gos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-5: de dag gcal ci las dgram mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-6: so phag gi gcal dgram par bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-7: de nas so phag gi phye mas btab ste rdo thal gyis byug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-8: mchod rten gyi 'khor sa chen por gyur te ma 'byor nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-10: 'on kyang ma 'byor nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-13: de yang ma 'byor nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-14: bar bar du so phag gzhag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-15: dge slong sgo khang la brten pa rnams kyi khyams su 'dam rdzab chags nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-16: der yang rim pa de bzhin du bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-18: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-19: mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des dgon par spyil po byed du bcug ste de na dge slong gcig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-20: dgun stod kyi dus la bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283a-21: de lhags pas nyen nas skya bo seng seng por gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283b-0: rmya bar gyur @283b nas de khyim bdag de'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283b-7: cung zad brel bar ma gyur grang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283b-21: thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283b-28: des me phyung la me'i bya ba bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283b-29: khyim bdag des dge slong de la nor bu me shel byin nas de des me 'byin cing me'i bya ba byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283b-30: ji tsam na rkun po lnga brgya ri brag cig tu las byed par 'dod pa phyogs der phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283b-31: de dag gis dge slong de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283b-39: khyod me'i bya ba ji ltar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:283b-42: nor bu me shel gyis me phyung nas me'i bya ba byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-0: de dag gis de mthong nas @284a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-2: der las byas nas byung ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-4: tshur 'phags pa de'i nor bu dbrog gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-6: de dag de'i drung du dong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-7: nor bu me shel de ga re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-10: de dag gis de khyer te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-11: yang dge slong de lhags pas nyen nas khyim bdag de'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-17: cung zad brel bar ma gyur grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-21: cung zad kyang med mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-25: bdag gis khyod la nor bu me shel ma byin tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-30: chen po la 'os pa'i nor bu de lta bu yang khyod kyis rkun po la bskur ba lta /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-31: kye ma khyod kyis phyogs dben pa zhig tu gzhag mod /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-34: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-35: rin po che de lta bu dag ma byin par len pa rnams la bstan par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-36: 'on kyang me phyung la gtad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284a-37: me shel ji lta bar chu shel yang de dang 'dra'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284b-0: drug @284b sde rnams btso blag mkhan la chos gos dag 'khrur 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284b-1: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na mnyan yod du dus ston byung ste mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284b-2: khyim bdag rnams kyis gos tshon sna tshogs can dag btso blag mkhan la 'khrur bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284b-3: nye dga' yang nyi ma nub kar chos gos dur smrig cig khyer te btso blag mkhan gyi drung du song nas bzhin bzang chos gos 'di khrus shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284b-7: deng 'jig rten pa'i gos mang zhig 'tshal te mchis kyi bzhud cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284b-9: de khros nas bsdigs par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284b-14: zhog la bzhud cig dang bkru mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284b-15: des bzhag ste song ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284b-17: der zhag lon nas gos tshon sna tshogs can rnams kyis thams cad khra bor byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284b-18: btso blag mkhan lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:284b-19: skye bo'i tshogs ma dad par gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286a-0: 'on kyang gzhong khung du chu 'jam tsam gyi nang du dal @286a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286a-1: bus bzlog cing bzlog cing bdag nyid kyis bkru bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhong khung du dal bus bzlog cing bzlog cing bkru bar bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286a-5: gang dag lag pa gnyis kyis bkru bar mi nus pa de dag gis rkang pa gnyis kyis bkru bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286a-6: gzhan dag cig gis lag pa gnyis kyis kyang ma nus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286a-7: rkang pa gnyis kyis kyang ma nus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286a-11: rdo phru 'gyod pa nyid dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286a-12: tshon gyi gzhong khung rtsig pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286a-13: tshon rtsi rnam pa bzhi yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286a-15: dge slong rnams khrus byas nas lus gsher bzhin du chos gos gyon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286a-17: dri mi zhim par gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis lus phyi ba bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-1: dge slong gzhan dag cig la mi bdog nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-2: gang dag la mi bdog pa de dag gis re zhig tsog tsog por 'dug la khrus ras kyis lus phyis te chos gos dag bgo bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-3: dge slong rnams kyis lham la rdul chags par gyur nas dge slong dag gis de dag brdabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-5: ral cing gzungs kyi srad bu dag kyang chad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-7: dge slong dag gis chus bkrus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-8: de dag ma rung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-10: 'on kyang ras ma chus sbangs la phyi bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-13: lham phyi ba bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul tsam pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-15: drang srong gar ga'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-16: yul tsam pa na tsam pa'i klu'i bu mo dad pa can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-17: dge ba'i bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa de'i bu ma dad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-18: ma dul ba byed pa zhig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-19: des de chos mnyan pa yang dag par len du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-20: bu song la 'phags pa rnams kyi drung du phyin nas chos nyon cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-21: khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-23: de des yang dag par len du bcug pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:286b-24: rang bzhin gyi cha lugs kyis chos nyan par zhugs pa rnams kyi nang du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:287a-0: de gzhon nu zhig gis mthong nas de sdangs te tshe dang @287a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:287a-5: thos nas dge slong gang dag 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de dag sngar langs nas de dag gis de ske nas rnga ma'i srad bus btags te gtsug lag khang gi steng nas 'phangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:287a-6: de nas mas mthong ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:287a-8: khyod kyis 'phags pa rnams las chos thos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:287a-9: des smras pa; ma de 'dra ba'i 'phags par ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:287a-12: de dag gis khyod la ci zhig byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:287a-13: des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:287a-16: de bas dang de dag 'phags pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:287a-17: gzhan dag cig gis khyod mthong du zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:287a-20: de cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:287a-21: de la ne'u ldang rnams kyis bzhad gad du mgrin snad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:287a-22: mgrin snad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:287a-23: de de dag gis ku re smras pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:314a-4: gang zhig gis gtsang sbras bdag gi sems rangs pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu 'byung ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:314a-7: de dag gi gtsang sbras de'i sems ma rangs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:314a-12: song ste de dag bgam par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:314a-13: snyam nas de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:314a-14: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ril ba thogs te phyi rol tu chab khung sar chas pa mthong nas des bsam pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:314a-21: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sems pa la zhugs te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:314b-1: chos gos dag bzhag ste de nas phyogs gcig tu sa phung bu bdun bzhag /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:314b-10: lag pa dag bkrus nas gnyis pas ril ba bkrus so //
