K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:329b-16: nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:329b-17: dge slong dag rgyal pos bkrabs pa rab tu 'byin pa las gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:329b-18: de'i phyir dge slong gis rgyal pos bkrabs pa rab tu mi 'byung bar dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:329b-20: skyes bu gti mug nye dgas blon po rab tu phyung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:329b-21: rgyal po ma dad par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:329b-23: dge slong dag gis rgyal pos bkrabs pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:329b-24: gang yang rung ba zhig gi drung du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zhig nye bar 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:329b-25: des de la rgyal pos bkrabs pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:329b-26: ma dris par rab tu 'byin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:329b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal pos bkrabs pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:329b-30: kha cig yul ring po dag nas kyang 'ong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-0: ma gnang ba dag kyang 'ong nas dge @330a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-1: slong dag the tshom du gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-2: de dag kyang rab tu ma phyung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-5: ma gnang ba dag 'ong ba de dag rab tu dbyung bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-8: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-9: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-11: kha spu bregs nas ring po ma lon par snga dro chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-12: de rim gyis srang du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-13: ji tsam na bram ze zhig bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-14: de yang gtum po gzu lum can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-16: des bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-18: khyod dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'i mgor ltag dbyug snun nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-22: zhes de de'i drung du song nas de'i mgor ltag dbyug gis brgyab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-23: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo log ste bram ze de la bltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-24: de je khros nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-25: bram ze'i khye'u yang rgyob cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-26: des de la lan gnyis su ltag dbyug gis brgyab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-27: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330a-28: bdag gis bltas te ci rung 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-0: rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin nas zas kyi bya @330b ba byas te lhung bzed bkrus nas dge slong dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-2: srang che ge mo zhes bya bar ma 'dong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-3: dge slong dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-6: de na bram ze gtum po gzu lum can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-7: rtsub mo zhig bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam zhig la bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-8: des bdag la ltag dbyug gnyis bsnun no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-21: gcugs med par des kho bo la ltag dbyug gis bsnun nas kho bos log ste bltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-23: kho bos de la log ste bltas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-27: tshe dang ldan pa nye das thos nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-36: des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-37: nye dgas mgo lan gsum lcog nas 'jal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-38: zhes byas te mi dga' bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-39: snyam nas de mgo bzlas te bregs nas til mar gyis bskus te bkrus nas snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-40: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-41: de rim gyis srang du phyin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:330b-42: bram ze de gzhan du yengs pa des de ma mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-0: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' de'i mdun du @331a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-3: des bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-5: song la dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'i mgor ltag dbyug gis snun cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-6: tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas de thos nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-12: des bdag nyid song nas nye dga' la ltag dbyug gis bsnun nas nye dgas bram ze de'i dpung pa nas bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-14: nye dga' la yang rdeg gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-16: rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-17: zhes des de'i dpung ba nas bzung ste drangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-18: des bram ze'i khye'u de dag la bos nas de dag gis kyang de'i dpung pa ya gcig nas bzung ste drangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-19: nye dga' tshan po che chen po'i stobs can des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-20: bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-21: bram ze de drangs nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor song ste 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-24: gang gi tshe drug sde rnams khros nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na 'dug pa de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi khang bzang g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-25: rgyal pos bltas te mthong nas mi zhig la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-27: sgor 'phags pa drug sde 'ga' zhig byon par ma gyur grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-30: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam dang sgo na 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331a-31: des rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-0: 'phags @331b pa nye dga' chab sgo na mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-2: de nang du spyan drongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-3: de nang du 'ongs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-5: 'phags pa dga' po rab tu byung bar ma gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-7: 'phags pa; stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-13: khyod kyis dge slong rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-16: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi thabs su gnang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-17: de ltar bdag cag la byams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-18: bram ze gcig cig gis lha khyad du bkum ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-19: slob dpon dga' bo la ltag dbyug gnyis bsnun /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-20: bdag la yang ltag dbyug gis brgyab po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-22: des blon po rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-23: song la bram ze de'i lag pa chod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-24: des de khrid de srang du song na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-25: bram ze de'i pha ma gnyis kyis thos nas de dag mdza' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-27: gnyen dag dang 'dus shing snying rje rje ltar sma bab pa'i tshig dal gyis smra zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-28: kyi hud bu zhes cho nges 'debs bzhin srang du song nas de dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-29: skye bo'i tshogs des blon po de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-31: lha la nyes pa byas pa lag pa bcad pa'i ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-33: bram ze 'di lag pas 'tsho ba zhig pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-34: lag pa g-yon pa gcad pa'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-35: des de'i lag pa g-yon pa bcad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:331b-36: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-0: bram ze de de bzhin du lag pa g-yon pa g-yogs nas g-yas pas klog par @332a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-2: re zhig cig na nye dgas mthong nas de shin tu khros te rgyal po'i thad du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-3: rgyal po rnams kyi bde ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-5: bka'i 'bras bu btsan pa 'dir zad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-6: de yang lha la med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-12: bram ze de'i lag pa ma bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-13: rgyal pos blon po rnams bos te smras pa; khyed kyis bram ze de'i lag pa ma bcad dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-18: 'o na 'phags pa nye dga' 'di skad zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-19: tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-21: bram ze de de bzhin du lag pa g-yas pas sgyur sgyur bgyid cing bram ze'i khye'u rnams klog tu 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-24: de'i pha ma dag gis mchid nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-25: bram ze 'di lag pas 'tsho ba zhig pas lag pa g-yon pa chod cig ces mchi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-26: de'i slad du bdag gis de'i sug pa g-yon pa bkum mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-28: gal te de'i pha ma dag gis lag pa g-yon pa gcod du bcug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-29: ngas g-yas pa gcod du gzhug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-31: des de'i drung du song nas lag pa g-yas pa bcad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-32: de lag pa gnyi ga 'phyang zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-33: de sdug bsngal zhing 'dug pa dang nye dga' bos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-35: ci ste kho bo cag la ltag dbyug gis mi rdeg par lag pa dpyangs te 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332a-36: de sma bab nas dregs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-0: nga rgyal bcag ste cang mi @332b zer bar 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-2: khyim bdag rnams dge sbyong sh'akya'i bu rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-4: chad pas bcad nas kyang zhe gcod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-7: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-8: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-10: nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-11: dge slong dag lag pa yang gcod du 'jug pa las gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-13: dge slong gis lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-14: rkang pa dag gcad par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-15: snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-17: skyes bu gti mug can nye dgas dge sbyong gi las ma yin pa byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-19: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba rnams las de lta bu byed du 'jug pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-21: 'tsham pa ma yin no; ;de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-22: dge slong gis lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-23: rkang pa dag gcad par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-27: the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-28: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-30: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-33: yongs su btang ba la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-34: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-36: da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:332b-37: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang dga' bos ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-2: shing sna tshogs kyi tshal gyis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-5: chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig na drang srong 'bras bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-6: rtsa ba dang; chu za zhing 'thung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-8: shing shun gyon pa zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-9: de shing bil ba'i drung na 'dug cing rang gi don sems par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-10: de'i steng nas spre'u zhig gis pil ba'i 'bras bu zhig 'phangs pa des drang srong de'i mgo snad nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-11: khyod med 'gyur ba gang yin pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-12: de ni kho bo mi byed kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-13: khyod med 'gyur ba gang yin pa; ;de ni khyod nyid byed cing 'jug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-14: drang srong de'i smon 'drin rngon pa zhig 'dug pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-15: ri dvags 'chor du song ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-18: bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shing bil ba'i drung de nas gzhan zhig tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-19: rngon pa de de mi snang nas te por lta zhing shing bil ba de'i drung na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-20: spre'u des rngon pa de'i mgor bil ba'i 'bras bu gcig 'phangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-21: rngon pa de spyi cer zhig pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-22: de'i klad pa snad nas bil ba'i 'bras bus bsnun pas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-23: yid mi bde bas gyen du blta bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-24: ji tsam na spre'u mthong nas de khros pas gzhu rna drung du bkang ste dug mda' gcig de'i gnad du bsnun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333a-25: sa la lhung nas dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-0: de'i @333b tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-1: dge slong dga' bo 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-2: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spre'u gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-4: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rngon pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-6: de'i tshe yang 'di dga' bos ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-10: da ltar yang dga' bos ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-15: rigs ngan dang ni 'char kar bcas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-16: snam sbyar dang ni brnyas pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-17: mtshams bzang dang ni bzang sbyin dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-18: bdag gis 'du shes lhung bzed blangs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-19: ma pham pa dang zla srung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-20: rang gi btsos bu'i ras brkus pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-21: sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-22: phas pham pa gnyis las ji skad 'byung ba de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-23: khyad par cung zad kyang med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-25: phag dang bu ram shing dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-26: ta la chos gos gnag dga' bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-27: spra tshil gyis ni byugs pa'i snod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-28: mching bu'i phor ba sbom dga' mo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-30: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-31: de'i tshe mu ge'i dus la bab nas ma byin par len pa rnams kyis phag dag cig brkus te tshal stug po'i nang du dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-32: der de dag gis de bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-33: bsad nas sha bzang po rnams zos te mgo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:333b-36: drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:334a-0: nang par sngar langs nas khang pa'i steng @334a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:334a-2: de dag gis gang na dud pa 'thul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:334a-3: bya rgod lding ba dag mthong ba der thams cad 'dus te 'dong bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:334a-4: nang par sngar langs nas khang pa'i steng du 'dzegs te phyogs bzhir blta bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:334a-5: ji tsam na tshal stug po'i nang na dud pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:334a-6: bya rgod lding ba mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:334a-8: tshal gyi nang na dud pa 'thul zhing bya rgod lding bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:334a-9: gal te cung zad rnyed kyang srid pas 'dong ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:402b-23: zhes de gnyis rdzu 'phrul gyis chas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:402b-24: byang chub sems dpa'i mthus de'i rdzu 'phrul nyams te rkang pa kho nas ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer du zhugs nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi pho brang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na sdod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:402b-25: de nas drang srong mi dkar bas mi zhig la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-0: song la rgyal po zas gtsang la drang srong mi dkar ba lha la blta bar @403a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-3: des song nas rgyal po zas gtsang la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-5: drang srong mi dkar ba lha la blta bar 'tshal te chab sgo na mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-9: drang srong mi dkar ba la su 'gog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-11: de nang du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-12: rgyal po zas gtsang gis byon pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-13: zhes bya ba'i kun tu spyod pas kun tu spyad nas rkang pa la mchod yon phul te seng ge'i khri la 'dug tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-14: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-16: ci zhig gi slad du byon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-17: des tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-18: rgyal chen bdag ni khyod kyi sras //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-19: blta bar 'tshal nas mchis lags te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-21: thub pa de ni blta 'tshal lo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-22: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-27: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-32: des song nas byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzum par gzugs rnams la gzigs pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-33: mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-34: rigs pa rta pho rnam dag ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-35: nam gyi gung la nyal ba ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-36: dgos pa don du gnyer rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403a-37: mig la yun ring gnyid mi gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-3: gzhon nu bram ze rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-5: skar mkhan rnams la bstan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-10: de dag gis ci zhig tu lung bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-11: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-12: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-14: des byang chub sems dpa' la yan man brtag par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-15: ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rnams mthong nas dus ji tsam gyis bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur zhes bsam pa la zhugs nas des lo nyi shu rtsa dgu lon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-16: khyim nas byung ste lo drug tu dka' ba spyad nas bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur bar mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-17: des bdag nyid kyi rgyud bsam pa la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-18: bar skabs su 'chi bar mthong nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sred pa byung ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-19: mig mchi mas gang bzhin tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-20: sa bdag rtog ge rnams kyi blo gros 'khrul //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-21: dus kyi mthar ni 'khor los bsgyur mi 'byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-22: bsod nams mchog can 'di ni chos kyi mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-23: nyes pa rnams las rgyal te sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-24: mi yi dbang po mtshan gsal min rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-25: gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag por dbang phyug 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-26: shin tu mtshan gsal thub dbang rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:403b-27: mi mchog chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-0: de nas rgyal pos de mig mchi mas gang ba mthong nas bag tsha ste mi dga' nas slar tshigs @404a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-2: skyes pa bud med dag ni gang 'phrad nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-3: ngoms par mi 'gyur dga' ba thob 'gyur ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-4: lus bzang dga' byed de ni 'dir gzigs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-5: ci slad khyod kyi zhal ni mchi mar bcas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-6: bdag gi gzhon nu 'ga' las 'jigs pa'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-7: tshe zad nye bar gnas par ma gyur grang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-8: de slad dge ba 'di myur bdag la gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-9: khyod kyi bshums mo byung bas bdag 'dar to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-10: des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-11: gal te 'di yi steng du mkha' las ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-12: rdo rje'i char drag rab tu bab gyur kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-13: thub pa chen po'i sku yi spu nyag gcig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-14: kun tu bskyod par nus pa ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-15: tshan chen rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-16: shin tu mi bzad mtshon rnon rnams dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-17: sprul gdug rnams dang shin tu gdug pa'i dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-18: gzhon nu'i lus la bab kyang rmas mi nus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-19: mi dbang bdag ni chos mchog mdzod 'di dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-20: 'phrad nas don ma grub par 'chi 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-21: zhi ba mi 'thob rang gi nyes mthong nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-22: de yi slad du bdag ni ngu bar bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-23: 'jig rten dag ni gang rnams dus su ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-24: smra ba'i dam pa mtshungs med 'di yi chos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-25: nyan cing thos nas rab zhi mchog 'gro ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-26: bde skyid bsod nams can de rims nad bral //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-27: rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpas bdud rtsi 'thob par thos nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404a-28: log pa'i lta bas nyams pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-0: phal cher rdzun smra ba @404b dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-1: g-yo kun tu spyod pa la zhugs pa yan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-2: drang srong mi dkar bas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-4: khyod kyi grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di snyam du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-5: kye ma drang srong mi dkar ba rkang gis ser skya'i bzhi'i grong khyer du 'ongs kyang ci ma rung snyam du yun ring po nas smon pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-6: bdag skye bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rkang kho nas ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer du 'ongs te rkang kho nas 'byung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-7: grong khyer mdzes par bgyid du stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-8: rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-10: drang srong mi dkar ba rkang gis grong khyer nas 'byung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-11: grong khyer dang lam mdzes par byed du chug la dril bsgrags te 'di skad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-12: ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-13: yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa gzhan gyis kyang drang srong mi dkar ba grong khyer nas 'byung ba bsus shig ces kyang sgos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-16: zhes blon po rnams kyis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer rdo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-19: tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-20: dri zhim po'i phog phor bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-21: dar gyi lnga ldi mang po bres /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-22: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-23: me tog sna tshogs bkram ste lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-24: dga' ba'i tshal bas kyang lhag par dga' dga' ltar grong khyer mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-25: lam mdzes par byas nas dril bsgrags te 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:404b-27: grong khyer na gnas pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-2: yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-4: drang srong mi dkar ba sang rkang gis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer nas 'byung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-5: de'i phyir khyed thams cad kyis de bsus shig ces bka' stsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-6: ji tsam nam nangs pa dang drang srong mi dkar ba mi'i mchog stong phrag du mas bkur sti chen pos bskyal nas rkang gis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer nas byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-7: des ri ki skin dar song nas yang bsam gtan dag kyang bskyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-9: de'i tshe rnam par smin pa'i las yongs su zad pas nad kyis thebs te rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-13: 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis rim gro byas kyang nad nye bar zhi bar ma gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-14: na la das de'i lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-16: gang cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-17: bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-18: bdud rtsi tshol ba lags te; de'i slad du gal te khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-19: bdag la yang bdud rtsi'i bgo bsha' mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-22: nga yang gang cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-23: bdud rtsi tshol ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-24: ngas kyang bdud rtsi ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405a-25: 'on kyang khyod sh'akya rnams kyi nang du gzhon nu 'khrungs pa de'i spyan sngar rab tu byung la rigs kyi rlom pa ma byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-0: rus @405b kyi rlom pa ma byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-1: bram ze'i bu'i rlom pa ma byed par nga rgyal chog la tshangs pa spyad pa spyod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-3: khyod bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-5: bsags pa kun gyi mtha' 'dzad cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-6: mthon po'i mtha' ni bsnyil bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-8: gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-9: zhes bya bas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-10: des de'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas grong khyer w'a ra n'a sir song ste drang srong gi nang na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-11: de na la da dang rus mthun pas de'i ming drang srong na la da zhes bya bar chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-12: gzhon nu rab snang ma ma brgyad po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-13: pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-14: nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-15: dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-16: rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-21: gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par gtso bo gtso bo dag gis bskyed bsrings pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-22: mtshe'u na 'dug pa'i padma bzhin du skyed drag par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-23: de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-27: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-28: yul gyi dbang phyug la gnas pa'i mthu thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-29: sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rnal du phab ste gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-30: las kyi gnas tha dad pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:405b-31: glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406a-16: sgra grag par phog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406a-19: tshabs chen po de dag la mkhas par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406a-20: gnas lnga la yang byang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406a-21: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i rol pa la rol pa de'i tshe gzhon nu rab snang yang gzhon nu'i rtse ba la rtse'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406a-22: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba de'i tshe gzhon nu rab snang yang rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406a-23: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgan po dang nad pa dang shi ba gzigs nas skyo ste sa 'tsho ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406a-25: grags 'dzin ma la sogs pa bud med drug khri spangs nas nam gyi gung la dka' thub kyi nags su gnas te gong ma dang 'og ma'i rnam pa las grol ba'i drang srong rnams kyi thad nas 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406a-26: gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi thad nas gzugs med pa'i khams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406b-0: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar las @406b 'dod chags dang bral bar byas te lung 'bog pa med pa'i phyir dka' ba spyad pa rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406b-1: snyam nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406b-2: khyad par rtogs pa thob par ma gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406b-3: dbugs kyang ci bder rngubs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406b-5: zhal zas rags pa 'bras chan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406b-7: mar dkar dang til mar gyis kyang sku byugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406b-8: chu grang dro ran pas kyang sku khrus mdzad nas sde grong zhes bya ba'i grong du gshegs nas bu mo dga' mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406b-9: dga' stobs las 'o thug sbrang rtsi can lan bcu drug tu nying khur byas pa bzhes te gsol nas klu'i rgyal po nag pos bstod cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406b-10: rtsva tshong bkra shis las rtsva dag bzhes nas byang chub kyi shing drung ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas nyid kyis rtsva ma 'khrugs ma 'dzings par bting ste bzhugs nas skyil mo krung bcas te sku drang por bsrang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406b-11: dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas ji srid zag pa zad pa ma thob pa de srid kyi bar du skyil mo krung mi gzhig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406b-12: snyam du thugs bskyed cing tshig tu yang gsungs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:406b-13: des ji srid du zag pa zad pa ma brnyes pa de srid du skyil mo krung ma bshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-0: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud 'byung po dkrigs phrag drug cu'i 'khor can byams pa'i mtshon gyis pham par mdzad nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes te tshangs pas bskul nas yul w'a ra n'a sir gshegs te lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang @407a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-1: mthun pa bskor ba de'i tshe gzhon nu rab snang yang rgyal po chen por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-2: de na yul 'phags rgyal na rgyal po rab snang zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-8: skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-12: 'khrug long rab tu zhi ba; chom rkun dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-16: ma he phun sum tshogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-17: chos dang mthun pas byed du 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-18: de'i mthus rtag tu dga' ston gyis rab tu dga'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-19: grong khyer 'phags rgyal de na dbang po lnga dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-21: rdzing bu lnga brgya las wa nas 'bab pa'i chu lnga brgya rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer mdzes pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'bab bo; ;rgyal po rab snang yan lag mchog lnga po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-22: glang po che 'dam bu'i ri dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-23: glang po che mo bzang ldan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-24: rnga mo rgya mtsho'i rkang dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-26: 'phar ma pa khva zhes bya ba yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-27: de dag las 'dam bu'i ris ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-28: nyin zhag gcig la dpag tshad brgya chod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407a-37: de de ltar 'byor ba phun sum tshogs pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407b-0: nad gnyid med pa zhes bya bas @407b thebs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407b-2: mar la sdang zhing chang la dga' ba zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:407b-3: de la sman pa rnams kyis rdzas kyi tshogs rnams kyi khyad par sna tshogs dang sbyar ba'i mar blud na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:413b-13: des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:413b-21: 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:413b-23: rdza mkhan gyis nyin mtshan du snod bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:413b-26: gar song mi shes pa yus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:413b-35: nga gnyid med pa 'di la rgyu ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:413b-41: bag ma tsha bar smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:413b-47: khyod nga la mi snyan pa zer ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:413b-50: lha la bdag gis mi snyan pa ji skad du bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:413b-52: mi snyan pa ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:413b-56: des dong brkos nas ba lang gi lci bskam pos bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:413b-57: de'i steng du mal bcas te phyi de nyin rgyal po la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-3: nyal ma thag tu gnyid kyis log par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-4: gang gi tshe sad pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-6: khyod kyis gzigs sam zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-7: des bdag gis mngon sum du byas pa shes nas btsun mo'i 'khor du song ste ma la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-9: bdag su las skyes pa rdzun ma gsung bar drang por gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-11: smra bar bgyi yi; bdag la mi 'jigs pa stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-15: khyod kyi yab btsun mo'i 'khor rgya chen po dang ldan pas de ljongs shig tu song ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-16: bdag zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur te; de'i tshe bdag zla mtshan gyi khrus bgyid pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-17: sdig pa zhig mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-19: ci ste 'di pho zhig tu gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-20: bdag 'di dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i longs spyod dga' mgur spyad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-22: des de pho zhig tu gyur nas de dang bdag lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i longs spyod dga' mgur spyad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-23: de las khyod skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-28: de la bdag gis mi 'jigs pa byin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-29: de gsad du ni mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-30: gzhan su la yang mi zer bar bya ba'i phyir bya dga' byin la yul dbyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-31: snyam nas des de la karsha pa na lnga brgya byin te yul phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-34: ae la'i 'dab dang na la da //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414a-35: rab byung skra can zas dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-1: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-2: bdag gi nad 'di gzhi cher gyur pas sman pa dag bsdus la dpyad bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-4: des yul na gnas pa'i sman pa thams cad bsdus te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-6: nga'i nad 'di lta bu la dpyad gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-9: bdag cag gis khyod kyi dpyad bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-10: 'on kyang rgyal po'i khab na rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i bu sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed ces bgyi ba mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-12: des lha'i dpyad bgyid pa rngo thogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-13: des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la yi ge spring ste sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed tshur thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-18: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos yi ge bklags nas sdangs te lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-20: de la ci dang ci dgos pa de 'gums pas don gyis bdag kyang de'i dpyas par gyur pas ma legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-21: snyam nas de yid mi bde ba sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-22: de nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-24: ci'i slad du phyag 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing bzhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-27: khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i bzo bslab pa des na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:414b-31: des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-4: rgyal po de gtum po zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-5: ci'i phyir yang sems can gsod par byed pas khyod mi gsad grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-7: bdag srung mi nus pa'i sman pa de ci 'dra ba zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-8: thugs mi chung bar bdag gtang du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-12: song la ji ltar nga dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-16: yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mya ngan skye bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyod kyis bag yod par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-20: bdag gis nad pa'i sems srung rdo thogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-22: rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-23: 'tsho byed kyis 'phar ma pa'i mi de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-25: rgyal po de'i spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-28: ji lta bu zhig gis thebs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-29: des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par bsnyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-30: de nas 'tsho byed kyis chang gi kha dog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-32: chang gi ro bro ba'i mar sbyar nas dge mtshan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-34: bde legs dag byas te grogs po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-36: phu nu bo rnams la sbran nas yul 'phags rgyal du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-37: de mthar gyis yul kan+ya kub dzar phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-38: de na gnas pa'i sman pa'i khye'u zhig yod pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415a-39: ji ltar sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs te 'phags rgyal du 'gro ba thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-0: des aa ru ra gcig khyer te de'i drung du @415b song ste phan tshun yang dag par dga' ba dag byas nas 'tsho byed kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-2: rgyal po gtum po rab snang de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-3: nad ji lta bu zhig gis thebs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-4: khyed cag gis de'i dpyad ma byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-6: rgyal po de gnyid med pa'i nad kyis thebs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-12: gang zhig de mdun du mar gyi ming 'byin pa de'i mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la 'dor bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-14: su zhig de'i dpyad byed par nus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-16: de'i phyir ngas chang gi kha dog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-18: chang gi ro bro ba'i mar bskol te khyer te 'ongs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-20: gang gi tshe ngas khyod la brda byas pa de'i tshe khyod kyis mar 'di tsam gyi tshod cig byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-23: khyod kyis re zhig tsam zhig de'i rim gro gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-24: sos nas ngas khyod la rngan pa rab tu mang po sbyin zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-29: zhes de de dang lhan cig dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-30: 'tsho byed rim gyis 'phags rgyal dang nye bar phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-31: rgyal po rab snang gis ji ltar sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs pa thos nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-33: rgyal po'i bu yang yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-34: sman pa'i rgyal po yang yin pas mchod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-35: bkur stis grong khyer du 'ong bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-36: snyam nas des grong khyer mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:415b-37: lam mdzes par byas te btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-2: pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pas bsus nas sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed mi stong phrag du mas bskor te grong khyer du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-3: de nas de lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos te cung zhig bsdad nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis 'tsho byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-4: bdag gnyid med pa'i nad dkyel cher gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-5: dpyad gyis shig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-9: de dag kyang yul sna tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-10: gnas sna tshogs na mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-11: sman kha cig bdag gis ngo 'tshal la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-12: gzhan gyis ma 'tshal ba yang mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-14: bdag gis ma 'tshal ba yang mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-15: kha cig bdag gis kyang 'tshal la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-16: gzhan gyis kyang 'tshal ba yang mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-17: kha cig thag ring po na yang mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-18: kha cig nye ba na yang mchis pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-19: khyod kyis glang po che mo bzang ldan bdag la ci bder mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-23: ces smras nas des glang po che 'dul ba rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-24: 'tsho byed glang po che mo bzang ldan ci bder spyod du bcug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-25: khyed cag gis ma dgag cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-27: chab sgo ba rnams la yang bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416a-30: glang po che mo bzang ldan la zhon te 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-0: khyed cag gis ma dgag par ji ltar 'dod par dga' mgur 'gro zhing 'ong du @416b chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-3: glang po che 'dul ba rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-4: lhas ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-5: sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed glang po che mo bzang ldan la zhon te mig slob par rtsom pa na snga dro song zhing res 'ga' phyi dro slar 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-6: gung la song zhing res dga' phyi dro 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-7: phyi dro song zhing res 'ga' nub mo'i thun 'da' zhing 'ong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-8: de de ltar yid ches pa bskyed pa'i rtags kyis 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-16: des bkrus nas yang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-22: re zhig gdugs tshod gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-23: des zan bza' bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-26: bdag gis yul ma ga dha'i skyems shin tu bda' ba zhig 'tshal te mchis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-35: des sman pa'i khye'u de la de tsam gyi tshod cig byin cig pa'i brda byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-36: des de tsam gyi tshod cig byin nas rgyal pos 'thungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-37: 'thungs ma thag tu gnyid kyis log pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-38: 'tsho byed glang po che mo bzang ldan la zhon te bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-39: rgyal po yang na ma phyed na sad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-40: ji tsam na de la mar gyi sgregs pa byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-41: des mi zhig la bos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:416b-44: des nga la mar blud kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-1: drungs nas bcad de dor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-2: des kun tu btsal bar brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-3: mi snang nas des de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-6: de gdon mi 'tshal bar bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-7: rgyal po de khros nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-13: song la myur du glang po che 'dam bu'i ri la zhon te 'tsho byed ske nas thogs la de khrid de shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-14: de'i mgo drungs nas bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-15: gal te sgyu ma mkhan des khyod la cung zad cig byin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-16: khyod kyis blang bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-20: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi ltar mnyan nas myur ba myur bar glang po che 'dam bu'i ri la zhon te rjes bzhin du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-21: des de skyu ru ra'i tshal du zhugs pa mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-29: tshur re zhig skyu ru ra zo zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-31: lhas nga la de sgyu ma mkhan yin pas khyod kyis de las cung zad kyang ma len cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-40: phyed la sgyu ji lta bu zhig byar yod snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417a-44: des skyu ru ra phyed zos te sen mo'i bar phye mas bkang ba'i sen mos bcad pa'i phyed byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-0: de mdze can zhig pas @417b yan man gnyi gar 'khrus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-1: des de ri bor zhig tu bzhag nas ri bor pa de dag la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-3: rgyal po gtum por bya snang gi yan lag gi mchog gsum ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-5: glang po che mo bzang ldan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-7: 'di lta ste dpyad 'dis rim gro gyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-9: gzhan du na rgyal pos khyed cag nges par phung bar byed do; ;zhes smras nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-10: de dag gis de'i rim gro byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-11: sos par gyur nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-12: rgyal po yang sman pa'i khye'u des ji ltar bstan pa'i dpyad kyis rim gro byas pas de yang sos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-13: 'phar ma pa khva yang rim gyis rgyal po'i drung du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-21: ma legs pa zhig byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-23: ci ste khugs par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-24: de la lhas ci zhig bgyis par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-26: ngas de'i mgo drungs nas bcad nas sa la bor bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-28: sman pa'i rgyal po gang gis lha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-29: bdag kyang sos par bgyis pa de lta bu dgum pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-35: rngan pa rgya cher stsal mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-38: des de la yi ge spring ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-41: khyod la rngan pa sbyin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:417b-44: 'tsho byed kyis de la spring pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-0: khyod kyi bka' drin la bdag gi khyim na @418a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-2: 'on kyang gal te lhas bdag la thugs dpag mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-3: sman pa'i khye'u gang gis lha'i rim gro bgyis pa de la bya dga' stsal ba'i rigs so; ;rgyal pos khye'u de la rngan pa mang du byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-4: 'tsho byed la yang brgya stong ri ba'i ras yug chen gyi gos bskur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-7: rgyal po la 'os pa yin te; su la sbyin snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-10: chos nyid kyis bdag gi pha yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-12: snyam du bsam nas des de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-15: 'di chos gos su gyis la nga la phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-16: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de blangs nas blangs pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi chos gos gsum langs pa bas lhag par mthong nas des drub par brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-18: de las bcom ldan 'das kyi chos gos gsum dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-19: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs su bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-20: sgra gcan zin gyi rdul zan yang langs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-21: dga' ldan gyi gnas na sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i dri ba 'di skad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-22: bdag po rgyal po gang zhig ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-23: chags na rdul dang ldan pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-24: rdul med na ni rdul bral 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-25: gang gis 'dir ni chags zhes brjod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-26: blo ngan ji ltar mya ngan byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418a-27: mkhas pa ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-0: gang @418b gis ldan pa las bral nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-1: 'di na grub dang bde zhes brjod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-3: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe sus kyang gzung bar yang mi nus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-4: de dag gi don smra bar yang mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-5: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-6: yang dri ba de dag gzung bar nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-7: de dag gi don smra bar ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-9: re zhig cig na gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu bya ba zhig gi phyir dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du song ba na des dri ba bris pa de dag mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-10: de nas ya mtshan skyes te de bzung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-11: don khong du chud par ma nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-12: des de dag pho brang lcang lo can du khyer nas spang leb la bris te bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-13: de'i tshe rdo 'jog ces bya ba na klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab ces bya ba gnas pa de yun ring po nas bdag gis nam zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong zhes de snyam du smon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-14: de'i mdza' bo gnod sbyin gser 'od ces bya ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-15: bya ba zhig gi phyir gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu'i pho brang lcang lo can du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-16: des dri ba de dag spang leb la bris pa mthong nas des de dag blangs te chub par byas nas dpyad par brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-17: don khong du ma chud nas des rdo 'jog tu khyer te klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab la byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-20: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:418b-21: 'di dag gi don sus kyang ma rtogs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-3: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du bskor te 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-4: gang gis dri ba 'di dag gi don smra nus pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-5: ngas gser 'bum sbyin zhing bkur sti chen pos kyang rim gro bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-7: gal te 'ga' zhig gis smra bar nus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-12: zhes sgrogs la gzhan du song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-13: des de bzung nas kun chub par byas te bdag nyid bram ze'i khye'u zhig gi gzugs su sprul nas gser 'bum khyer te grong khyer dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-15: rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu bskor nas w'a ra n'a sir phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-16: des w'a ra n'a si'i lam po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-19: sum mdo dag tu shes ldan w'a ra n'a si'i grong na gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-20: yul so so nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-21: bdag gis dri ba 'di dag khyer te 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-22: gang zhig 'di dag gi don smra bar nus pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-24: bkur sti chen pos kyang rim gro bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-29: ya mtshan skyes nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus kyang sus kyang don smra bar ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-32: zhes bsgrag bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419a-33: w'a ra n'a si na gnas pa'i bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-0: @419b grong dang grong rdal ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-1: zhes ma sgrog par bdag cag gi skye bos nges par bkur ba'i dge sbyong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-2: bram ze dgon pa'i gnas na 'dug pa gang dag yin pa de dag je 'ong du chug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-8: na la da la sogs pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-11: zhes smras nas de sdod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-12: ji tsam zhig na na la da 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-13: des de'i mdun du 'dug ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-15: bdag gis dri ba 'di dag khyer te 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-16: gang zhig 'di dag gi don smra bar nus pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-18: bkur sti chen pos kyang rim gro bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-19: na la das de dag bklags nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-38: ae la'i 'dab kyis drang srong chen po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-42: zhes smras nas de sdod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-43: drang srong na la da'i smos 'drin dge slong lnga po yin pas de de dag gi drung du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:419b-45: bram ze'i khye'u zhig gis dri ba 'di dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-0: gser 'bum khyer nas bdag gi drung du 'ongs te gang zhig dri ba 'di dag gi don smra @420a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-1: nus pa de la gser 'bum 'di sbyin zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-2: bkur sti chen pos kyang ri mor bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-5: don mang la tshig nyung bas khong du chud par dka' na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-6: 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-8: na la da song la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-14: drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-16: mgu ba skyes nas myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-17: na la das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-18: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-20: nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-21: rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-22: ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems can gyis thog ma sangs rgyas mthong ba ltar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-23: lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems goms par byas pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-24: bu med pas bu rnyed pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-26: rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420a-27: de ltar nyams bde bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:420b-5: de thos nas drang srong na la das 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422a-20: bu stong rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan cing klubs pas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422a-21: zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-0: gza' dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang gis mdzes pa yang zil gyis gnon pa'i 'od kyang zil gyis mnan nas drang srong @422b smra ba ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-1: yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-2: 'khor de dag gis klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-3: mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-4: mig bgrad nas rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-7: rgyal po 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-10: gang la 'di lta bu'i 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa yod pa 'di rgyal po ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-11: sa'i steng gi sa'i dbang phyug gang zhig yin zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-14: lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-16: de na gang dag chags pa'i dbang du song ba de dag gis de mthong nas bdag kyang 'di 'dra bar nam zhig 'gyur zhes chags pa skyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-17: de dag de ltar rnam pa du mar rtog pa na klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-18: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;skyes bu blun po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-22: khyod yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bslab pa'i mtshams las 'das pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:422b-23: klu'i skye gnas smad par skyes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423a-2: song la sprul pa btang ste rang gi cha lugs kyis shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423a-5: bdag dang klu mang po 'khon mchis pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423a-6: la las bdag la gnod pa bgyis su mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423a-9: song la klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab la srung bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423a-11: zhes gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab srung ba lhur len cing phyi bzhin 'brang ngo ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423a-13: bam po nyi shu rtsa lnga pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423a-14: de nas klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste rang gi rang bzhin du mngon par bsgyur nas mjug ma ni; rdo 'jog na 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423a-16: w'a ra n'a si na 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423a-17: mgo re re la sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa'i shing ae la zhig skyes pas kun nas srin bu'i rigs brgya phrag du mas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423a-19: sbrang bu'i tshogs du ma ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423a-21: rnag dang khrag dri mnam zhing rab tu mnam pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423a-23: de nas sems can rnams kyis mthong na mig sgyur ba de lta bur lus bsgyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-0: 'khor de dag gis klu'i rgyal po ae @423b la'i 'dab kyi lus mthong mi 'dod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-2: 'dod chags dang ma bral ba 'jigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-4: skyo bar byed pa che zhing gas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-7: kha dog gi rnam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-8: dbyibs kyi khyad par du ma dang ldan pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-9: mthong nas kyang skrag nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-11: shin tu 'jigs su rung ba 'di gang zhig lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-15: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha lugs 'chang shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-16: nga'i drung du 'ongs pa gang la khyed kyis 'khor ba'i sgo'i khyad par 'dod pas chags pa skyed pa de yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-18: mi 'dod pa'i las kyi nyes pas mngon par grub pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-22: de dag gis las chud mi za ba thos pas yid mi bde ba skyes te cang mi zer bar 'dug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-23: de nas klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-30: mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:423b-31: mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-0: ston pa byams pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba nas lha dang mi rnams kyi ston @424a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-1: pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-2: zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-3: des khyod la lung ston par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-4: de nas klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-5: dge slong dag the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-6: the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-9: klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab kyis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-10: las de'i rnam par smin pas klu'i skye gnas smad par skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-11: shing ae la mgo la skyes pas kun nas srin bu'i rigs brgya phrag du mas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-13: sbrang ma'i tshogs du ma ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-15: rnag dang khrag gi dri mnam zhing rab tu mnam pa ni; 'dzag pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu 'di nyams su myong lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-18: klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab kyis las byas shing bsags pa; tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-20: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa nges par 'byung ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-21: klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab kyis las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-23: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424a-24: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-0: me'i khams la ma yin @424b rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-1: 'on kyang las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-4: skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-5: bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-6: las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-7: tshogs shing dus la bab pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-8: lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-10: sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-11: ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-14: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-15: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-16: de grong khyer w'a ra n'a si'i drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na gnas shing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-17: de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum dang ldan pa spong ba par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-18: de dben pa'i phyogs shig ni shing ae la'i drung du 'chags bcas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-19: de de na 'chag pa'i 'phral par shing ae la'i 'dab mas phog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-21: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor gyis ngal te 'chag pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-22: de'i 'phral ba la de'i 'dab mas phog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:424b-23: des de la khros te bcad nas lag pa gnyis kyis dum bu dum bur byas te bor nas 'di skad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-0: 'tsho ba yang med pa 'di la bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis nyes pa ci zhig gzigs @425a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-1: na; gang gi phyir bslab pa'i gzhir bcas zhes kyang smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-2: des khros te bslab pa dral bas lus zhig nas klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te mgo la shing ae la skyes pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-3: srin bu'i rigs brgya phrag du mas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-5: sbrang ma'i tshogs du ma ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-7: rnag dang khrag dri mnam zhing rab tu mnam zhing rab tu mnam pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-11: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dge slong sde snod gsum pa spong ba pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-12: klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-13: gang 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas rab tu khros te bslab pa dral ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-14: klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te mgo la shing ae la skyes pas kun nas srin bu'i rigs brgya phrag du mas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-16: sbrang bu'i tshogs du ma ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-18: rnag dang khrag dri mnam zhing rab tu mnam pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-21: de ltar na; las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-22: gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gcig tu dkar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-26: las gcig tu nag pa dang 'dren ma dag spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-27: las gcig tu dkar ba dag kho na la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425a-29: khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-0: bcom ldan 'das @425b gyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-1: dge slong de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-2: de nas drang srong na la da bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-3: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong na la das 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-5: bdag gis sngon dam bcas pa tshar phyung lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-7: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-8: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-9: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dge slong tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-11: tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-12: ces dge slong tshur zhes bya bas bka' stsal pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-13: de bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag tu skra byi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-15: lag na lhung bzed dang bya ma bum thogs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-16: skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa lta bu bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam du gnas par gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-17: de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-18: skra bregs snam sbyar bgos pa'i lus ldan zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-19: sangs rgyas dgongs pas cha lugs bsgyur nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:425b-20: mod la dbang po rab zhi kho nar gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-0: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa na la da dge slong @426a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-1: tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-2: de la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis ji skad 'bod mi shes pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-3: dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-6: 'di'i rus ka tya'i bu yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-8: 'di la ka tya'i bu zhes bos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-9: dge slong dag gis de la ka tya'i bu zhes 'bod par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-11: ka tya'i bu zhes bya bar chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-16: med pa gnyis la rten to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-19: phal cher phung po dang nye bar len pas rnam par bcings shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-20: yod pa dang med pa gnyis la rten to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-22: sems kyi rten mngon par zhen pa bag la nyal du 'gyur ba 'di dag la bdag ces bya bar khas mi len /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-25: mngon par zhen par mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-33: the tshom med par gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa kho na skyes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426a-36: yang dag pa'i lta ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas yang @426b dag pa'i lta bar 'dogs par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-3: 'jig rten kun 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis lta ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-4: 'jig rten la med pa gang yin pa der mi sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-5: ka tya'i bu 'jig rten 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi lta ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-6: 'jig rten la yod pa gang yin pa der sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-9: mtha' gnyis po de dag la mi rten par 'jig rten la dbu ma'i lam gyis chos ston cing 'di ltar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-13: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-14: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-15: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-16: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-17: skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-18: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-19: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-20: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-21: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-22: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-23: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:426b-30: sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig kun 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-0: 'du byed 'gag pas rnam par shes pa @427a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-2: rnam par shes pa 'gag pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-3: ming dang gzugs 'gag pas skye mched drug 'gag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-4: skye mched drug 'gag pas reg pa 'gag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-10: skye ba 'gag pas rga shi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-17: sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bus bden pa mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-21: mi g-yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid reg ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-22: 'dus byas kyi rnam pa thams cad chos nyid kyis 'jig pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-25: 'joms par rtogs nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-26: sems gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-27: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-29: rig pas ma rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-31: so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427a-32: srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-0: bkur sti la rgyab @427b kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-2: nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-4: gus par smra bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la ka tya'i bu zhes bka' stsal cing bos bas de'i ming ka tya'i bu chen po zhes bya bar chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-6: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-7: 'phags rgyal du khyogs dang khyogs su 'dom pa'i mi ngas shig byung nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-10: pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas te sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-11: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-13: zhi ba bgyid du stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-15: bram ze rnams 'tshal ma stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-18: nye 'khor na gnas pa'i dge ba'i ngo bor bkur ba'i dge sbyong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-19: bram ze gang yang rung ba de dag tshol du stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-20: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis chab sgo ba rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-23: bram ze gang su yang rung ba yams kyi nad zhi bar byed par 'gyur ba zhig 'dir 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-25: skabs 'di lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi mkhyen pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-28: rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po mnga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:427b-29: 'jig rten la phan 'dogs par zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-1: gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-2: gdul ba'i dngos po gsum la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-3: chu bo bzhi las brgal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-4: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zhabs kyi mthil la legs bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-5: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas goms pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-7: 'gro ba lnga las shin tu 'das pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-8: yan lag drug dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-9: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-10: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-11: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-12: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-13: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-14: phyogs bcur grags pas khyab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-15: brgya phrag bcu la mnga' bsgyur bas khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-16: chos nyid kyis nyin lan gsum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-17: mtshan lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-39: ngan song nas drangs te mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428a-40: su'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-0: 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang @428b bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-2: 'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba las 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par gzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-4: sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya zhes ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-6: rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-7: dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur srid kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-8: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-9: sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-10: ji ltar ma ni bu gcig sdug pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-11: lta bar byed cing de yi srog srung ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-12: de bzhin gdul ba'i skye bo rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs shing de'i rgyud srung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-14: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyud la gnas pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-15: thugs rje'i ba drus srid pa bgrod dka' bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-16: 'khyams pa gdul bar bya ba'i sras dag ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-17: ba gshin be'u stor bzhin du skyo med tshol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-19: rgyal po gtum po rab snang btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-22: 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa gang gis gdul bar bya ba yin snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-23: dge slong ka tya'i bu chen po'i yin par gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-26: 'phags rgyal gyi rgyal po gtum po rab snang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:428b-30: 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa la soms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-0: @429a *// zhes tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-1: de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-2: lhung bzed thogs te w'a ra n'a sir bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-3: w'a ra n'a sir bsod snyoms spyad nas zas kyi bya ba byas te zas phyis len pa spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-4: gnas mal ji ltar spyad pa cham du phab ste lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas 'khor lnga brgya dang 'phags rgyal gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-5: de'i tshe yul ka n+ya kub dza na tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po'i sngon khyim pa'i mdza' bo bram ze zhig gnas pa de'i bu mo gzugs khyad par can dang ldan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-6: tshe rabs snga ma'i ming dang mthun par skra can zhes btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-7: ji tsam na lho phyogs nas gar mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-8: des de'i skra bzang bar mthong nas bram ze de'i drung du song ste des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-10: bu mo 'di'i skra rnams bdag la byin cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-11: karsha pa na stong sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-15: bram ze yin te bdag cag skra btsong du mi rung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-16: ji ltar skra btsong zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-17: gar mkhan gyi slob dpon de cang mi zer bar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-18: bram ze de yang phyi de nyin dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-19: de'i chung mas ji ltar 'phags pa ka tya'i bu chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429a-20: de nas thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-0: 'phags @429b rgyal du 'ong bar 'dod ces thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-1: khyo dang bral bas sdug bsngal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-2: yid mi bde ba skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-3: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po 'ong ba thos nas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-4: bu mo skra can mas ma de ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-7: ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-10: 'phags pa ka tya'i bu chen po khyod kyi pha'i chung po grogs 'di nas mi ring ba zhig na 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-14: bdag cag gi khyim gyi gnas skabs ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-15: 'di lta bur gyur pas ring zhig na 'ongs pa de la nyi ma 'ga'i bsod snyoms kyang sbyin mi nus pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-18: gal te de lta na gar mkhan gyi slob dpon de bdag gi skra karsha pa na stong gis nyo bas de nyid du tshongs la 'phags pa ka tya'i bu chen po la bsod snyoms phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-22: des de'i tshig dad pa las byung ba de thos nas bu mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-26: gar mkhan gyi slob dpon gang na ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-28: khyod kyis nga'i bu mo'i skra karsha pa na stong gis 'jal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-29: de snoms la karsha pa na stong stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:429b-33: kho bo de dag dgos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-0: 'on kyang karsha pa na lnga brgyar 'tshong na @430a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-6: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po yul ka n+ya kub dzar phyin nas de dben pa bla gab med pa zhig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-7: de nas bram ze mo de rtab por gom pa bslang ste tshe dang ldan pa katya'i bu chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-8: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-9: 'phags pa ka tya'i bu chen po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-10: sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-13: nga'i 'khor skye bo phal po che'o /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-23: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos bram ze mo de la cang mi zer bar khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-24: de nas bram ze mo de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-25: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig nas rkang pa la phyag byas nas stan las langs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-26: de nas bram ze mo des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-27: de nyid kyi nub mo gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-28: bca' ba dag bshams te nang par sngar langs nas stan bting /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-29: chu ra bzhag nas tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po la spyan 'dren gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430a-30: 'phags pa gdugs tshod bshams lags te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430b-3: phyin nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /
