K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430b-5: bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstar te yang dag par tshim par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430b-6: yang dag par stob par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430b-7: rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430b-8: bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstar te yang dag par tshim par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430b-9: yang dag par bstabs nas tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po bshos gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430b-11: phyag bcabs par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir stan ches dma' ba zhig bting nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430b-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po bram ze mo de la chos 'chad par 'dod nas bram ze mo de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430b-13: bram ze'i bu mo skra can ga re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430b-15: 'phags pa; spyod lam nyams lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430b-17: ma bsam par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:430b-18: des bu mo skra can gyi spyod pa bsam nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:431a-1: bsam pa can gyi bu mo de bos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:431a-2: des bos pa dang khang pa nas byung ste dad pa drag pos tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:431a-3: bram ze mo des smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:431a-12: 'on kyang bu mo 'dis gsang ba'i rgyan lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:431a-13: phyi rol gyi rgyan lnga brgya dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:431a-31: yang dag par dga' bar byed cing /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:431b-1: yang dag par len du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:431b-3: yang dag par dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song nas rim gyis 'phags rgyal du phyin to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432a-3: de gang gi mthus yin pa mi shes na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432a-6: gnyi ga la zan ci 'dra ba zhig dris shig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432a-16: des bram ze rnams la 'bras chan mi gtsang ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432a-18: rtsabs mo byin te tshim par byas mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432a-20: de cang mi zer bar 'dug go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432a-30: nyin zhag gi rgyags blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432a-31: sgo bas rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-0: rgyal @432b pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-5: bram ze rnams kyis smras pa /
