K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-8: zas ci 'dod pa byin nas tshim par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-9: des bram ze dag rgyal po'i pho brang 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-10: sgo sham pa'i kha na las pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-17: de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-18: de dag dong nas dge slong dag la dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-19: de dag gis snga ma bzhin du smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-20: sgo bas rgyal po la de bzhin du smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-21: glang po che'i bres ji lta ba bzhin du rta'i bres dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-23: sa phyogs gtsang mar ngan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-24: bsod pa dag sbyar bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-25: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-26: dge slong dag sbyin gnas dam pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-29: snyam du rig nas dad pa skyes nas tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:432b-30: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433a-1: snang la tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433a-4: yang dag par dga' bar byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433a-5: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433a-6: yang dag par len du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433a-8: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433a-9: de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang stan las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433a-10: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433a-11: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433a-12: 'phags pa ka tya'i bu chen po dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433a-13: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos rgyal po gtum po rab snang la cang mi smra bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433a-14: de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos cang mi smra bas gnang bar rig nas tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433a-15: de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de nyid kyi nub mo gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433a-16: bca' ba dag bshams te nang par sngar langs nas gdan bting /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-0: chu ra bzhag ste tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen @433b po la spyan 'dren pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-1: 'phags pa ka tya'i bu chen po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-3: da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes dus tshod gdas par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-4: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-5: lhung bzed thogs te dge slong gi tshogs kyis bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi bkad sa ga na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-6: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-7: de yang 'dug ste rol mo'i sgra phyung nas bro gar mkhan rnams kyis bro gar rnam pa du ma dag bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-8: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-9: dge slong dag dbang po bsdams te 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-11: rol mo'i sgra de dag zhi nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-15: glu snyan lags sam zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-16: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-22: dbang po nang du bsdus pa rnams kyis ma gzigs su ni gsol na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-26: khyod la mi gsod pa la thug pa 'ga' yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:433b-31: skyes bu de'i lag tu snod til mar gyis bkang ste bskur la phyi bzhin gshed ma'i mi btang ste de la 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434a-2: snod 'bru mar gyis khad chad du gang ba bya rog gis btung du rung ba 'di khyer la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434a-3: ljongs bzang po thams cad bskor la 'dir khyer te shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434a-4: ci ste til mar thigs pa gcig sa la bo na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434a-5: mi ral gri gdengs pa 'dis khyod kyi mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la 'dor du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434a-7: de'i mdun du rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs phyung ste bro gar rnam pa sna tshogs byed du chug cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434a-8: de nas khyod yid ches par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434a-10: rgyal po gtum po rab snang des ji skad bstan pa thams cad rim gyis byas nas mi de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434a-15: rol mo'i sgra snyan tam zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434a-22: dbang po nang du bsdus pa dag gis ma mthong du chug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434a-27: gal te bdag gis 'bru mar gyi snod 'di las 'bru mar thigs pa gcig sa la bo na yang gshed ma'i mi ral gri gdengs pa 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434a-28: bdag gi mgo drungs nas bcad nas sa la 'bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434a-29: snyam ste bdag 'chi bas 'jigs skrag nas 'bru mar gyi snod la sems rtse gcig tu gtad de lta bas nyam thag ste 'dir mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434a-30: ji ltar mthong ngam thos zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-0: rgyal po spobs pa med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug @434b go; tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-6: re zhig mi 'di tshe gcig gis sdug bsngal gyi phyir bdag nyid mi g-yeng ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-7: bag yod par kun tu srung bar bgyid na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-8: bdag cag dge slong rol mo'i sgra la blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-9: nyan pa spong ba blangs te bslab pa bzung ba dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-10: tshe rabs du ma'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu gar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-11: glu dang rol mo'i sgra la blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-12: nyan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-15: rgyal po gtum po rab snang 'bru mar gyi snod mthong bas yid ches te lhag par dad nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-18: pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-19: ka tya'i bu la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs pa la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-20: bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstar te yang dag par tshim par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-21: yang dag par stob par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-22: rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-23: bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstar te yang dag par tshim par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-24: yang dag par bstabs nas tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen pos gdug tshod gsol nas lhung bzed gyu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-25: phyag bcabs par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po'i mdun du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:434b-26: 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-0: ji ltar bdag gis bgyis pa de ltar 'khor @435a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-1: lnga brgya po bsod pa'i zhal zas kyis tshim par bgyis pa gzhan 'ga' mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-3: lhas bdag du ma bas khyad zhugs pa khyod kyis bdag 'khor lnga brgya dang bsod pa'i kha zas 'di lta bus tshim par byas pa gang yin pa 'di la ngo mtshar ci zhig che /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-4: bdag 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe ri bor na gnas pa'i bu mo zhig gis bdag nyid kyi skra btsongs nas 'khor lnga brgya dang kha zas bsod pa 'di lta bus tshim par byas pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-5: 'di bas ches khyad zhugs par ngo mtshar che'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-6: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-7: bu mo gang zhig gis skra karsha pa na lnga brgyar ldom pa de lta bu'i bud med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-8: lha dag gi nang na yang ga la yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-9: mdor na de btsal bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-11: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-12: bsnyen par dka' ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-13: des de la bu mo de ri bor gang na 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-14: ces dri bar ma nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-15: des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-17: ka tya'i bu chen po ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-18: lam gang nas 'ongs pa nas deng la ri bor gang na bu mo zhig gis skra btsongs nas 'phags pa ka tya'i bu chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang bshos gsol ba tshol la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-19: btsal nas de nga'i don du slongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-22: zhes zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi ltar mnyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-23: rim gyis tshol ba na ka n+ya kub dzar phyin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435a-24: de dag gis der de btsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-0: btsal @435b nas lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos te bram ze mo de'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-1: sgo khang du 'khod nas smras ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-4: bram ze mo des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-13: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-17: 'on kyang 'di la gnyod mang du dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-22: gsang ba'i rgyan lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-23: phyi rol gyi rgyan lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-25: rgyal po gtum po rab snang la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-27: bu mo'i gnyod 'di snyed cig brtsegs lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-28: zhes don de spring pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-29: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis phyir spring pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-31: bu mo gnyod ji tsam gyis khugs pa nos shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-33: de dag gis blangs nas rgyal pos nyi ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-35: yud tsam dang sbyar te dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-36: gang gi nyin par 'phags rgyal du phyin pa de nyid du de nyid kyi nyin par yul 'phags rgyal du mi ngas thams cad kyi thams cad du nye bar zhi zhing zhi bar gyur nas de'i ming zhi ba zhi ba zhes bya bar chags so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-38: bam po nyi shu rtsa drug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:435b-40: skye dang 'tshe byed ka tya'i bu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-2: mdun du 'don dang sgrol ma dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-3: pi wang len dang skra bregs dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-4: rus pa'i keng rus btogs par ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-5: de ni tshoms su yang dag bsdus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-6: de'i tshe 'phags rgyal na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-7: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-9: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-10: des dus cung zad cig rtses /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-12: dga' mgur spyad nas zong khyer te yul gzhan du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-13: de'i chung ma zhim po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-14: bzang po zos shing gyon pas nyon mongs pas shin tu gzir te; de nyin gcig bzhin du khang thog tu song nas thams cad du skyes pa la lta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-15: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-16: rgyal po gtum po rab snang glang po che la zhon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-17: de'i khyim dang nye ba zhig tu song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-18: des de la me tog gi phreng ba 'phangs pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-19: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi phrag pa la phog go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-20: des gyen du blta bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-21: ji tsam na na tshod gzhon nu kha dog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-22: dbyibs kyi khyad par gyis bdag nyid shin tu mdzes par rlom pa 'dod pas thebs pa'i spyod pas zur stegs su mig zur gyis blta ba de mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436a-23: mthong nas kyang de la sems kyi bsam pa 'chums par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-0: de yang de la @436b chags pas ldog ma nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-1: de glang po che las babs nas de'i khyim du zhugs te de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pas sems can zhugs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-2: bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-4: skyes pa chags pa shes shing ma chags pa shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-5: dus shes shing zla mtshan dang ldan pa shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-6: mngal du zhugs pa shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-7: gang las mngal du zhugs pa shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-8: khye'ur shes shing bu mor shes pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-12: sems can dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-13: zhes ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-14: rgyal pos de la mu tig gi se mo do zhig byin te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-15: gal te khyod las bu khye'u zhig byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-16: de la mu tig gi se mo do 'di byin la nga'i drung du thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-20: de la mngal gyi mtshan ma byung bar gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-21: tshong dpon des yi ge spring ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-23: mi dga' ba ma byed par bag rton cig ces byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-24: des thos nas skrag ste des rgyal po la gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-26: bdag gi khyim thab de nye ba zhig tu mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-27: bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-28: rgyal pos de la spring pa; khyod mi dga' ba ma byed par bag rton cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-29: ngas ji ltar de thag ches ring bar 'gro ba de ltar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:436b-30: zhes spring nas de cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-0: rgyal pos de la nor 'di lta bu @437a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-2: de ma rnyed par ma 'ongs shig ces spring pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-3: de de dag tshol du lam ring po zhig tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-4: de yang zla ba dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-5: blta na sdug pa zhig btsas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-6: des mar dang sbrang rtsis kha bkang ste sgrom gyi nang du shing bal bting nas de'i thog tu bzhag ste steng nas gos dkar pos g-yogs nas de'i thog tu mu tig gi se mo do bzhag ste kha bcad nas sgrom de la rgya skegs la rgya btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-9: khyod sgrom 'di khyer te song la rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor dkyil 'khor gyis la mar me bus te zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-10: bzhag nas nam sus blangs kyi bar du phyogs gcig tu khyer cig ces bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-11: des de bzhin du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-12: ji tsam zhig na ba lang lam de nas 'gro ba dag gis sgrom de bskor te 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-13: re zhig cig na rgyal po gtum po rab snang btsun mo zhi ba dang lhan cig khang bzang gi steng du song ste 'dug pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-14: de bskor te 'dug pa'i ba lang de dag mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-15: des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-17: ba lang gis bskor cing 'dug pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-19: de dag gis mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437a-21: sgrom rgya skegs la rgya btab pa zhig mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-0: sgrom de'i nang na rdzas ci mchis pa de bdag la @437b stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-5: ji tsam na sgrom de rgyal po'i thad du blangs nas rgyal pos kha bye ste bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-6: re zhig na mu tig gi se mo do dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-8: des mu tig gi se mo do ngo shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-11: snyam pa'i sems skyes nas des de zhi ba la 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-15: khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad du gdags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-17: khye'u 'di ba lang dag gis bskyangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-18: de'i phyir 'di'i ming ba lang skyong du gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-19: zhes de'i ming pa lang skyong zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-20: de nas btsun mo zhi bas de bskyed pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-21: de'i ming yang zhi ba ba lang skyong zhes bya bar chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-22: de'i tshe yul rdo 'jog na rgyal po padma'i snying po can zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-23: 'byor pa zhes bya ba nas chos dang mthun pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-24: zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-25: de'i yul na dus bzhin du char 'bab pas shing rnams kyi me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-27: sa la lo yang legs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-28: slong mo bas kyang zas rnyed sla'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:437b-29: ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po padma'i snying po can khang bzang gi thog tu song ste blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor zhing 'dug pa des blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438a-0: rgyal po gzhan gang gi yul na yang 'di ltar char dus bzhin du @438a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438a-4: sa la lo legs shing slong mo bas kyang zas rtag tu rnyed sla ba yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438a-8: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi yul 'phags rgyal zhes bgyi ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438a-10: shing la me tog dang 'bras bu yang rtag tu 'chags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438a-11: sa la lo legs pas slong mo bas kyang rtag tu zas rnyed sla'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438a-16: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438a-19: de dag gis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas rgyal po padma'i snying po can dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang yul 'phags rgyal du song ste rim gyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi yul du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438a-20: des de dag gzhom par brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438a-21: yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyi rgyal po gtum po rab snang la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438a-23: rgyal po padma'i snying po can zhes bgyi ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438a-24: dpung gi tshogs chen po bsdus nas lha'i yul 'joms su mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438a-25: zhes sbran pa thos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438a-26: des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-0: dpung bu chung gi tshogs ga bskon te rgyal po padma'i snying po can dang g-yul 'gyed @438b pa'i phyir spags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-1: de na rgyal po padma'i snying po can gyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi glang po che'i tshogs thams cad kyang 'phrog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-4: dpung bu chung gi tshogs kyang 'phrog ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-5: rgyal po gtum po rab snang bcom /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-8: pham par byas te g-yul bzlog pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-9: phan tshun kun tu byer ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-10: blon po dang skye bo'i tshogs gzhan rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-11: 'phags rgyal du zhugs nas ra pa'i khar sbrengs te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-13: rkya gcig por ri 'or zhig tu phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-14: ri 'or de na zhing pa snams byed ces bya ba zhig zhing rmed pa des de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-16: rgyal po padma'i snying po can gyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang bcom /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-19: pham par byas te g-yul bzlog ces grag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-23: yul na gnas kyang yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i rgyal po padma'i snying po can gyis bcom /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-26: pham par byas te g-yul bzlog pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-27: rgyal po de'i blon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-29: gal te nga de'i blon por gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-30: myur zhing myur bar rgyal po padma'i snying po can mgul nas btags te 'phags rgyal du khrid pa zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:438b-31: de de skad du gtam zer zhing 'dug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-0: de'i chung ma ri khrod ma zhes bya ba zan khyer te 'ongs nas des sa brkos te lo ma bting nas lag pa bkrus @439a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-1: te zan bza' bar byas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-2: rgyal po la bltas te khrom gyi dpa' bo khyod ngal bas skyo zhing bkres skom bas nyon mongs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-3: bdag cag dbang thang chung ngu'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-4: btung ba ci 'dra ba yang mi bsdo de gsol gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-5: tshur gshegs zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-6: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-9: snyam du rig nas rta las babs te lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-10: rkang pa bkrus nas rta las stan phog ste bting nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-11: 'dug nas des 'tsho ba'i bsam pas bza' bar brtsams so; ;de nas phor bu kha chag cig nas chang blud pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-13: phor pa 'di kha chag mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-14: 'on kyang gang du ma chag pa'i phyogs de nas chang btung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-18: tshul phun sum tshogs pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-20: gal te kha ma chag pa'i phyogs nas bdag gis chang 'thungs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-25: 'dis gang nas 'thungs pa de nyid nas 'thungs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-26: bdag la shin tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439a-27: snyam nas des ngos de nyid nas 'thungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-0: bdag gis ngos gang nas 'thungs @439b pa'i ngos de nyid nas 'dis kyang 'thungs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-1: 'di dang 'jig rten gyi lugs yun ring du mi 'chor bar mdza' po bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-3: des chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-6: nga'i snying gi grogs po yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-7: 'di khyim du khrid de song la dril phyi dang khrus gyis te zan byin la rta la yang rtsva dang chas byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-8: des de khyim du khrid nas dril phyi dang khrus byas te zan byin nas rta la yang rtsva dang chas byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-9: rgyal po padma'i snying po can la ri brag pa skya seng zhes pa dag gis bsdos nas de dag ri brags kyi lung pa nas blugs te rgyal po padma'i snying po can gyi yul gzhom par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-10: blon po rnams kyis rgyal po padma'i snying po can la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-12: ri brag pa skya seng dag gis lha'i yul gzhom par bgyis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-13: ji ltar bgyi ba dgongs su gsol zhes yi ge spring ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-14: yi ge'i nang na yang tshigs su bcad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-15: gzhan gyi yul ni gzhom pa'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-16: ji ltar nan tan mdzad pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-17: rang gi yul 'khor srung ba yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-18: de bzhin lhas kyang mdzad du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-20: rgyal po padma'i snying po can gyis yi ge bklags nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-21: gal te bdag de bzhin du song na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-23: rgyal po padma'i snying po can pham ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:439b-27: snyam nas des rgyal po gtum po rab snang la spring pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-1: zin pa de thal du zad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-3: khyod la cung zad kyang mi byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-4: gzhan du na phan tshun mgul nas 'jus te 'gro bar zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-5: blon po dag gis spring pa de thos nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-6: gal te 'di na rgyal po med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-11: de dag gis de la yi ge spring pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-13: gal te de ltar yin yang kho bo cag rgyal po ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-14: bya rog bzhin du dogs pa dang bcas pa yin pas bdag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-16: khyod kyi mdza' bo'i bu rgyal bu gzhon nu ba lang skyong 'di 'ong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-17: de dang brang sprod la bzhud cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-19: rgyal po padma'i snying po can gyis rgyal bu gzhon nu ba lang skyong dang brang sprad nas 'phags rgyal bskor ba btang ste rdo 'jog tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-20: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-22: rgyal po padma'i snying po can gyis bag phab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-26: zhes de dag gis pho nya rta ba kun tu btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-27: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis rgyal po padma'i snying po can gyis 'phags rgyal bskor ba btang nas yul rdo 'jog tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-29: des zhing pa snams byed de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-31: bdag ni 'jigs pa dang bral bas de'i phyir bdag 'phags rgyal du 'gro'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440a-32: gal te khyod 'phags rgyal du 'ong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-0: bdag gi @440b khyim du shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-3: khyod kyi ming yang kho bos mi shes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-6: snams byed nga'i khyim mi shes kyang bla /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-7: 'on kyang khyod 'phags rgyal du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-8: rta mang gi khyim gang yin zhes dris shig ces smras te song nas rim gyis yul 'phags rgyal du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-9: des chab sgo ba la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-11: 'ga' zhig rta mang gi khyim gang yin zhes 'dri ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-12: de nga'i drung du khrid de shog cig ces smras nas khyim du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-13: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yul 'phags rgyal du dus ston la bab nas yul de na gnas ba'i skye bo'i tshogs dag kyang der dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-14: zhing ba'i chung ma ri khrod mas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-16: yul 'phags rgyal na dus ston la bab ste skye bo'i tshogs der dong na bdag cag kyang bzhud la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-17: der dus ston kyang nyams su myong bar bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-18: rta mang de yang gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-21: ci khrom gyi dpa' bos gang smras pa de thams cad bden du re'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-23: gnas gsum gyis blta bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-26: rgyal srid las nyams pa zhig na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-31: bzhud la dus ston kyang nyams su myong bar bgyis nas byon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:440b-37: zhes de gnyis dong nas rim gyis yul 'phags rgyal du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-3: rta mang zhes bya ba'i khyim gang yin zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-4: des de chung ma dang bcas te rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi drung du khrid pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-5: rgyal pos rgyang ring po nas zhes byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-7: zhes bya ba'i kun tu spyod pa kun tu spyad nas snams byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-11: rgyal po de spyi cer zhig yin pa las des cod pa na bcings pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-12: des rgyal po ngo ma shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-13: rgyal pos seng ge'i khri las babs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-14: des ngo shes nas des chung ma dang bcas te rkang pa la phyag byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-15: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis kyang rim gro cher byas nas btsun mo 'khor gyi nang du khrid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-18: zan byin nas nyal khang yang byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-19: btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-20: 'di dag nga'i pha ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-21: de'i phyir khyed kyis 'di gnyis la bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-29: yo byad dag gis rim gro gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-30: de rgyal pos bkur sti dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-35: pho brang 'khor gyi mi thams cad kyis rim gro bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441a-36: zhing pa snams byed cung zad cig 'dug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-0: bdag mchis te slar lha'i @441b zhal blta ba mi dka' ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-4: lhan cig rgyal srid gzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-7: zhing pa bdag lta bus rgyal srid gzung ba'i rngo ci zhig thogs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-12: gal te bdag rgyal po de'i blon po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-14: bdag gis myur zhing myur bar rgyal po padma'i snying po can mgul nas btags te 'phags rgyal du khrid pa zhig ces zer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-18: de ji lta bu zhig ces byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-19: de cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-20: rgyal po gtum po rab snang la blon po lnga brgya yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-21: des de dag la gsor bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-22: de dag gis de gsos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-23: de'i ming gsos pa gsos pa zhes bya bar chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-24: dus gzhan zhig na rgyal pos de la dris pa; gsos pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-28: bdag la blon po de rnams brnyas bzhin bgyid mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-32: de rnams dgos pa byung ba'i gros byed pa'i nang du khyod kyang zhugs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-33: su yang khyod la ma gus par mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-36: zhing pa bdag lta bus gros dag gi nang du 'jug pa'i rdo ci zhig thogs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-38: de bzhin du gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-39: blon po de thams cad gus pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:441b-41: de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-0: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gtum po @442a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-1: rab snang blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor cing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-2: de gsos pa smrar gzhug par 'dod pa'i blo sngon du btang ste blon po rnams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-4: don 'di ji ltar bya zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-5: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-11: gzhan dag cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-18: gsos pa la don 'di ji ltar bya zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-26: rgyal pos de bzhin du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-27: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-28: rgyal po yang 'di'i gros bzhin mdzad pas de la ma gus par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-29: zhes de dag gis de la gus pa bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-30: yang rgyal pos gsos pa la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-34: re zhig dang por bdag la khyim ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-35: rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-37: gsos pa la khyim byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-40: blon po che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dus las 'das pa de'i khyim zhig mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442a-41: de'i mchis brang yang de na mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-0: rgyal pos khyim de chung ma dang nor bu bcas @442b pa gsos pa la byin cig ces bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-1: de dag gis khyim de chung ma dang bcas te gsos pa la byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-2: yang rgyal pos gsos pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-6: mchis brang gi 'khor rnams mi 'di zhing pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-7: zhes brnyas par bgyid lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-11: gang gi tshe khyod khrus byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe ngas khyod la 'gugs pa gtang dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-12: khyod kyis de la khrus zin te 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-15: ji ltar bdag gis lha'i bka' bcag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-18: ngas khyod la gnang ba 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-19: gang gi tshe khyod zan za bar 'dod pa de'i tshe ngas 'gugs pa gnyis pa gtang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-20: de la yang khyod kyis zan zos te 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-22: de nas nga nyid khyod kyi khyim du 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-23: 'ongs nas khyod dang lhan cig snod gcig tu zan bza'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-30: bdag khyod dang lhan cig gcig tu 'tshal ma 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-39: de dag khyod la gus pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-41: des khas blangs nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-42: de nas rgyal pos de khrus byed pa'i dus su gsos pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:442b-43: dgos cung zad cig yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-1: ces pho nya btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-2: des de'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-4: dgos pa cung zad cig yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-5: rings par shog cig ces lhas bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-12: de'i chung ma'i 'khor dag cig gtam gleng bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-14: 'o bu cag gi khyo zhing pa 'di 'di ltar tshod med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-15: lha'i bka' khyad du gsod pa la ltos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-16: de na kha cig na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-18: gang dag rigs ngan pa las byung ba de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-19: gyi nas kyang dregs par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-24: mthon po'i mtha' ltung bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-25: gdon mi za bar rgyal pos 'di brlag par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-27: des khrus byas nas zan bza' bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-28: rgyal pos de la gsos pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-29: bya ba cung zad cig yod pa mi sleb kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-31: ces pho nya gnyis pa btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-33: de bzhin du bsgo na des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-36: ji tsam na rgyal po nyid 'ongs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443a-48: chung ma dag gis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-0: 'di dang @443b lhan cig bzhad gad mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-1: snyam nas de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te mig tshugs su rtog par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-2: rgyal pos rkang pa dang lag pa bkrus te de dang lhan cig tu zan bza' bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-3: chung ma rnams kyis mthong nas sdangs te phan tshun du smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-5: bdag cag gis 'di la 'di zhing pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-7: lha 'di dang lhan cig bshos gsol ba la ltos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-8: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-10: 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-12: 'di la ci zhig bsgrub tu yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-13: gang dang lhan cig rgyal po bshos gsol ba de la bdag cag gis bkur sti ma byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-14: ci ste rgyal pos mkhyen na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-15: bdag cag la gdon mi za bar gnod pa byed par 'gyur bas gang thal ba de thal du zad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-17: nam yang de la mi gus pa mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-22: zhes de dag 'tsher zhing mi dga' bzhin du de'i ngag mi gcog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-23: yang rgyal pos gsos pa la ji lta zhing 'dug ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-27: khyod kyi zhang po de bdag la shin tu khyad du 'gums lags mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-29: gsos pa de lta bu bya bar mi nus mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-30: 'on kyang thams cad khyod kho na la rag las kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:443b-35: khyod kyis bdag la bka' gyod mi rma bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-3: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gsos pa srang gi nang nas song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-4: de na pha ma dag bral ba'i byis pa gnyis shig ci dgar rgyu zhing gnas pa gang yang rung ba nyin par zas bsgrubs nas don gong gis rtse zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-5: ji tsam na bran mo zhig chu'i bum pa khyer nas lam de nas 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-9: ri lu'i bum pa 'di brtol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-12: gal te khyod kyis ri lu skam pos bu ga phyung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-13: de na ngo mtshar mi che'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-14: ngas ri lu gsher ba 'dis glan pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-19: des de la ri lu skam pos brtol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-21: de nas gsos pas de dag mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-24: de la sha glan par nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-25: snyam du rig nas kva'i byis pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-26: khyed gnyis su'i yin zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-29: bdag cag pha ma dang bral nas gang yang rung ba nas nyin par gyi zas tshol ba zhig lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-32: ci nga'i gan du mi 'dug gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-35: 'on kyang gsol ba zhig mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444a-36: bdag cag gis khyod kyi las ci zhig bgyi bar 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-0: cung zad kyang byar @444b med kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-1: don gong nyid goms par byed du bcug cing gzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-2: 'on kyang khyod kyis nga'i don gcig bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-3: gang zhig nga dang lhan cig 'thab mo byed pa de'i kha khyed gnyis kyis mi gtsang ba'i nang du bsgres pa'i ri lus khong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-8: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ci zhig gi phyir de de dang lhan cig tu 'thab mo byed par brtsams na; de gnyis kyis de'i khar mi gtsang ba'i nang du bsgres pa'i ri lus bkang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-9: de skyengs nas la gor du phyis te kha btsums nas spobs pa med par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-10: yang rgyal pos gsos pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-12: khyod ji lta zhing 'dug ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-16: khyod kyi nang mi des zhing pa'i mi yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-17: zhes bdag la brnyas par bas mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-19: gsos pa; gal te de lta na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-20: gang gi tshe nga btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ba de'i tshe khyod shog la rgyal po ga la bzhugs zhes dris shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-21: gal te btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-23: de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bzhud cing gnas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-24: rgyal po'i bya ba dang rgyal po'i don dag nyams par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-26: gal te yang der nga'i mal lam khri dag mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-28: ngas khyod kyi rkang pa bkru bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:444b-34: 'bangs lags pas de ji ltar rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-4: de dag khyod la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-6: des khas blangs nas thams cad rim gyis byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-7: rgyal po'i mal stan gang yin pa'i steng du re zhig ngal bso'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-8: zhes byas nas nyal ba dang de nyid du gnyid kyis log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-9: rgyal po phyir byung nas 'di su zhig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-13: 'di sus kyang rkang pa ma bkrus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-16: zhes rgyal pos de'i rkang pa bkrus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-17: de dag dogs shing mi dga' bzhin de la rim gro bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-18: rgyal po gtum po rab snang bud med la brkam chags can zhig pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-19: de dus gzhan zhig na blon po'i bu ne'u ldang dag dang lhan cig khang bzang gi steng du song nas de dag dang gtam bzang po ma yin pa zer zhing 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-23: yul 'khor gang na bud med bzang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-24: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-26: ka n+ya kub dza na bud med bzang lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-29: kampo ji ka'i bud med bzang lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-32: sbrul gdug pa dag bzang lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445a-34: grong khyer gzhan na gnas pa'i bud med dag lta zhog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445b-0: 'phags rgyal 'di nyid na @445b gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo zhes bgyi ba gang yin pa mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445b-1: sum cu rtsa gsum pas bkur ba'i lha mo gzugs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445b-4: dbyibs dang ldan pa yang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snang bas lha'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i skar ma rnams kyi snang ba zil gyis non pa de lta bu zhig gnas lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445b-6: na tshod kyi yon tan brjod pa thos nas lhag par gzhan gyi bud med kyi gan du 'gro 'dod par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445b-7: cha lugs mi mngon par byas nas de nyid kyi nub mo karsha pa na lnga brgya khyer te de'i khyim du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445b-8: des de la byon pa legs so; ;zhes bya ba'i kun tu spyod pa kun tu spyad nas mngag gzhug ma'i bu mo la gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445b-10: song la rigs kyi bu 'di dril phyi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445b-14: zhes bu mo des gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo'i ltar mnyan te rgyal po gtum po rab snang la dril phyi bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445b-15: de de la dril phyi byed pa na mi gzhan zhig kyang karsha pa na lnga brgya khyer te der 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445b-16: des bzang mo dga' mgur spyod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445b-18: gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo de'i kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445b-19: gal te gcig nang du 'ongs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:445b-20: yang gcig 'ongs na snga ma bsad cing phyi ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-0: bu mo des rgyal po gtum po rab snang de'i gzugs dang na tshod mdzes pa de mthong nas 'di lta bu'i rgyal rigs kyi bu yang sdig pa'i chos kun @446a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-4: mchi ma'i thigs pa rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi lus la phog par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-5: de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gyen du bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-6: bu mo de ngu nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-12: rgyal po dogs par gyur nas yang dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-15: bag ma tsha bar smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-18: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-21: nga 'bros pa'i thabs lta 'ga' yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-23: 'di'i khyim kun nas gshed ma'i mi ral gri thogs pas bskor bas med mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-25: de mi gtsang bas de lta zhig smras kyang ci rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-28: gtsang yang rung mi gtsang yang rung smros la srog byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-30: phyogs 'di na chab khung sa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-31: lcags kyi phur pas btab cing 'dug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-37: phyogs de gang yin pa ston cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-40: des phyogs de de la bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-41: smad 'tshong ma de'i khyim dang 'dab chags na bram ze ltas mkhan zhig gi khyim yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446a-42: re zhig na bram ze de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-0: de'i @446b chung ma yang chu khyer nas phyi bzhin du 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-1: bram ze des skar ma bltas pa dang mi bzang bar mthong nas des bram ze mo la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-16: rgyal po'i skyabs na bde bar gnas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-19: de thams cad rgyal pos thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-20: de nas rgyal pos lcags kyi phur pa de bsgul bar brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-22: stobs dang ldan pa des bsgrims te bsgul nas phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-23: bshang ba 'bab pa de dang lhan cig byung ste song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-24: bram ze des bram ze mo de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-28: nyam nga bar gyur pa gang yin pa de dang lha bral te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-29: rgyal po gson pa bdag cag dbang thang chen /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-31: de ltar spags bzhin du btsun mo zhi ba'i thad du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-32: des lha de ci zhig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-33: des ji lta bur gyur ba smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-34: btsun mo zhi ba mig mchi mas gang bzhin du de smyig ma'i tshal pas bzhar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-35: smyig ma'i tshal pas bzhar nas sa dkar gyis dril phyi byas so; ;sa dkar gyis dril phyi byas nas spas sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i chus bkrus te mthun pa'i gos dag bskon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:446b-36: de phyi de nyin par don bya ba'i sar 'dug nas blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-2: de dag gis ltas mkhan dag bos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-3: de dag la rgyal pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-5: mdang nga'i mtshan mo ji lta bur 'das par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-7: ji ltar rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba chos bzhin du sa skyong ba ltar lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-10: phyogs che ge mo zhig na bram ze ltas mkhan zhig gnas pa de bos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-11: de dag gis de'i thog tu rgyal po'i mi dag btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-12: de dag der song nas bram ze de la lha 'bod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-15: lhas ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-19: de dag slar song ba dang bram ze mo des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-21: bdag gis sngar khyod la rgyal po gtum po khro bar 'gyur ba ma smra zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-23: khyod nga'i ngag nyan du ma btub pas da ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-25: des bram ze mo la thams cad legs par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-26: bag ma tsha zhig smras nas des de dbugs phyung ste rgyal po'i drung du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-27: rgyal pos rgyang ring po nas mthong nas byon pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-28: zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod nas mkhan po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447a-32: de yid dga' ba skyes nas rgyal po la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba byas nas ji ltar bsgo ba'i gnas su 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-0: @447b rgyal pos yud tsam zhig bsdad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-4: lha mnyes par rdo thogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-6: bdag mdang ji lta bu zhig tu 'das par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-10: nyam nga bar gyur pa las khyod bsod nams kyi mthu can zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-11: de'i slad du mi mdza' ba rnams kyi nang nas 'o brgyal te thar par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-13: rgyal po mgu nas shes ldan dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-14: mkhan pos ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-18: khyod la dam pa ci zhig dbul pa gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-21: re zhig nang mi dang mchid gros 'tshal te slad kyis gsol bar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-26: des rings par 'gros bslang nas song ste rang gi khyim du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-27: nang mi rnams la pos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-28: nga la lhas dam pa sbyin par chad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-32: re zhig khyod nyid la dri'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-49: nor bu'i rna cha gdub 'khor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-50: de'i bran mo skyed mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:447b-51: ci ste khyod cag de lta bu 'dod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-1: tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis lha las dam pa gsol gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-4: snyam du bsam nas tshigs su bcad pa sems shing rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-6: bdag cag ci 'tshal ba de gsan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-7: bdag ni grong khyer lnga zhig 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-8: bram ze mo yang ba lang brgya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-9: bu ni cang shes shing rta ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-10: bu mo nor bu'i rna cha 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-11: bdag gi bran mo skyed ma ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-12: de yang rdo leb bzang po 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-13: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis kyang de la de bzhin du slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-14: khyod la grong mchog lnga sbyin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-15: chung ma la yang ba lang brgya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-16: bu la rta yi shing rta brgya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-17: bu mo la yang rna cha dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-18: bran mo skyed ma slong ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-19: rdo leb bzang po 'dod pa yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-20: de yi re ba 'bras yod par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-21: ji ltar 'dod pa bskang bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-22: de nas rgyal pos de la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dam pa byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-31: bdag gi cha ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-33: des de nan gyis mdun na 'don du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-34: re zhig cig na rgyal po gtum po rab snang la ri khrod pa skya seng ba zhes bya ba dag log pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-35: des gsol pa la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448a-36: song la skya seng dag rnal du phob cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-0: des kyang dpung @448b gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po glang po che'i tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-3: dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-4: das de dag rnal du pham ste de nas der gte'u yang bzung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-5: dpya nar ma dang bla skyes kyang 'bul du bcug nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-6: rgyal pos ji ltar gsos pas skya seng dag rnal du phab nas gte'u yang bzung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-7: dpya nar ma dad bla skyes kyang 'bul du bcug nas 'ongs pa thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-8: des thos nas kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas bsur song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-9: ji tsam zhig na gte'u pa de'i nang na ri brag gi bu mo shu ba dang g-yan pas thebs pa zhig mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-10: mthong nas kyang gsos pa la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-12: 'di dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa'i mi lta 'ga' yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-15: dga' mgur spyod pa 'ba' zhig tu ma bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-16: gang la 'di stsal pa de'i rgyab tu 'di 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-17: rta skad 'byin par bgyid pa de gnas mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-20: de ci de bzhin du 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-22: lha; spyan sngar dbab par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-23: gsos pas bu mo de sman pa rnams la gtad nas shes ldan dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-24: kho bos yo byad thams cad sbyar gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-26: de dag gis de la dpyad byas pa dang nad kyang sos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-27: de nas rim gyis yo byad kyi khyad par rnams kyis bskyed pas gzugs bzang mor gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:448b-28: gsos pas de bu mor bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-1: gi bu mo sgrol ma zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-4: des lha 'dir gdugs tshod la spyan drang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-5: khyod rgyan thams cad kyis klubs la lha la bdag nyid ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-7: de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-8: gsos pas rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-9: lhas pa bdag gi sdum pa yongs su spangs pa lta zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-12: gsos pa khyod kyis ma bos par ji ltar blta bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-18: gsos pas rgyal po la 'os pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-19: btung ba dag sbyar te khyim yang byi dor byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-20: rgyal po de'i khyim du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-21: des kyang rgyal po la 'os pa'i dril phyi dag gis phyis nas dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i chus ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-23: byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-25: gos rnam pa sna tshogs ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-27: rgyal po la 'os pa'i bshos gsol nas gsos pa dang lhan cig tu gtam dag gleng zhing 'dug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-28: des kyang yol bas bskor ba'i nang nas pho long 'phangs nas de yol ba bzlog ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-30: pho long slar stsol ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-31: de na tshod gzhon zhing mdzes pa rgyal pos mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-32: mthong ma thag tu chags par gyur te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449a-36: bdag gi bu mo lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-5: ci'i phyir nga la mi sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-8: de rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos chung mar blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-9: gsar pas rnying pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-11: rgyal po yang de la gcig tu lta zhing sems chags pa las gzhan btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-12: de kho na lhur len cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-14: sngon dam bcas pa bya ba'i dus de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-16: snyam nas bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-17: bu mo khyod kyis rgyal po 'di'i rgyab tu zhon nas rta skad zer du gzhug par nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-18: des cung zad cig bgad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-20: re zhig gal te rdo thogs sam mi thogs blta bar bgyi'o ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-22: bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-24: ma bslab par mkhas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-25: de gos dri ma can bgos nas khri'u dra ba can gyi steng na nyal zhing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-33: khyod kyi lha rnams la ci byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:449b-35: gang gi tshe lhas bdag gi pha ri khrod pa skya seng 'bebs su btang ba de'i tshe bdag gis de zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du lha rnams la gsol btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-0: gal te bdag gi pha don yang dag par grub nas slar 'khor @450a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-1: na gang gis bdag blangs pa de'i rgyab tu bdag zhon la rta skad zer du stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-6: rgya che bas cis kyang bdag gi don 'di mi bgyis par 'gyur bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-7: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la zhen pa rnams kyis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-8: mi bya ba ci yang med pa yin pas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-10: khyod kyi don du nga'i ched du gsol ba byas pa yin pas thams cad bsgrub kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-12: de yang cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-13: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-15: khyod ci'i phyir mi smra bar 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-17: khyod kyi gsol ba gzhan yang cung zad med grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-20: cung zad kyang ma mchis mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-21: 'on kyang de'i dus su bram ze mdun na 'don gyis lha'i shis pa brjod pa brjod par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-22: pi wang len pa'i mis kyang pi wang dag blang bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-26: bram ze mdun na 'don pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-28: 'on kyang pi wang len pa zhig btsal bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-32: pi wang len pa btsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-33: de'i tshe yul sa 'dzin nas sa 'dzin pa zhig zong thogs nas 'phags rgyal du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-34: des smad tshong ma la ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis zil gyis non pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450a-36: de dang lhan cig zos pa de ltar lhag par chags so /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-0: @450b de'i gla mi gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyis bor nas bros pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-6: grong mi zong thogs nas yul gzhan du 'gro ba yang ma lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-8: khyed lta bu dag las rnyed pa gang lags pa des 'tsho ba lags pas karsha pa na dag stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-9: yang na skyes bu gzhan gyi skabs phye zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-12: kho bo la karsha pa na dag med mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-13: ji ste karsha pa na dag bdog na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-14: khyod las lhag pa gzhan su zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-16: 'on kyang khyod bdag la sdug pas 'dir 'dug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-18: ci ste bdag gis smras pa gang yin pa de byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-20: gdod bdag khyod la sdug par shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-24: des bshang ba byas nas de'i steng du rgya shug gi tshig gu bzhag ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-25: ci ste khyod bdag la byams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-26: rgya shug gi tshig gu 'di sos zungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-27: des gzung bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-28: des rdog pa gcig bsnun nas phul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-30: ci 'di lta bu dag kyang byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-31: rtsog pa khyod dang nga lhan cig mi 'dug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-33: ces smras nas des de khyim nas bskrad do; ;de yang pi wang la mkhas pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-34: pi wang len pas 'tsho ba tshol bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:450b-35: rgyal pos gsos pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-0: khyod kyi bu mos 'di lta 'di ltar lha rnams la gsol @451a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-4: pi wang sus blang bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-7: sa 'dzin pa pi wang len pas 'tsho bar bgyid pa zhig mchis kyi; de'i mig dar gyis bkab la nang du dgug par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-11: de bzhin du gyis la khug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-12: rgyal po dang mdun na 'don khang pa bdun brtsegs kyi steng du 'dzegs nas des mdun na 'don la ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bsnyad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-13: de cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-14: gsos pas kyang sa 'dzin pa'i mig dar gyis bkab nas khang pa bdun brtsegs kyi steng du bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-15: skya seng gi bu mo sgrol ma yang ngo mtshar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-18: gos dkar po bgos nas rgyal po'i rgyab tu zhon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-19: bram ze mdun na 'don gyis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-20: shis par brjod pa brjod par brtsams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-23: rgyal po gtum po rab snang yang rta'i skad 'byin par zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-26: bdun brtsegs yin pas rtas 'dir ga la thar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-27: gdon mi za bar 'dir bdag lta bu bud med kyi dbang du gyur pa 'ga' zhig bud med kyis co bris so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-28: snyam nas des glu tshig tu blangs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-29: rgya shug tshig gus gyur pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451a-30: rgya shug tshig gus gyur pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-1: zhes zer zhing de pi wang mi len par yang nas yang du rgyun mi chad par glu len cing glu tshig de smra'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-2: rgyal pos de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-5: des ji ltar gyur pa rnams brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-9: snyam nas rgyal pos de la karsha pa na lnga brgya byin nas yul phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-10: dus gzhan zhig na mdun na 'don gyis rgyal po la lha khyod kyis mi rigs pa zhig bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-12: bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-14: de snyad med par cang mi zer bar 'dug go; des phyi de nyin gsos pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-15: deng bram ze des 'di skad ces smras na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-16: de rang gi chung mas mgo dbyir gzhug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-21: zhes smras nas gsos pas khyim du song ste chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-23: bram ze mdun na 'don gyis lha la 'di dang 'di skad ces smras pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-24: de kho bo la smras na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-25: khyod kyis ci nas bram ze de rang gi chung mas mgo dbyir gzhug pa de lta bu'i sbyar ba bya bar nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-29: de lta zhig bgyis lags su bas kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:451b-35: g-yon can gyi chung ma yang g-yon can nyid du 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-0: des bram ze de'i chung ma dang lhan cig mdza' mor bya bar @452a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-2: gang gi tshe de gnyis phan tshun phebs par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-3: des bram ze mo la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-7: de bdag gis gang smras pa de byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-9: grogs mos kho mo la thub re skan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-10: ji ltar khyim thab bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ba de ltar khyod kyis ga la 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-11: gsos pa'i chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-13: ci ste khyod kyi khyim thab khyod kyi dbang du 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-16: da des nga rgyal bskyed pas grogs mo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-19: ces smras nas de gos dri ma can gyon nas khri'u dra ba can gyi steng na nyal te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-28: khyod kyi khyim na mi bdog gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-30: khyod kyis lha rnams la khas blangs pa gang yin pa de thams cad gyis shig dang bde bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-31: de cang mi zer bar 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-34: khyod kyis lha rnams la ci zhig khas blangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-37: gang gi tshe khyod bram ze'i tshul du gnas pa na lhas pos ba de'i tshe bdag gis lha rnams la 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-38: bdag gi khyim thab bde bar slar 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452a-39: bdag gis de'i mgo phyi nas de'i skra rnams khyed la dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-0: zhes gsol pa @452b byas pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-1: de'i rjes la khyod kyang longs spyod skyes par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-4: lha de rnams 'khrugs par gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-5: mdor na bdag 'gum du bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-7: bram ze mo; khyod kyis gang lha rnams la gsol ba byas pa de yang nga'i ched yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-8: longs shig dang lha la gsol te thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-9: des gsos pa'i chung ma de la bdag gi khyim thab ni; 'di skad du lha la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-15: mdun na 'don gyi chung ma des bdag la 'di skad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-16: bdag gis khyim thab khas len tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-17: lha la gsol nas thams cad bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-20: gsos pas kyang rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-22: don de grub pa lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-23: mdun na 'don de khyed la zhur mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-27: de nga'i ched yin pas bag ma tsha zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-28: re zhig na mdun na 'don de rgyal po la gsol du 'ongs te lha /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-29: bdag lha rnams kyi don cung zad cig bgyid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-30: zla ba drug na lha'i zhal blta zhing mchi bar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-34: de khyim du song nas mgo phyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-35: de mgo phyi nas kyang khyim nang nyid na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-36: de'i chung mas gsos pa'i chung ma la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:452b-38: kho mo'i khyim thab de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-1: kyang gsos pa la bsnyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-2: gsos pas kyang rgyal po gtum po rab snang la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-3: de rab tu dga' ste mdun na 'don de khug ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-4: gsos pas kyang khye'u gnyis shig glu tshig bslab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-5: gang na bud med gzugs ldan la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-6: rigs dang ldan zhing rigs spel ma //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-7: de na rta med rta skad zer //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-8: mdun na 'don mgo phyi la ltos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-10: ji tsam na mdun na 'don de zhva zhig gyon nas rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-11: khye'u de gnyis kyis glu tshig bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-12: gang na bud med gzugs ldan la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-13: rigs dang ldan zhing rigs spel ma //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-14: de na rta med rta skad zer //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-15: zhes byas nas gzhan zhig gis de'i zhva phud nas mdun na 'don mgo phyi la ltos zhes byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-16: de na gad mo chen po byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-17: mdun na 'don yid la ngo tsha bar gyur nas kha rog par mgo smad de sma bab nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-18: gsos pas dgos pa dag byung ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-19: de dag la gtse bar brtsams nas gang na 'di lta bur bud med kyi dbang du gyur pa de na rgyal po'i don ga la yod ces byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-20: rgyal pos mdun na 'don la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-22: khyod kyis gsos pa de gtse bar nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-25: re zhig rngo thogs ma mi thogs bltas te bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453a-26: de'i tsha bo sgyu ma mkhas pa zhig yod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-0: tsha bo gsos pa 'dis rgyal po 'khor dang @453b bcas pa'i mdun du bdag mtho brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-1: de la khyod kyis gtse bar nus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-2: bdag gi sha glan par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-6: re zhig nus sam mi nus bltas te bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-7: zhes smras nas des mig 'phrul gyis 'gron po sprul /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-8: phyag dar gyi phung po las khyim du sprul /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-9: rus pa'i rus gong las ded dpon gyi chung ma gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa mdzes pa zhig sprul to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-10: rgyal po'i kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-12: de la bdag nyid kyis sho gam gcod pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-13: yang na gsos pa gtong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-14: gsos pas 'gron po de dag las sho gam gcad par brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-15: des 'gron po rnams la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-17: ded dpon gyi khyim gang yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-18: de dag gis khyim 'di lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-21: re zhig na ded dpon gyi chung ma gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-24: sems g-yo bar byed pa zhig mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-25: mthong ma thag tu chags par gyur nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-27: khyod dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-28: 'gron po sho gam mi gcad par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-33: 'on kyang mtshan mo dga' mgur spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-34: de'i mig 'phrul gyis mtshan mor sprul pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:453b-35: gsos pas de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454a-0: ji tsam nas mgul pa nas 'khyud @454a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454a-2: mig 'phrul mkhan gyis mig 'phrul slar bsdus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454a-3: gsos pa phyag dar khrod na keng rus kyi mgul nas 'khyud de nyal zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454a-4: mdun na 'don gyis rgyal po la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454a-7: gzigs shig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454a-8: rgyal pos blta ba'i phyir srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma bsdus te song nas rgyal pos de se gol gyi sgras bslang nas gsos pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454a-10: bud med gang dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pa de'i sha yang za'am zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454a-11: de rab tu skyengs nas langs te bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454a-12: 'di ltar rgyal po 'dis bdag co dris nas gson te yang ci rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454a-16: bdag rang gi rang 'chi bar bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454a-18: song la 'phags pa ka tya'i bu chen po'i gan du rab tu 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454a-19: snyam nas de tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454a-23: des de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas gcig las 'phros pa'i lung klog tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454a-24: rgyal po gtum po rab snang de med pa dang mi dga' bar gyur nas des de rab tu byung ba las phab ste sngon gyi gnas ji lta ba bzhin bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-0: ba lang @454b skyong dang rngon pa nyid dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-1: bud med rnams dang bad sa'i rgyal po dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-2: nor lhas byin pa dang ni rab snang dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-3: rgyal po rdo 'jog tu ni song ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-4: rmi lam rmis par gyur pa tha ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-5: rgyal po gtum po rab snang mal chen por 'dug pa na rnam par rtog pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-7: bdag 'das na gzhon nu ba lang skyong gis rgyal srid bya bar nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-11: snyam nas des de bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-13: nga re zhig btsun mo'i 'khor du bya ba cung zad cig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-14: nga zhag bdun gyi bar du btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-15: de'i bar du khyod kyis rgyal po gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-16: ces bsgo nas de rgyal po byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-17: rgyal po gtum po rab snang ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-18: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-19: gzhon nu ba lang skyong yang rgol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-20: phyir rgol ba rnams kyi tha snyad la legs par sbyong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-21: rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis bya ba byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-22: bud med gang dag bzung ba de dang de dag la so sor /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-24: khyod bud med 'di 'dod dam zhes rmed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-25: bud med la yang khyod skyes pa 'di 'dod dam zhes rmed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-26: gal te de dag phan tshun mngon par 'dod par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-27: de nas blon po rnams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:454b-29: 'di dag phan tshun mngon par 'dod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-0: 'di dag la nga'i chab 'og na 'tsho ba sus kyang cung zad kyang ma smra bar 'di dag ci dga' spyod cing 'dug @455a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-5: zhag bdun lon te rgyal po phyir byung nas gsos pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-6: gsos pa ci; gzhon nu ba lang skyong nga 'das nas rgyal srid byed nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-11: 'on kyang byi ba bgyid pa rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-13: rgyal pos smras pa; gsos pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-15: byi ba mi byed pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-16: des ji lta bu yin pa brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-19: gzhon nu 'di gzhan gyi bud med rnams la phrag dog med pa zhig gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-20: 'on te rang gi chung ma la yang de bzhin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-22: snyam nas des sa 'dzin pa zhig la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-25: gzhon nu ba lang skyong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-26: chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod ces bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-27: des rna ba gnyis bkag nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-33: de lta bur gnas pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-35: gal te rim pa bzhin ma byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-36: rgyal po'i don nyams par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-39: mod la de ltar bgyi ba'i rngo mi thogs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455a-45: thabs ji lta bu zhig byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-0: de'i sdum pa dang nye ba zhig tu zong @455b bkram pa bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-2: de nas 'dris par bgyis nas bka' ji skad stsal pa bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-3: rgyal pos de la zong byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-4: des rdzas dag bsags te tshong zong bkram pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-5: ba lang skyong gi sgyug mo'i bran mo zhig yod pa de zong khyer nas spos kyi phur ma nyor 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-6: sa 'dzin pas bu mo de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-8: spos kyi phur ma 'di su'i yin zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-11: ba lang skyong gi sgyug mo'i'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-15: nga'i ma de yang ming de skad ces bya bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-19: des de la spos kyi phur ma rin bskyungs nas mang du byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-20: ba lang skyong gi sgyug mos bu mo de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-23: rin 'di tsam gyis rdzas nyung ngu khugs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-25: shin tu mang du khugs pa 'di la rgyu ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-26: des kyang ji ltar gyur pa thams cad brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-32: lan gsum du byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-33: de de la dga' bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-34: dus gzhan zhig na sa 'dzin pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-39: des de la byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-42: tshur shog cig ces gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-43: des de la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:455b-44: des skyes su dri'i rdzas dag khyer te 'ongs nas des de la brang sprad de dus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-2: ci 'dra ba bdag gi ma'i dbyibs kyang de 'dra bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-3: de'i slad du bdag mchi ma byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-6: nga nyid khyod kyi ma de yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-9: ces smras nas de de la lhag par dga' bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-10: ji tsam zhig na phyogs shig tu ba lang skyong gi chung ma song ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-11: des de bos nas bu mo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-12: tshur ming po'i zhabs la phyag gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-13: ces byas pa dang de 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-19: bdag gi mna' ma yang ming yang 'di dang 'dra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-22: bdag gi mna' ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-27: gang gis tshe de dag phan tshun gcugs par gyur pa de'i tshe des g-yo thabs su na ba ltar bcos nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-28: bu mo de yang rdzas nyor 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-29: sa 'dzin pa'i khye'u des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-33: ma gcig nga bltar mi 'ong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-34: des khyod na bar mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-37: des de la byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-38: de yang blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-42: ma gcig bdag gi bro ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-46: sman pa la dris te dpyad gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456a-50: dpyad kyis 'tsho ba ma lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-0: bdag nad @456b 'di kho nas srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang lags pa de mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-4: thabs gang gis nad 'di zhi bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-6: zhi bar 'gyur ba'i thabs shig mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-13: ba lang skyong gi btsun mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-14: de lta na bro 'di sos par 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-16: de rab tu khros nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-19: khyod rgyal po'i btsun mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod 'dod dam zhes des de la spyos te langs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-20: sa 'dzin pa de g-yon can zhig pas des nor thams cad dkar chag la bris nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-21: dkar chag de la nga shi na rdzas thams cad la ba lang skyong gi sgyug mo'i yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-22: zhes de skad du yang bris so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-23: dkar chag de de la bskur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-24: des bklags nas khro ba zhi bar gyur te bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-25: de bdag gis da gzong kho na spyos te 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-26: de bdag la je byams par gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-27: de'i phyir bud med rnams kyi rang bzhin ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-29: de shin mi rung bas de la bsgrub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-30: snyam nas des bu mo de bos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-31: de nas sa 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa rim gyis brjod nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:456b-33: khyod kyi skud po de na na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:457a-6: de nad de kho nas dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:457a-8: gal te mna' ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:457a-9: de lta na bdag 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:457a-13: bkren pa de da dus byas su bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:457a-14: rgyal po'i btsun mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par 'tshal lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:457a-17: khyod kyi gyos po gang las skyes pa khyod shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:457a-23: rgyal por gyur nas dpung gi dmag mang ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:457a-24: khyod kyi khyo de yang tshong dpon zhig gi bu yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:457a-26: khyod kyang 'di dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:457a-27: khyod las bu gang byung ba de yang rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:457a-28: zhes de des bslus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:457a-29: khas blangs nas des sa 'dzin pa'i khye'u de la spring pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:457a-33: khyod la gnod par byed srid kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-010-001:457a-34: dus shes par gyis la shog cig /
